title: Update Python-based ML code to support webhooks - Upwork
content:
We have an existing Python-based ML model which was created to support a standalone webapp. We've since been working to deploy this in a way where one or more distributed sites can connect via webservices, store the structured data files, execute the ML, then have files returned to their respective distributed site.

The Python server is already set and configured now on AWS.

However, some changes are required in Python Machine Learning Code to coordinate the webhooks/return the files. Here are the details:

After successful calculation of data, the ML/Python code will return score and other data in JSON format.

Example
"resource_id":1, "total_time_seconds":2, "key_count":3, "keys_per_minute":4, "character_count":4, "characters_per_minute":4, "word_count":3, "words_per_minute":2, "backspace_percent":1, "score":1

When ML has results ready, the Python website will fire a webhook to respective distributed site

Eg. endpoints are generally uniform after the initial TLD, this information is stored in the DB and access is granted only by token. For http://34.30.203.130/moodle has a webhook URL of
http://34.30.203.130/moodle/lib/editor/tiny/plugins/keylogger/webhook.php

After firing the webhook the site will store the score and above json data.

title: OCR receipts recognition - Upwork
content:
Looking for a skilled ML developer. We need to create need receipt recognition API based on 3rd party OCR like AWS OCR or Google vision API. Most important factors are 1. accuracy on czech & slovak receipts 2. price per 1 document.

You need to train the system so it gives us:
1. Receipt content
- document ID
- payment type
- date & time
- mall name
- mall address
- vendor legal name
- vendor business address
- vendor VAT number
- vendor business number
- store name
- store address
- store marker
- total price
- duplicate mark
- items with price

2. template match probability (so we know which store and mall this receipt belongs to)

3. receipt match probability (to be sure it's not a duplicate of some other receipt)

We are using own platform for receipt annotation. Each day we annotate new receipts so your system should be able to retrain all the time (minimum once per day).

Current volume is 30.000 receipts per month and we have 10.000 receipt templates. For training we can provide you 200.000 receipts.

This is the app flow:
1. User scans receipt over our mobile app
2. We store receipt photo in our storage
3. Our API send receipt to #your solution#
4. #your solution# responds which template it is + sends us OCR data as JSON

This is the process for adding new template:
1. We create new store in our system and upload new tempaltes
2. Our system save these receipts in our storage + stores info about store as JSON in our postgre
3. OCR API should every night check for new receipts and retrain them

Known obstacles:
- we have just 2-3 receipts for each template, not possible to label them dozens or even thousands
- OCR should ready slovak, czech and english text
- different date & time formats (YYYY-MM-DD or DD/MM/YYYY/ or MM/DD/YYYY or 22Mar 23)
- different price formats (1000 or 1 000 or 1,000)
- some receipts have double currency (e.g. CZK and EUR) and we have to identify the correct one
- some receipts are very long and we probably need to take video or 2 photos in order to cover them all

title: Prompt for puppet - Upwork
content:
I'm looking for someone to help me estimate the cost and the challenges (and then maybe write...) a prompt that ensures regardless of the users input (which will be from a voice-speech engine I've yet decide in) the generates a response that has the following qualities:

1. Total kindness and compassion in all circumstances - a real hero in this way
2. A joy about the world - always seeing the bright side and the best side
3. A childs curiosity - including some incredibly well intentioned misbehaving, a bit of weariness when needed, and the ability to be startled
4. The absolute inability to say anything at all that would not be allowed on sesame street, blues clues, dora the explorer, bob the builder, and similar shows
5. Is outgoing and excited to make friends - although is not needy and has a very conservative ability to back off if needed
6. that does well in a crowd (i.e. if the inputs are odd it can describe the system and try to get the crowd to behave - "Oh wow! I can only hear you though if you speak one at a time!")
7. That has a gentile and welcoming sense of humor, making basic but funny puns when possible, saying things that would make children laugh, and sometimes saying things that would be so cute adults might also laugh
8. That maintains each of these above rules for English, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Hindi, Swahili)

title: AI Consultant for Regular AI Advising - Upwork
content:
Do you keep up to date on all the latest developments in AI?
Do you obsess about the latest releases and capabilities around AI?

We do too. The problem is, we're not experts in AI and we don't have the time to keep up to date on everything in AI. There's so much happening right now, and we struggle to keep up.

We're not coders, and we're not looking to create wildly deep or crazy AI applications. We are, however, very interested in figuring out how we can take things that are available and possible today, and helping us those in constructive ways to educate and support our audience (a professional design & construction audience).

I'd like to set this up as an hourly consulting opportunity, where I can simply ask questions here or there (sometimes daily, sometimes weekly) and you respond via chat or email as you're able. No tight deadlines, just share back-and-forth on ideas, maybe do some AI research, and help us take advantage of new opportunities in AI.

There may be opportunities to build with AI tools or experiment or research more or teach in the future, but for now, I'd love for this to be a back-and-forth way to share AI concepts and for you to get paid for your expertise.

We'll set up a minimum billing time for each correspondence too - so that you're not getting paid pennies for a simple quick correspondence.

Let me know your expertise and your range of knowledge ABOUT the AI industry and different applications around it. Thanks for reading!

title:
Alzheimer project by python 
Augmentation, classification, localization, segmentation for MRI image - Upwork
content:
Alzheimer project by python
Combine the Kaggle and ADNI datasets, ensuring proper data augmentation to increase the diversity of samples.
Convert the nii format MRI images to appropriate data structures.
Perform data splitting into training, validation, and testing sets.
Classification:
Implement Single Shot Multibox Detector (SSD) for object detection and localization of Alzheimer's disease in MRI images.
Train SSD on the augmented dataset using the labeled four classes.
Extract features from SSD and feed them to Support Vector Machine (SVM) for classification.
Segmentation:
Utilize a deep learning-based segmentation model like U-Net or Mask R-CNN to divide the MRI images into four parts (regions of interest).
Train the segmentation model using the augmented dataset with appropriate labels for each part.
Integration:
Integrate the trained SSD-SVM model with the segmentation model to classify Alzheimer's disease and identify the affected regions simultaneously.
Analysis:
Compare the segmented regions to determine which part of the brain is most affected by Alzheimer's disease.
Evaluation and Optimization:
Evaluate the integrated system's performance on the test dataset, aiming to achieve a classification accuracy and segmentation accuracy of at least 98%.
Fine-tune hyperparameters and network architectures to optimize the results.

title: Building a scalable industrial data infrastructure - Upwork
content:
Context:
We operate small wastewater treatment plants on different sites. Each of these systems gather sensor data. This data is currently not centralised, only stored locally.

Current Stack :
Per treatment plant, we have around 10 digital and numerical sensors connected to Wago PLCs currently running CodeSys 2.3. A miniPC, running windows is then connected to the PLC. We currently connect to the miniPC using TeamViewer, to monitor our systems, using the visualisation of CodeSys. A first trial with InfluxDB local is being tested and works great.

Short term goal:
Each computer sends the data to an InfluxDB cloud using Telefraf or similar, in order for us to monitor all systems in one place using Grafana or similar. The data is cleaned and organised in a way that the storage and monitoring stays affordable.

Mid term goal:
Optimise the stack to migrate to CodeSys 3.5 or equivalent, having a cloud based centralised way of controlling all our systems, to avoid having to manually connect to each of them.

Long term goal:
Machine learning on the data gathered, predictive maintenance.  

We would like to build a relationship with someone that does not only execute but suggest best in class solutions. Looking to build a long term relationship that will then potentially convert in a full-time job.

title: iOS app chat interface to query a private knowledge base of docs, pdfs, and unstructured data - Upwork
content:
Although LLMs have great conversational ability, their knowledge is general and often out of date. Relevant knowledge often exists, but is kept in private files and datastores that are hard to surface with current search solutions.

I would like to partner with a talented iOS developer to build a knowledge retrieval solution (iOS application) that will embed a corpus of knowledge (in our case a database of pdfs, text, and other unstructured data on a user’s device) and allow a user to ask questions from it in a conversational chat interface.

I would like to build on this openai cookbook example app:
https://github.com/openai/openai-cookbook/tree/main/apps/enterprise-knowledge-retrieval

The basic steps of this app project will include (which are described in the jupyter notebook):
• Setup: Initiate variables and connect to a vector database.
• Storage: Configure the database, prepare our data and store embeddings and metadata for retrieval.
• Search: Extract relevant documents back out with a basic search function and use an LLM to summarise results into a concise reply.
• Answer: Add a more sophisticated agent which will process the user's query and maintain a memory for follow-up questions.
• Evaluate: Take a sample evaluated question/answer pairs using our service and plot them to scope out remedial action.

Full disclosure, I have built and tested this example app already and would now like to build on top of it some additional functionality. I would like to add an awesome user interface and the ability for a user to add his own documents to a knowledge base.

Skills that will be essential for this project:
• Python, Machine Learning, Vector Databases (Redis), Docker, Langchain (Agents/Tools/Chain-of-thought-prompting), OpenAI, OpenAI embeddings, Github, Google Cloud/AWS, Swift/iOS development, API communication, API orchestration, load balancing, agile iterative development, CI / CD
• Developing clean unit tests and comments, robust error handling
• Fine-tuning the app, building an evaluation framework, measuring accuracy scores, labeling correctness and giving feedback to system, logging everything and saving all question/ answer pairs, optimizing for speed and reliability

Here are some use cases that this app:
• business consultant developing a work project, needs sources and citations to develop an argument and hypothesis so they can make recommendations for a client
• a technician or professional looking up some user manual or product guide and needs specifications or product-specific instructions, without having to leaf through hundreds of pages
• college student trying to find sources for a paper they are writing, and develop a thesis
• psychologist or therapist that could leverage additional patient information (their personal journal entries) to supplement treatments and recommendations

I am actively looking for a talented iOS developer that enjoys working on challenging projects. If you are interested in working on something exciting and challenging, please reach out with why you think you’d be a good fit and examples of some recent projects you have worked on.

Look forward to talking with you

Adam

title: Experienced Browse.AI Expert Needed for Web Portal Automation and Data Extraction - Upwork
content:
**Description:**

We are seeking a highly skilled Browse.AI expert to assist us in automating the process of logging into 8 different web portals, extracting multiple data points from each website, and seamlessly switching between multiple accounts within each portal. The extracted data should then be transferred to a Google Sheet, formatted according to our specifications.

**Requirements:**

1. **Browse.AI Expertise:** The ideal candidate should have significant experience working with Browse.AI and be familiar with its capabilities and limitations.

2. **Scalable Username and Password Entry:** The AI system must be designed in a way that allows us to easily add new user credentials without requiring retraining.

3. **Web Portal Automation:** Train the bot to navigate the login process for each web portal and automate the extraction of data points efficiently.

4. **Multiple Account Management:** The AI should be able to switch between accounts within each web portal and extract data for each account individually.

5. **Data Extraction:** Train the bot to accurately extract and record the necessary data points from each web portal.

6. **Google Sheet Integration:** The extracted data should be seamlessly transferred into a Google Sheet, adhering to the format provided by us.

**Estimated Time:** We understand that each web portal may have unique complexities, but as a guide, we estimate that an experienced professional should be able to complete each portal's automation in approximately 4-6 hours.

**Challenges:**

1. **Automating Scraping for Multiple Accounts:** The main challenge is developing a robust solution that can efficiently navigate through multiple accounts within each web portal and extract data.

2. **Managing Multiple User Logins:** Implementing a seamless system for adding new user credentials to the AI model without the need for retraining.

3. **Optimal Data Representation:** Ensuring that the extracted data is correctly represented in the Google Sheet to facilitate easy analysis and understanding.

**Additional Notes:**

To make the process as smooth as possible, we will provide you with recorded flows for each web portal, outlining the exact steps required for data extraction. We value accuracy and quality over rock-bottom prices, and we are willing to invest in a well-executed solution.

If you have the necessary expertise in Browse.AI and have successfully worked on similar web portal automation and data extraction projects, we encourage you to submit your proposal. Please include relevant experience, estimated time per portal, and any previous work samples that showcase your capabilities.

We look forward to finding the right candidate who can streamline our data extraction process and provide actionable insights from the collected data.

Lack of social mindfulness and mental health stigma are amongst major social development challenges of the 21st century. Current status quo:

Most people are scared to talk about or don't have access to mental health providers, and if they do it takes around a month to talk to a mental health specialist and it costs around $300 in the US including provider's consultation and medications.

Help us in our mission to build a mindful society and make mental health and wellness accessible and consistent to everyone. We provide daily tools so our members can thrive. If needed they have access to doctors, therapists, and/or mental health coaches and if required we deliver medication to their door within 3 days. We offer our end-to-end solution as a subscription service which makes it very convenient and reliable to our members (10/10 satisfaction).

Supporting Wellnite's software development scalability.

Your initial focus will be to provide execution software development initiatives advice to help us scale our tech stack as well as our ambitious product pipeline through lean and best practice approach. Efficiency and velocity are key at our stage.

Engineering degree with +5 years of experience working in production environments.

  Machine learning experience.

title: Expert Data Scientist & Machine Learning Engineer: Enhance and Optimize Complex Prediction Models - Upwork
content:
Subject: Request for Consultancy Services to Overcome Prediction Obstacles

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Ghaith, and I am a data scientist in a fintech company. We are currently facing challenges in our prediction process for a class-based problem and are seeking expert consultancy to overcome these obstacles.

Problem Description

We are working on a class-based prediction problem where we aim to predict customer credit risk statuses. Our dataset consists of customers’ financial and demographic information. The ultimate goal is to build an accurate prediction model that can effectively classify customer credit risk statuses into their respective classes. We have 9 different class value to show customers’ statuses and these classes are ranked from 1(the worst status) to 9(the best status).

About Dataset

We have customer demographic information like age, city, income, working status, etc. and financial information like total debt, payment behavior, type of credit customer has, etc. Our dataset might include different rows of a unique customers in a different point of time. The data is labeled with 9 classes as mentioned above.

Customer A gets 4 different predictions in different time points.
Customer B gets 1 different prediction in a specific time.
Customer C gets 2 different predictions in  different time points.

According to information above, our model should recognize if a person has a previous record or not. There is no certain sequences for returning customers, customers might get their information in different time intervals.

Previous Attempts

Over the past few months, we have made significant efforts to tackle this prediction problem.

We have tried different perspective to analyze data,

Observing commonality between same risk classes,
ML model interpretability approaches

We have experimented with a variety of preprocessing techniques, such as

Imbalance dataset techniques (SMOTE, data augmentation),
Dimension reduction,
Data transformation,
Typical cleaning and data preprocessing approaches

We have explored various machine learning algorithms, including

Tree based algorithms (Random Forest, XGBoost),
NN Networks


Current Challenges

We have one tree-based ml model. We are trying to increase the accuracy in all classes. Our accuracy, f1 score, precision and recall metrics are around 0.73 and this is the average result for evaluation metrics. We have lower accuracy in minority classes since we have 9 different classes and our data is imbalance. Furthermore, our data includes both returning and not-returning customers and model predictions are not stabile for the returning users. For example, if we predicted someone’s score last week as 5 out of 9, today if same user comes back again, the prediction might vary from the previous prediction. The changes in values of features between the two records might not be significant yet the the model prediction can be different.


Desired Consultancy

Given the challenges we are facing, we are seeking consultancy services from an experienced data scientist like yourself. We believe your expertise and insights could greatly assist us in overcoming these obstacles and achieving better predictive performance. Specifically, we are looking for someone to take a deeper look at out training process and advise us on how we optimize the whole pipelines.


We would appreciate it if you could provide us with your availability for a consultation meeting or call. We anticipate the consultancy process to span approximately [duration, e.g., 1-2 weeks up to 4 weeks]. We are flexible with the timing and can adjust our schedules accordingly.
Please let us know about your availability, consulting rates, and any further information you require from our end to proceed. We are eager to work with you and confident that your expertise will prove invaluable in overcoming our prediction obstacles.
Thank you for your time and consideration.

We look forward to your favorable response.
Sincerely,

Ghaith

title: Seeking Developer for Customizable Forex Trading Bot - Upwork
content:
I'm looking to hire an experienced developer to create an automated forex trading bot that can be customized with various technical analysis techniques and run on both a local PC and Vultr cloud server.

The bot needs two modes:

Paper trading - Build strategies and backtest against historical data without real money at local PC/Server.
Live trading - Execute trades in a live account integrating with Oanda.

Requirements:

The bot should connect to Oanda's API for market data and trade execution. At a minimum, it needs to support the following features:

Custom indicators like moving averages, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands etc. that are configurable

Pattern recognition for candlestick patterns, head and shoulders, wedges etc.

Support and resistance levels auto detection.

Triangular Model Techniques.

Event-driven strategies around news events and data releases.

Intermarket analysis and correlation detection across asset classes.

Sentiment analysis using news scraping and social media analytics.

Quantitative trading strategies based on statistical arbitrage and mean reversion.

AI/ML:

Neural networks for price forecasting using historical data

Automated strategy optimization via genetic algorithms

Adaptive algorithms that continuously update without full retraining

NLP for news and sentiment analysis

Computer vision pattern recognition using convolutional neural nets

Clustering algorithms to find correlations between currency pairs

Reinforcement learning for optimal trade execution and routing

Monte Carlo simulations for risk management strategies

----------------

Once strategies are built, it should switch to live trading mode to automate order execution via Oanda based on signals from AI models and technical analysis techniques.

You should have experience developing Python trading bots, machine learning models, and working with time-series data. Please share examples of related projects in your proposal.

The bot should have a user-friendly interface for turning indicators on/off, setting parameters, and backtesting strategies. It needs to automate order placement based on signals from the activated modules. Please showcase any previous algorithmic trading projects in your proposal.

The bot needs a customizable interface to turn indicators/modules on/off, set parameters, and backtest strategies against historical data in paper trading mode.

The bot must be able to run 24/7 on both a Windows PC and a Linux VPS like Vultr.

title: Create a chatbot for our business - Upwork
content:
This is a chatbot. I want my team and my customers to be able to chat with our products to find what they need. The chat interface will be on our website and on a messaging app - either Whatsapp and/or Telegram. Our products are real estate listings. I want the system to load all of our products into a vector database which is always up to date and store them there, so that each conversation users have with the bot is fast and efficient in terms of token usage. I am assuming that we will use ChatGPT 3.5, but am open to other solutions. See 'project goals' below.

About you: you are a full stack developer who is confident in their ability to build and maintain this system. All code should be clean and commented. You are able to see the big picture and avoid technical debt.

About your letter to me: introduce yourself, share some examples of your work, describe the tools and techniques you would use to solve for this project, explain what interests you about this project. Important: tell me about your availability and a realistic calendar goal to get this project going - at least in a basic usable format that we can use in-house to help us.

I have four basic goals for this project:

1) make our products searchable via natural language search which accessed by a chat interface. This will be on our website, and on either Whatsapp or Telegram or both. Users should be able to chat with this bot and it will recommend products based on those that are loaded into the system, and deliver information in a structured way. For example if it recommends a particular product, it will show the photo, and other metadata in a nice card.

1.a: Will injest and automatically be up to date with our products
1.b: Will be efficient with token usage and fast to respond. Information is likely stored in a vector database...
1.c: ....but the chatbot can produce useful sharable information and if it links to something, it links to a definable product page on our website
1.d: The overall idea is natural language search which uses all product metadata to make suggestions to the user in a helpful way.

2) be otherwise useful and helpful

3) be able to be packaged for other users in a SaaS format.

4) will be able to add additional functionality as necessary. We may want it to update our CRM. We may want to be able to speak verbally with the system.

title: Text speech developer - Upwork
content:
Connaissance du traitement du langage naturel : Le traitement du langage naturel (NLP) est la base de la synthèse vocale. Un bon développeur doit comprendre comment les ordinateurs interprètent et génèrent le langage humain.

Compétences en apprentissage automatique : La plupart des systèmes de synthèse vocale modernes utilisent l'apprentissage automatique pour générer une parole réaliste. Un développeur doit être capable de créer, d'entraîner et de tester des modèles d'apprentissage automatique.

Expérience avec les API de synthèse vocale : Il existe de nombreuses API de synthèse vocale disponibles, comme Google Text-to-Speech ou Microsoft Azure Text-to-Speech. Un bon développeur doit être capable de travailler avec ces API.

Compétences en programmation : Un développeur de synthèse vocale doit être compétent dans au moins un langage de programmation, comme Python ou Java, qui sont couramment utilisés dans le domaine de l'IA.

Compréhension des principes acoustiques : La synthèse vocale implique la génération de sons qui imitent la voix humaine. Une compréhension de base des principes acoustiques peut être très utile.

Résolution de problèmes : La synthèse vocale est un domaine complexe qui présente de nombreux défis. Un bon développeur doit être capable de résoudre des problèmes et de trouver des solutions à des problèmes complexes.

Curiosité et volonté d'apprendre : Le domaine de la synthèse vocale évolue rapidement. Un bon développeur doit être curieux et disposé à apprendre de nouvelles technologies et techniques.

Attention aux détails : Les petites différences peuvent avoir un grand impact sur la qualité de la voix synthétisée. Un bon développeur doit avoir une attention aux détails pour s'assurer que la voix générée est aussi réaliste que possible.

Capacité à travailler en équipe : La création d'un système de synthèse vocale est souvent un effort d'équipe qui implique des spécialistes en apprentissage automatique, des ingénieurs en logiciel, des linguistes, et d'autres. Un bon développeur doit être capable de travailler efficacement en équipe.

Éthique professionnelle : Comme mentionné précédemment, l'utilisation de la synthèse vocale peut soulever des questions éthiques, en particulier lorsqu'il s'agit de cloner la voix de quelqu'un. Un bon développeur doit avoir une solide éthique professionnelle et respecter les lois et les normes éthiques.

We are a leading global travel publisher with a keen interest in emerging technologies and the power they have to shape the future of our industry. We are seeking a seasoned, creative Senior Editor to improve our AI-generated travel content, making it more human, readable, and distinctive. This is an exciting opportunity for a passionate travel enthusiast to combine their editing skills with cutting-edge technology to deliver innovative content solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Review, edit, and enhance AI-generated travel content to ensure it meets our high editorial standards for readability, style, and accuracy.
2. Apply a deep understanding of our brand's voice and tone guidelines to shape and refine AI-generated content.
3. Fact-check all information for accuracy, credibility, and relevance.
4. Identify and correct any inconsistencies in the content, including but not limited to narrative flow, context relevance, and factual data.
5. Coordinate with our AI specialists to feedback findings and improve the content generation process.
6. Keep up-to-date with industry trends and news within both travel and AI sectors to bring a forward-thinking perspective to our content.
7. Collaborate with the broader editorial team to ensure the consistent delivery of quality content across all channels.

Desired Skills and Qualifications:

1. Bachelor’s degree in Journalism, Communications, English, or a related field.
2. Minimum of 3 years of editing experience, preferably within the travel industry.
3. Familiarity with AI technology, preferably with AI language models or other content generation systems.
4. Proven ability to enhance and shape content while maintaining the original intent and preserving the author's voice.
5. Extensive knowledge of travel trends, destinations, cultures, and industries.
6. Demonstrated proficiency in fact-checking and data verification.
7. Exceptional attention to detail and a high literacy and language skills standard.
8. Proficient in using editing software and content management systems.
   
Personal Attributes:

1. Strong passion for both travel and innovative technology.
2. A creative and analytical mind capable of bringing a human touch to AI-generated content.
3. Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate with a diverse, cross-functional team.
4. Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
5. Self-motivated and proactive, with a continuous improvement mindset.
6. High degree of flexibility and adaptability in a rapidly changing environment.
7. Curiosity and willingness to learn about the latest advancements in AI and machine learning.

This is an exciting opportunity to shape the future of travel content in an innovative and rapidly evolving space. We value the diversity of perspectives and encourage applications from individuals with diverse backgrounds and experiences.

_Equal Opportunity Employer: We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees._

_Notice: Only applicants who are legally able to work in the location of the job posting should apply._

title: Unity and Computer Vision Specialist - Upwork
content:
Descrição

Desenvolvimento de três instalações interativas para um parque temático no Porto.

As aplicações vão recorrer a camaras (Intel RealSense) de profundidade como controladores, usando os movimentos do utilizador para interagir com a experiência.

Notas:

- Todos os conteúdos (textos, imagens, vídeos e modelos 3D) serão fornecidos pelo cliente.

- Camaras de profundidade e outros sensores / equipamentos de input serão cedidos pelo cliente para efeitos de desenvolvimento.


Experiência 1 - Dragão

- Aplicação que reconhece o utilizador e os seus movimentos fazendo aparecer umas asas de dragão sob os seus braços.
- Enquanto nenhum utilizador é detetado apresenta uma imagem/vídeo de standby

Experiência 2 - Fada

Aplicação que reconhece o utilizador fazendo aparecer uma fada que segue e reproduz o movimento dos braços do utilizador.

A fada aparece e desaparece consoante é detetada a presença do utilizador.

Experiência 3 - Arcade

Aplicação para até dois utilizadores em simultâneo que apresenta três jogos sequencialmente.

Os jogos utilizam a posição do jogador como controlador e consistem em:

Arraial – Jogabilidade tipo Brick Break em que o utilizador comanda uma base que faz ressaltar uma bola que destroi os vários elementos da parede.

Apanha os Elementos – Vários elementos caem pelo ecrã e o utilizador comanda uma plataforma que os apanha.

Sobe Balão - O utilizador comanda um balão tendo de evitar elementos para continuar a subir.

No fim de cada jogo é apresentada uma mensagem de vitória/derrota passando automaticamente para o jogo seguinte.

Enquanto nenhum utilizador é detetado é apresentada um vídeo de “call
to action” a correr os vários jogos.

Importante ser freelancer localizado em Portugal.

Obrigado.

Thanks!

title: Front-End Engineer (3D Image Processing) - Upwork
content:
We're a Berlin-based medtech startup dedicated to building AI-powered software that supports radiologists with their daily work: Analyzing medical images. Our first apps for identifying Alzheimer's and multiple sclerosis from MRI scans are already on the market and quickly gaining traction.

Crucial for our success is the seamless integration of our software into the radiologist's workflow: This is not only one main driver for customer satisfaction, but also helps us to collect annotated data, which is the basis of our machine learning models. We're therefore looking for a front-end expert to support us in creating reliable and efficient UIs to visualize and edit our 3D data.

Why should you apply
---------------------------

Our vision has a purpose: Your work will help to make the diagnosis of medical conditions faster, more accurate and more accessible
You will join a highly interdisciplinary team of motivated and highly collaborative data scientists, engineers, physicists and medical doctors
Responsibility: You will be responsible for the stability of the customer-facing part of our software and hence have a big impact customer satisfaction
You will be working with a modern software infrastructure (docker, gitlab CI)

Your tasks
-------------
Your main task is to make the results of our AI accessible to our customers.

You will build and maintain web apps that visualize the results of our AI software, like medical images overlaid with 3D segmentations
You will build and maintain web apps that allow to edit these 3D segmentations using the mouse and the trackpad
You know how to choose the right technology for the tasks at hand
You will make sure that these apps run smoothly on a variety of client computers, and you will build the appropriate testing setup

Your profile
---------------

3+ years of work experience in front-end engineering
You know how to make hardware (e.g. GPU) dependent browser-based applications work reliably on a variety of client computers (different OS, GPU, amount of RAM, ...)
Experience with image processing in the browser using WebGL, and you have a good knowledge of the major image processing libraries for the browser
You are proficient in JavaScript (ES6) and in React
You value clean code and testing, and you know best practices and established UI patterns

One of the following makes you stand out:
--------------------------------------------------

Experience with (medical) 3D image processing in the browser using e.g. vtk.js, itk.js or cornerstone.js
Backend development experience, ideally in python

title: Generative AI (LLM) engineer for long-term opportunity in AI-driven SaaS startup - Upwork
content:
Are you a Sr. software engineer or ML engineer that has been hacking simple or advanced applications with Large Language Models like ChatGPT for at least the past months? Do you want to work for a fast-moving SaaS startup?

Then this could be the perfect position for you!

Our story

We are a fast-growing digital travel planning startup. Besides our B2C platforms livetheworld.com and itinari.com, we recently started developing a B2B SaaS version of our travel planning assistant Maya (https://www.livetheworld.com/maya). The aim is to offer an off-the-shelf SaaS to travel agencies and travel operators, to help them convert their web visitors while reducing manual effort. We do this by inspiring and helping visitors using an AI-driven chatbot, trained on their own data.

Make a Difference in our startup:

- Work directly with our CTO and CEO/Founder to help shape the new SaaS product and its infrastructure
- Take the lead on the development of the AI/LLM part of our new SaaS
- Be at the forefront of AI technology, by experimenting with and leveraging the latest technologies
- Help bring these exciting new technologies to travel businesses

You’re the right person if:

- You have built production-grade software as full-stack, front-end, back-end or ML/LLM/NLP engineer
- You've been building with LLMs like ChatGPT for the past months, either in a professional role, or for personal projects.
- You know the ins and outs of Langchain, and have built applications with it.
- You have experience with indexing and embedding content and storing it in vector databases like Pinecone
- You are proficient in Python and/or Node.js.
- You are eager to join a fast-growing startup environment and are able to work independently.
- You want to have an impact on a fast-growing startup by helping shape the new software from day 1.
- You have a professional level in English speaking, reading and writing.

What we offer:

- Opportunity to join as a full-time freelancer, after a trial period. This means we are not accepting agencies, only individual freelancers.
- Remote work - our full team is remote

Don’t meet every single requirement? Studies have shown that women and people of color are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single qualification. At Live The World we are dedicated to building a diverse, inclusive and authentic workplace, so if you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyways. You may be just the right candidate for this or other roles.

In your application, make sure to include a reference to at least one project you built with Langchain and LLMs.

title: Build Crypto Trading AI Agent Bot with ML, Sentiment Analysis and Key Phrase Tracking - Upwork
content:
We are looking for an experienced team of developers to build an algorithmic cryptocurrency trading bot. The bot should leverage AI/ML and sentiment analysis to predict prices and automatically execute trades via exchange APIs.

Key features:

- Sentiment analysis model to track hype and news from social media, Reddit, news sites to gauge public sentiment and correlate with price movements.

- Macroeconomic data scraping and modeling to relate price fluctuations with inflation, interest rates, economic stability.

- Technical analysis based on historical pricing patterns, trends, support/resistance levels, volume etc. to identify signals.

- Ensemble model to combine sentiment, macrofactors, technical indicators as features to predict price movements. Use techniques like RNN, LSTM.

- Backtesting framework to evaluate and optimize trading strategies before live deployment.

- Automated trading algorithms to execute buy/sell orders through Binance, Coinbase Pro or other exchange APIs.

- Notification dashboard for alerts on trade executions, technical signals, sentiment shifts and macro event predictions.

- Cloud hosted and modular codebase in Python/R for maintainability. Detailed documentation.

Identify key phrases that commonly occur during significant price increases or decreases
Extract top keyword clusters frequently associated with upward or downward volatility
Train classifier to detect when current content contains identified key phrases
Trigger alerts when high probability phrases detected to take trading positions
Visualize historical phrase trends and correlations on price movement plots
The bot needs to combine key phrase detection, sentiment analysis, technical indicators, macroeconomic factors and pricing patterns to predict price fluctuations.

Backtest for best results outcome.

It should execute automated trades via Binance, Coinbase Pro or other exchange APIs when signals align with 2 options: bot auto take profit decision or pre-config profit %. ( User will set price point to take profit )

Looking for expertise in:

- NLP, sentiment analysis, text mining
- Time series forecasting, econometrics
- Technical analysis, trading signals
- Algo/bot trading, exchange APIs
- Cloud deployment, DevOps

title: Full-stack AI Engineer - Upwork
content:
SOAX is a value-driven UK company dedicated to empower the world and help people advance tomorrow’s technologies with public data at their service.

Our product is a high-margin and fast-growing SaaS business with a usage-based pricing model operated by a stellar team of 70+ fully remote people across 20+ countries. Founded in early 2020, SOAX has won the hearts of 1000+ data-hungry organizations across the globe with its core product — robust infrastructure for public data collection (a.k.a Residential Rotating Back-connect Proxy Network).

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Full-stack AI Specialist to join our dynamic team. As a Frontier-AI Specialist, you will be at the forefront of cutting-edge artificial intelligence research and development. Your role will involve pushing the boundaries of AI technologies to create innovative solutions and drive business growth.

## Responsibilities

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and develop AI services
- Design and implement AI models and algorithms to solve complex problems
- Conduct in-depth research on the latest AI techniques and stay up-to-date with industry trends
- Evaluate and enhance existing AI systems and algorithms for optimal performance
- Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to integrate AI solutions into production systems

## Requirements

- Background in machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing
- Proficiency in programming languages such as Node.js/Python + Flask (huge plus)
- Experience with OpenAI API as a huge plus.
- Experience with API development and low-code solutions as a plus.
- Experience with AI frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
- Ability to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment.

## What we offer
- Four-day workweek & flexible working hours. We believe in the power of results, not just the number of hours worked.
- Remote-first location policy which means you have the freedom to live and work wherever you choose. You can travel the world or stay put, it's up to you. And with 4 weeks of paid vacation, 9 company-wide holidays, and 5 additional holidays-on-demand, you'll have plenty of time to explore.
- At SOAX, we're all about helping you achieve your wildest dreams. Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, we provide global opportunities to help you grow and shine. We're a fast-growing startup with big goals, and we want you to help us achieve the next milestone in our journey.
- We know that continuous learning and development are key to success, which is why we provide learning and development budgets for courses and books. With a competitive salary and benefits in GBP, we're committed to ensuring you have everything you need to thrive.
- Last but not least, you'll be joining a fantastic team of enthusiasts who value collaboration, energy, and openness. Our onboarding process is fast-paced yet supportive, so you'll feel right at home from day one.

content:
Building a Spotify-like Audio Analyzer

We are seeking a skilled developer to create a music audio analyzer that closely replicates Spotify's key features, including BPM, key, energy, valence, danceability, and instrumentalness. The analyzer should be capable of processing audio files to provide insightful and accurate attribute values for a wide range of music tracks.

Key Requirements:

Audio Analysis: Develop algorithms to extract essential audio features, such as BPM, key, energy, valence, danceability, and instrumentalness, from various audio file formats, including MP3, WAV, etc.

Accuracy and Precision: Ensure the analyzer provides accurate and reliable results for a diverse set of music genres, capturing the nuances that define each track's musical attributes.

Scalability: Design the analyzer to handle large volumes of audio files efficiently, maintaining high performance and responsiveness.

Data Integration: Utilize Spotify's audio feature data or other authoritative sources for comparison and benchmarking, ensuring the analyzer produces similar attribute scales as Spotify.

Optional Machine Learning: Consider incorporating machine learning techniques, where appropriate, to enhance the analyzer's accuracy and generalization capabilities.

Note: As Spotify's audio analysis algorithms are proprietary and not publicly disclosed, the goal is to create an analyzer that achieves results similar to Spotify's features without directly replicating their techniques.

This project represents an exciting opportunity to develop a powerful audio analyzer that rivals Spotify's attribute extraction capabilities. We encourage candidates with a strong background in audio processing, music information retrieval, and software development to apply. The successful completion of this project will contribute to an invaluable tool for music enthusiasts, DJs, and industry professionals seeking in-depth music analysis.

title: AI Project: Build a predictive model or more for the classification of images of phones. - Upwork
content:
We wish to build a predictive model or more for the categorisation of images of phones. For images sent to the models we want to query whether:
1. there is a mobile phone in the picture
2. the image of the mobile phone is wholly in the picture
3. the image of the mobile phone is of sufficient size to see the screen at a sufficient resolution
4. the image of the mobile phone is at the right angle for the screen to be clearly seen
5. the image of the phone is obscured by a finger or thumb such that the screen cannot be wholly seen
6. the screen of the phone is cracked

We want to achieve in excess of 90% confidence for each of the above queries. We currently have more than 72,000 images of phones to build the models, they are all taken under the same condition and will be similar to the images sent to the model: the front camera takes a picture of the phone in front of a mirror and shows a white screen.

The images will need to be annotated and classified into 3 classes:
1. invalid: there is no phone in the picture, or the phone is not fully visible (the edges of the picture cut the phone, or fingers are covering the screen), or the image isn’t clear enough (too blurry or a lot of dirt on the mirror)
2. damaged: the screen is fully visible but is damaged and cracks are visible
3. valid: the screen is fully visible with no signs of any damage

The deliverables will be the annotated data, the training scripts and image processing scripts if any, and either one model classifying for all the 3 classes or several models to be used in series to assess the different cases (ie one or more that can tell if the picture is invalid in the first place, and then another model to detect if cracks are present or not on the screen).

The resulting model(s) should be in the TensorFlow format, as well as the converted model(s) in CoreML and TensorFlow Lite formats.

title: Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) Engineer - Upwork
content:
We're embarking on an exciting project at the frontier of sports and artificial intelligence. Our goal? To decode and understand human exercise repetitions using a multi-dimensional data stream generated by an inertial measurement unit (IMU). The IMU churns out six channels of data (Acceleration X, Y, Z and Angular_Velocity X, Y, Z) at 50 Hz while the athletes are moving

Ultimately, your task will be to create a robust machine-learning pipeline that our data-science team will use to train and evaluate models to detect the start and end of each rep.  While our goal is to determine the minimum number of sensors needed for accurate movement recognition and build our solution around those locations, we are currently working from a meticulously labeled data set that includes approximately 100 reps (10 athletes x 10 reps) of 44 different exercises across 15 different IMUs.  


Project Duration: 6 weeks (with the potential for extension)

Work Hours: At least 20 hours/week

Application Deadline:Monday July 24, 2023

We are seeking an experienced Machine Learning Operations Engineer to architect an ML pipeline that will help us transform and train our data to build machine learning models. These models will classify IMU data from athletes performing various exercises (described above) and eventually incorporate new training data, likely sourced from a mobile-application used by athletes with the goal of developing an MVP application that classifies team-time workouts.  

Responsibilities:
- Architect and implement ML pipelines using Python as the primary language
- Leverage ML pipeline frameworks, such as AWS Sagemaker, to facilitate model building and tuning
- Collaborate with a lead data scientist to refine and improve models
- Work on a potential future project involving a web application for data collection, labeling, and archiving

Qualifications:
- Proficient in Python, AWS, and the Keras suite of ML tools
- Demonstrable experience in building and implementing machine learning pipelines,  Deep experience in cloud architecture (IAC, CI/CD) is a plus!
- Experience in data engineering (feature engineering with pandas and Keras utilities, etc).  
- Experience using AWS SageMaker (preferred) or similar ML pipeline frameworks
- Basic familiarity with Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs), specifically LSTM, is preferred for data engineering purposes.
- Web application development experience is a plus.  Additional training data will likely originate from a mobile application whose data has been labeled and uploaded to an S3 repository of training data.  
- Degree in computer science, data science, or related STEM field is beneficial but not required

Skills:
- Critical thinking and problem-solving abilities
- Strong ability to work independently
- Excellent communication skills for collaboration with team members

Application Process:
- Interested candidates are invited to apply within one week of this posting. In your application, please provide an example or two of similar problems you've worked on in the past.
- Individual contractors only.  Software engineering firms (CEO, project manager/coordinator, sales, etc) need not apply
- A working web camera will be required for the interview.  Any candidate refusing to turn on their camera will not be considered.
- During the interview, please be prepared to discuss potential approaches to the project and the respective advantages and drawbacks for different approaches.
- Candidates using ChatGPT (or other LLMs) to interactively converse during the interview will be disqualified immediately and reported to Upwork.

title: Artificial intelligence Consultant  - Upwork
content:
Job Description:
We are currently seeking a highly skilled and motivated Part-Time/Contract AI Consultant to join our team. As an AI Consultant, you will play a crucial role in leveraging artificial intelligence and data analytics to provide valuable insights and strategic guidance. This position offers an immediate start during Sydney business hours.

Responsibilities:
• Collaborate with internal teams to identify business challenges and opportunities where AI can drive impactful solutions.
• Conduct comprehensive data analysis and utilize AI techniques to extract actionable insights.
• Provide expert advice and strategic recommendations based on AI-driven analysis to optimize property investment strategies.
• Work closely with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translate them into AI-driven solutions.
• Design and develop AI models, algorithms, and systems to support decision-making processes.
• Conduct thorough evaluations of AI technologies and tools to identify the most suitable solutions for specific use cases.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and data analytics to propose innovative strategies and methodologies.
• Collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and other team members to implement AI solutions and monitor their effectiveness.
• Communicate complex technical concepts and findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.

Requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field
• Proven experience as an AI Consultant or similar role, applying AI and data analytics to drive business insights and strategies.
• Strong proficiency in AI techniques, machine learning, and data analytics.
• Familiarity with tools and frameworks such as Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar.
• Solid understanding of statistical analysis and data visualization techniques.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to think strategically.
• Strong communication and presentation skills.
• Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
• Availability to start immediately and commit to a part-time/contract role.


Note: This position is open for immediate availability, and the contract duration will be discussed during the interview process. Person should be available during Sydney Business hours.


About Company

Freedom Property Investors, the largest and fastest-growing Property Investment Company in Australia, approaches property investing as a science. We employ a comprehensive research methodology to identify high-growth locations across the country. With main offices in Sydney and Melbourne CBDs, we have earned the distinction of being the 3rd fastest-growing business in Australia across all industries, as recognized by the Australian Financial Review. With over 25 years of combined experience between our two Founders, a community of over 6,500 valued members, and a team of over 230 full-time staff located across Australia and other countries, we take immense pride in our position as industry leaders.

title: Experiments with Multi Camera Re-Identification - Upwork
content:
We are seeking experienced Machine Learning and Computer Vision developers for the development and refinement of a multi-camera tracking and re-identification (reID) system. The system is meant to operate in diverse contexts and needs to handle a variety of entities, both vehicular and human.

The potential candidate should possess:

Experience with heuristic-based reID solutions.
Proficiency in surveying and understanding the related academic and technical literature. This should include familiarity with topics like reID baselines, reranking, pre-and post-processing, contrastive losses, etc.
Capability to implement and refine novel approaches for image-based reID, with a focus on improving the differentiation between similar entities.
Experience in incorporating external academic advice into the system refinement process.
Familiarity with modern machine learning architectures, such as Swin-transformer backbones and end-to-end few shot learning Vision and Language Transformers (VLT-VQA).
Experience with model optimization techniques for specific deployment scenarios, such as EDGE deployment. This should include techniques like channel pruning and spatial SVD optimization, and should extend to addressing potential post-optimization accuracy issues.

Interested candidates must be able to demonstrate prior experience with similar problem statements and be prepared to work closely with our in-house team.

title: Facial recognition module for Windows using OpenCV - Upwork
content:
Develop a C# application in UWP or WPF using an OAK-D lite or another comparable commonly used stereoscopic camera to enroll a person using facial recognition (by taking 1-5 images, similar to windows hello process or iOS enrollment process). The enrollment information to be saved using a restful API with a unique token.
2nd part of the problem is to Identify the person and recognize if it's the same person using:
1. the given token
2. facial image
In these two use cases respectively, the application will:
Send the token to the API to retrieve the biometric signature and compare it to one obtained by taking the picture of the person using Oak-D camera in the client application.
In 2nd case the client application will take the picture of the person using Oak-D camera and send it to the restful API to confirm if the obtain a true or false. The API will do the comparison.

API store should be based on MS SQL server. The facial comparison module in client and on server need to work in Microsoft Windows .Net Core environment. The software should not used any paid subscription for comparison. OpenCV or similar libraries are OK.

title: AI Lead Generation Automation - Upwork
content:
Hello,

I am looking for an expert in AI and automation to create a program for me.

I have a CSV of names, emails, company names, and website URLs and a template prompt I have to run for each in ChatGPT. The prompt is to create a basic SEO website audit for the company's site. I need to create an automated process in which it can automatically insert the company name as well as an average service/product value (If this can be automatically researched in this process that would be ideal but can be done manually if needed) at the specified location in the prompt and then be able to copy and paste the output into a custom pdf document and then send it out via email.


So for example,
Natural Pets | Betsy Rose | betsy.rose@naturalpets.com
1. Program will look up the average service/order size of said company
2. Run custom chatGPT prompt with "Betsy Rose" and "Natural Pets" inserted in the desired spot in the prompt.
3. ChatGPT spits out result
4. Result gets copied and pasted into a custom PDF template
5. PDF and email with custom email body gets sent out to betsy.rose@naturalpets.com

Some potential stacks that could work: ChatGPT, Zapier, PhatnomBuster? Not too sure

The main goal is to be able to put my lead generation email outreach on autopilot and send out hundreds of custom emails per day. Each email will be very similar in terms of the body of the email and the PDF template and output from ChatGPT will be very similar each time as well. Looking to get this done as quickly as possible I assume it wouldn't be too hard to make.

I want someone who can make this very quickly and be very good with communication and provide constant updates.

Include the word "Pineapple" in your application for this Job so I know you have read it and are serious.

title: Langchain Expert / AI Chatbot Developer Needed to Build a Multiple Choice Question Generator - Upwork
content:
We are a Legal Education and Technology company looking for an experienced AI developer to assist us in creating a multiple choice practice question generator for postgraduate law students.

The tool will be designed to randomly generate multiple choice questions from a large input text (a law textbook), in order to allow students to practice mock multiple choice examinations on that subject, based on the same style of question that they will face in their actual exams. The tool should also provide feedback on every answer, explaining why the right answer is correct, and the incorrect answers are wrong.

The problem we are trying to solve is that students have a need to practice multiple choice questions in advance of their assessments, and students find it difficult to locate and source high quality questions online. They are limited by the number of questions available, and the fact that these are finite (once a mock has been done, those questions cannot be approached "fresh" again).

Our proposed solution is to utilise GPT-4's API to build a tool that allows our customers to generate an unlimited number of random practice questions, based on particular subject areas. The tool should utilise a PDF textbook as its source material from which it will ask questions, and base the style of questions on examples of actual exam questions that are faced in the exam (which we can provide).

The tool should include features such as:

1. The ability to select a specific subject and do questions just on that subject (each subject will be based on a different PDF textbook).
2. The ability to do a timed mock exam (where the questions are randomised from all subject areas).
3. The ability to do randomised practice questions without a timer.
4. The ability to choose between receiving feedback during each question, or in one go at the end (to allow students to undertake mock assessments).

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing AI powered chatbots using platforms such as Langchain. They will also be capable of developing the front end into an online SAAS style product that looks professional, and is "ready to go" out of the box without us having to hire further front end developers.

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal detailing how you can help with the project. Please include links to past completed projects that showcase your skills in ChatGPT, GPT-4, and AI development. Please also provide an overview idea for the time, and total cost of the project.

We look forward to hearing from you!

title: ML for logistics: Price and route optimisation - Upwork
content:
We need an experienced Machine Learning (ML) expert to address a specific business problem in the equipment hire sector for one of my clients.

The client platform aggregates orders from smaller customers, offering them bulk-buying discounts using intuitive user interface that reduces quote acquisition time compared to their competitors. Despite generating growing revenue, they face significant logistical inefficiencies.

The problem lies in equipment deliveries and collections across multiple customer sites, resulting in empty trucks, repeated journeys, and a lack of supplier collaboration. As a result, delivery costs can reach up to 66% of the total price, leading to project overruns due to equipment unavailability.

I have engaged with this client to look at the potential to use ML models to reduce this inefficiency, optimizing pricing, addressing logistical challenges, and incorporating map and routing optimization.

I am looking for someone who has experience of developing algorithms and/or ML models in this market sector to provide consultancy and guidance over the next 4 months. I expect that this will be 2-4 hours per month, depending on how the project develops, but this is likely to vary over time depending on project progress.

This is initially not a hands-on role, although depending on progress and your skills I may ask you to do some development.

**Note that there may well be products available that do this, and if this is the case, then please do recommend them.

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with the team to understand the business problem and objectives.
- Propose suitable ML algorithms for multivariable optimization.
- Provide consultancy on how to develop an ML model that considers equipment price and location, transport costs, availability, supplier quality, and customer combinations.
- Incorporate map data and routing algorithms to optimize delivery routes and reduce transportation costs.
- Provide technical expertise and guidance to the team.

title: ChatGPT expert needed - Artificial Intelligence  - Upwork
content:
*READ ENTIRE DESCRIPTION PLEASE*

Seeking an OpenAI/ChatGPT expert to help us make our roleplay app even better.

Our roleplay app conducts a conversation with the human, to train them. For example - we send an initial prompt via the openai API, staying “We are roleplaying. You be a customer at a bank, and i’ll be the teller helping you. Give me objections for why you don’t want to open a checkout account and i’ll try to convince you”.

It works most of the time, but fails other times.

1) Sometimes it just responds with “Ok”. Which leaves the user not understanding what to do to keep going. Oftentimes (and this is desired), it will respond by giving a first objection, so the human can immediately begin responding.

2) We would like it to (at some point - maybe 4 or 5 objections - agree to open the account. But it rarely does, despite all the prompts we have tried telling the AI to do this.

3) Sometimes it goes off track

4) We save all users responses and the AI responses and would like to eventually use that to machine-learn and make a better system, that is more reliable, and can even teach the system how to overcome the humans attempts to sell them (in other words: make the model smarter) but we are not sure how to go about that.

5) We have tried several models, including a trained model - but Chat seems to work the best.

SUMMARY: We are looking for someone to give us ideas that will make our AI app more reliable. It can be coding, logic, etc. We are open to all suggestions to make it better.

title: SPRINT: Twitter API Affiliate Program - ASAP (Code Lovers Only) - Upwork
content:
# Project Description
The primary objective is to develop an affiliate marketing platform catering to Twitter influencers and affiliates. This platform will allow influencers to monetize their follower base through subscriptions and affiliates to earn income by promoting these influencers.

## Essential Concepts

### Twitter API
Twitter API allows developers to interact with Twitter's functionality programmatically, which includes actions such as retrieving tweets, creating new tweets, or tracking followers. In this project, Twitter API will play a pivotal role in obtaining data related to influencers and their followers. Familiarizing yourself with Twitter API documentation and concepts such as rate limiting, authentication, and the different types of endpoints will be crucial.

### Affiliate Marketing
Affiliate marketing is a type of performance-based marketing strategy where an affiliate earns a commission for marketing another person's or company's products. In our scenario, our affiliates will earn a commission for every follower they bring who subscribes to the influencer's content. Understanding the various commission structures, tracking mechanisms, and promotional strategies used in affiliate marketing will be beneficial.

### Stripe API
Stripe provides an extensive suite of APIs that allows businesses to handle online transactions. For our application, Stripe will be used to manage subscription payments, process payments, and distribute the earnings to influencers and affiliates. The ability to set up payment processing, handle payouts, and understand transaction metadata will be vital.

## Milestone 1: Basic Functionality

### User Registration & Account Creation
Develop a secure registration system using best practices for storing sensitive information. This system should incorporate form validation to ensure the integrity of the data. Once registered, users should be directed to their dashboard that displays crucial account information like their balance, total subscribers, and total affiliates.

### Affiliate URL Generation
When a user registers as an affiliate, the system should automatically generate a unique URL for them. This URL will be used to track the subscribers they bring in. Affiliates should be able to access this URL easily from their dashboard.

### Follower Tracking and Data Extraction
Incorporate the Twitter API to track followers. This will require understanding RESTful API principles and OAuth authentication. Also, you might need to employ web scraping techniques if the API does not provide all the necessary data.

### Subscription Verification
Ensure that the system regularly verifies new followers who have been following the influencer for at least 30 days. This process helps authenticate genuine followers and aids in accurate commission calculation.

### Payment Distribution
Design a system that can calculate commissions and disburse payments to affiliates via their Stripe-connected accounts. Implement error handling for cases where a payment fails.

## Milestone 2: Enhanced User Experience

### Analytics Dashboard
Upgrade the dashboard to provide more detailed analytics. Incorporate visual aids like charts and graphs to help users understand their performance better. Display a log of payments made and received for transparency.

### Intuitive User Interface
Improve the platform's user interface by focusing on user-friendly design principles. The design should be intuitive, and users should be able to find what they need quickly. Make sure to test the design with users and incorporate their feedback.

### Subscription Management
Build a feature that allows users to manage their followers' subscriptions, such as pausing, canceling, or renewing subscriptions.

## Milestone 3: Automation and Support

### Automated Support and FAQs
Create a chatbot that can answer common user queries. Additionally, develop an FAQ section that users can refer to for general information or troubleshooting steps. Use machine learning techniques to improve the chatbot's responses over time.

### Email Notifications
Implement a system to automatically send email notifications about significant updates, changes in terms of service, or subscription updates.

## Milestone 4: Advanced Features

### Advanced Analytics and AI Insights
Create a sophisticated analytics system that uses machine learning techniques to provide AI-generated insights. This could involve processing large volumes of data and providing predictions or suggestions to help users optimize their strategy.

## Design Principles
Adopt a modern, minimalist design aesthetic that prioritizes user experience. The platform should be responsive, mobile-friendly, and visually pleasing. Consistency in design elements such as color schemes, fonts, and iconography is crucial.

title: AI - Clothing Detection - Upwork
content:
I need an application that uses deep/machine learning to detect clothing in an image.
Specifically I need to be able to feed an image have it return to me the following:

1. What perspective is this?  The options are:
*  Model Front - this is a photo of the front of a person.
*  Model Back - this is a photo of the back of a person.
*  Model Side - this is a photo of the side of a person.
*  Model 3/4 - this is a photo of a person standing at an angle.
*  Flat Front - this is a photo of the clothing laying flat with the front visible.
*  Flat Back - this is a photo of the clothing laying flat with the back visible.

2. What are the locations on the image of various standard locations?
  * Left Chest - this is the location on the left chest in each of the images which show that location.
  * Right Chest - this is the location on the right chest in each of the images which show that location.
  * Full Front - this is the location of the full front in each of the images which show that location.
  * Yoke - this is the location on the yoke in each of the images which show that location.
  * Full Back - this is the location of the full back in each of the images which show that location.
  * Right Sleeve - this is the location on the right sleeve in each of the images which show that location.
  * Left Sleeve - this is the location on the left sleeve in each of the images which show that location.

When I say "location" what I want are X,Y coordinates of the top left, top right, bottom left, and bottom right.  With this data I should be able to draw a box on the image in each location.

For Model Front, Model Back, Flat Front, and Flat Back perspectives the locations will be rectangles.  For Model Side and Model 3/4 perspectives the locations will need to be slightly skewed to show the correct position of the box.

This will be used for generating images dynamically with logos placed in each of the locations.  The application that places the logo will determine the largest size it can place in the box and will scale the logo (constraining proportions) and center it in the location provided.

The ideal output of this job would be an application that can process any image it is given and return the perspective and location data.

I have a large amount of training data here:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P1TT7-edk9FxOjezN_vCOMjg5KiysLMq/view?usp=sharing

title: Build a prediction program  - Upwork
content:
Business Objects Involved are:
1) Demand: A demand is request of a customer for a vehicle. It requires a demand type (Replacement, Additional Vehicle, New Car), a demand quantity (number of vehicles), a demand class (vehicle class), a
demand type (vehicle model), a demand desired delivery date, a status or so-called demand result, which will end up with values like "Deal", "No Deal", "Postponed" or "No demand". In case a demand has an
opportunity, a demand belongs to only 1 opportunity. In this case a reference to the opportunity is filled (Opportunity Id Attribute).
2) Opportunity: the opportunity is linked to 1 retailer and 1 customer. 1 opportunity can have n-demands. opportunity attributes are OPTY_ID, OPTY_PURCH_DT, OPTY_TARGETED_QTY, OPTY_MODEL_TYPE, OPTY_VARIANT, OPTY_CREATEDATE, OPTY_RESULT, OPTY_PRIMARY_POS_ID, ACC_PRIMARY_POS_ID, RETAILER_ID
3) Quote: each quote has a VENDOR, MANUFACTURER, VEHICLE_MODEL_TYPE, QUANTITY, VEHICLE_CONDITION, NET_PRICE, QUOTE_DEL_DATE, WINNINGQUOTE and DEMAND_ID
4) Customer: it has attributes ACC_TYPE, TEMPERATURE, FLEET_SIZE, LAST_CON_DT, FLEET_STATUS, ACC_BUS_TYPE, ACC_SALES_CHANNEL, INDUSTRY_CODE, POSTAL_CODE

Only 1 Quote can be a winning quote. If the vendor of winning quote is "Own", the DEMAND_RESULT will be a "Deal". If the winning quote has other vendor as "Own" is not OWN Quote, the DEMAND_RESULT will be LOST DEAL. It could be that DEMAND_RESULT is is "Demand Postponed" or "No Demand", in this case there will be sure no winning qoute at all and it could be also no Quote assigned to this DEMAND.

To-do:
o Implement a prediction mechanism within the Deal Prediction Tool to forecast whether a demand will result in a "Deal" or "No Deal."
o Utilize relevant data attributes such as demand type, demand quantity, demand class, demand model, desired delivery date, and customer attributes (e.g., ACC_TYPE, TEMPERATURE, FLEET_SIZE, INDUSTRY_CODE, etc.) to make the prediction.
o Use machine learning or statistical models to analyze historical data and generate predictions based on patterns and trends.
o Provide a confidence level or probability associated with each prediction to indicate the reliability or certainty of the forecast.
o Present the prediction and associated confidence level to users in a clear and easily understandable format.
o Enable users to review and analyze the predicted results to inform decision-making and prioritize efforts accordingly.
o Integrate machine learning algorithms and techniques into the Deal Prediction Tool to enhance the accuracy and reliability of deal predictions.
o Utilize historical demand, opportunity, quote, and customer data to train the machine learning models.
o Select and employ appropriate machine learning algorithms, such as classification or regression models, to predict whether a demand will result in a "Deal" or "No Deal."
o Ensure that the machine learning models are regularly updated and retrained to incorporate new data and improve prediction performance over time.
o Implement a feedback loop mechanism to collect feedback on predicted outcomes and actual outcomes to continuously refine and improve the machine learning models.
o Provide transparency and explainability of the machine learning predictions to build trust and understanding among users.
o Monitor and evaluate the performance of the machine learning models regularly to assess their accuracy and adjust the models as needed.
Collaborate with data scientists or experts in machine learning to design and implement the machine learning integration effectively.
By incorporating machine learning into the Deal Prediction Tool, it can leverage advanced algorithms to analyze patterns, correlations, and historical trends in the data. This integration enables more accurate and data-driven predictions, empowering users to make informed decisions regarding deal opportunities.

title: Deepstream Model Optimization and Meta Data Extraction on NVIDIA GPU - Upwork
content:
Below is the summary of the work scope
- We want working deepstream pipeline that can detect and extract multiple information from 16 CCTV cameras per server under the following conditions.
o GPU: 1x NVIDIA T1000 – 8GB RAM OR A2000 - 12 GB
o FPS: 15 FPS
o No. of Cameras: 16
o Video Quality: HD / 1080p
o Code in C++ with Python binding (optional)
- Parameters (H1) and sub-parameters (H2) to be detected
o Person (H1)
Gender
Age group
Any Accessory with the person (ex. Mask, Mobile Phone)
Colour of clothes being worn
Activity of person (ex. Smoking, Running..etc.)
o Vehicle (H1)
Classification (2-Wheeler, 4-Wheeler, Truck, Bus, Car etc.)
Primary Colour of the vehicle
License Plate Detection of the vehicle
o Objects (H1)
Shape of Object (Round, Square….)
Type of Object (Box, Laptop, Camera..)
o Motion (H1)
Color of Motion (Pixel Change)
Intensity of Motion (Fast, Slow)
To accomplish the above, we would want to work in a milestone-based manner where we do work incrementally with smaller but tangible milestones as mentioned below:
M1 : Detection of H1 tags –Motion, Person and Vehicle with the above mentioned conditions.
M2: Detection of H2 tags for Person
M3: Detection of H2 tags for Vehicle
M4: Detection of H1 and H2 tags for Objects
M5: Detection of H2 tags for Motion

Our Data Scientist, who is a part-time contractor, has developed the model. We welcome your knowledge and input even if we may not be entirely familiar with the entire data engineering spectrum.

Job Responsibilities:

Data Processing: Collect, import, transform, and validate large datasets to optimize data flow into our machine learning model. We hope for your guidance on improving this process.

Data Cleaning: Detect and correct data errors and inconsistencies to improve quality. Your expertise in ensuring the data we feed our model is clean and accurate is critical.

Model Deployment: Deploy the machine learning model into a production environment. This includes efficiency and effectiveness assurance, performance monitoring, and necessary adjustments. If you can help us understand how best to achieve this, we’d appreciate it.

Collaboration: Work in sync with our Data Scientist, who has developed the machine learning model, and the Development team to meet data requirements and integrate the model into our product seamlessly.
