title: Developer (Video-Based Application) - Upwork
content:
Bubble.io Dev for Video-Based Application Integrations and UI Design

BioTrillion’s Product:  A set of machine learning models that have been trained to receive a 10 second video as input and is capable of calculating 5 vital signs for health in time series as output values in csv.  Our technology is called BioEngine4D, and is being developed as an SDK for enterprises to integrate into their own respective apps.  Its an “engine” that lacks a “vehicle” (front end mobile app) to demonstrate its capabilities to potential investors/enterprises who need to evaluate its core capabilities.

Objectives:
• Develop a mobile app to demo video recording, processing, and results of BioEngine4D.
• Create a mobile-friendly UI that provides a seamless and intuitive user experience across the 3 app steps (details below).
• Assist with the setup and configuration of necessary AWS services for video storage and processing.
• Design and implement an aesthetically pleasing UI for the app.
• Advise on best practices for optimizing the performance and responsiveness of the application.
• Troubleshoot and resolve any technical issues or challenges that arise during the development process.


DELIVERABLE:

BioTrillion seeks to offer an intuitive mobile application that can demonstrate our AI technology’s ability to input 1 user video and output 5 vital signs in time series (“results”) – in 3 simple steps:

1. Step 1 - Record Video:
• Screen 1 - Video Recording Interface:
• Description: A user-centric interface that promotes effortless recording of face videos.
• Functionality and UI:
• Video Capture: Allows recording of a high-resolution "Healthy Selfie" face video.
• Dynamic Guide: Oval/Guides appear on-screen to assist the user in face positioning.
• Timer: Displays countdown during the 10-second recording.
• Review/Retake Option: Users can review or redo videos post-recording.
• Interactive Buttons: Start, stop, and retake options.
• Visual Indicators: Too far, not centered, poor motion, poor lighting.

2. Step 2 - Upload/Process:
• Screen 2 - Upload and Processing Interface:
• Description: A transparent UI indicating the progression of video upload and processing.
• Functionality and UI:
• Progress Bar: Represents the status and duration of the upload.
• Notifications: Inform users of upload outcomes and potential issues.
• Processing Animation: Indicates video is being processed.
• Engaging UI while Waiting: Pop-ups or banners for health information.

3. Step 3 - Results/Analytics:
• Screen 3a - Video Playback with Vital Signs Overlay:
• Description: Displays the recorded video with vital sign data overlays.
• Functionality and UI:
• Video Playback: Plays the originally recorded video.
• Dynamic Overlay: Shows the five vital sign values on the video.
• Video Player Interface: Playback controls and timeline.
• Overlay Graphics: Real-time vital sign visualization.
• Screen 3b - Histogram Visualization:
• Description: Graphically compares user's vital signs with broader dataset.
• Functionality and UI:
• Histogram Plot: User’s results relative to others in demographic.
• Interactivity: Users can interact with bars for detailed insights.
• Graph Design: Clear, readable bar representation.
• Interactive Points: Touch-responsive bars or sections.
• Screen 3c - Trend Line Visualization:
• Description: Showcases user's vital sign trends over time.
• Functionality and UI:
• Trend Lines: User’s results relative to self over time
• Zoom & Pan: Allows user interaction with the graph.
• Graph Layout: Line visualization with time axis.
• Interactive Controls: Zoom and pan options.

title: Data Scientist - Upwork
content:
The Data Scientist role requires a highly skilled individual with a strong background in SQL and experience working with Hevo, as well as proficiency in BI tools such as PowerBI, Google Data Studio, or Looker. As a Data Scientist, you will be responsible for leveraging your expertise to analyze and interpret complex data sets, providing valuable insights and driving data-informed decision-making within the organization.

You’d be a great fit if you:
- Possess strong SQL knowledge: A deep understanding of SQL is essential for effectively querying and manipulating large data sets.

Responsibilities
- Data analysis: Apply advanced analytical techniques to explore and analyze complex data sets, identifying trends, patterns, and insights that contribute to business goals.
- Develop predictive models: Utilize statistical and machine learning methods to build predictive models and algorithms that provide valuable insights and support data-driven decision-making.
- Data visualization: Create visually appealing and interactive dashboards using BI tools to effectively communicate data-driven insights to stakeholders. For extra points, let us know your favorite season in the 'Additional Details' section.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams: Work closely with teams such as product management, marketing, and engineering to understand their data needs, provide analytical support, and drive data-related projects.
- Data quality assurance: Ensure the accuracy, completeness, and reliability of data by conducting regular data audits and implementing data validation techniques.

Qualifications
- Minimum degree requirement: A bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related discipline.
- Minimum years of experience required: At least 3 years of experience in data analysis, data science, or a related field.

Bonus point qualifications:
- Experience in data engineering, data warehousing, or ETL processes.
- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R.
- Familiarity with cloud-based data storage and computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure).
- Strong communication and presentation skills to effectively convey complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders.

title: Ghostwriter needed for writing a non fiction book  - Upwork
content:
Our publishing firm specializes in transforming entrepreneurs' book concepts into bestsellers within a mere six months. This is made possible through our comprehensive Done-For-You services, designed specifically for those who may not have the necessary time or literary skills to write a book themselves. Among our unique services, we offer 'angel writing', a more affectionate term for what is commonly known as ghostwriting.

We're currently looking to fill the position of an 'angel writer,' or ghostwriter. This role involves carrying out detailed interviews with our clients for each chapter, grasping their individual ideas, messages, and stories, and then writing the book on their behalf, effectively capturing their unique voices.

We have an exciting client who is keen on publishing a book with us. Here's the fundamental idea of the book for you to review:

Q1. Can you provide a brief overview of your book's idea?
-The basic idea of my book is to explore the potential future of an economy driven by Artificial Intelligence (AI), specifically focusing on AI as digital workers. The book will delve into the implications of AI technology, such as GPT, replacing human jobs and how this could fundamentally reshape our economic systems.

Q2. What's your motivation for writing this book?
-I am at the forefront of a revolution. As the leader of a company that is pioneering the development of GPT technology, I am creating digital workers that are set to redefine the very concept of work. But my vision extends beyond the confines of my company. I see a future where AI doesn't merely replace jobs, but reshapes our entire economy.

I envision a world where AI workers are not just contributors to economic activity, but also participants in our tax systems. This isn't just about technological advancement, but about forging a more equitable and sustainable future.

My book is my beacon to the world, illuminating this path towards a new economic paradigm. It's a call to action for policymakers, business leaders, and individuals to understand and prepare for this impending shift. Through my book, I aim to demystify AI, provoke thoughtful discussion, and inspire a collective effort to navigate this uncharted territory.

In essence, my book is more than just a collection of ideas and predictions. It's a manifesto for the AI revolution, a guide for the journey ahead, and a testament to my belief in the potential of AI to create a better world.

Q3. What advantage or value will a reader gain from your book?
-In my book, you'll embark on a journey to the frontier of the future, where AI isn't just a tool, but a transformative force reshaping our world. You'll dive deep into the heart of AI and GPT technology, unraveling their mysteries and marveling at their potential. As you navigate through the pages, you'll be equipped with the knowledge to not just survive, but thrive in the impending AI revolution. You'll gain an informed perspective, enabling you to join the discourse and shape the conversation about AI. But more than anything, this book is an invitation to dream, to imagine a world where AI and humans coexist, where we harness the power of AI to create a more equitable, prosperous, and sustainable future. This isn't just a book, it's a roadmap to the future, and you're in the driver's seat.

Q4. What style and narrative voice are you envisioning for your book?
-In writing my book, I aim to strike a balance between being informative, engaging, and inspiring to appeal to a broad audience and increase its chances of becoming a bestseller.

Q5. Lastly, what are your expectations from your Angel Writer?
1. Understanding and Passion: The writer must grasp the intricacies of AI and GPT technology, and importantly, share a belief in the transformative promise of AI that the book conveys.
2. Storytelling Skills: They should be able to weave complex concepts into engaging narratives that resonate with a broad audience.
3. Collaboration and Professionalism: I expect a collaborative spirit, openness to feedback, and adherence to deadlines.

In essence, I’m seeking a writer who not only has the skills to articulate the vision of the book but also shares the passion for the potential of AI to reshape our economy and society.

---

Additionally, please share your insights about the book.

Understanding these answers will give you a clearer perspective on our client's vision for their book. We're keen to know why you believe you're the ideal Angel Writer for this project. Please elaborate on this point as it could significantly boost your chances of selection!

Your response will be presented to our clients, allowing them to gauge your book-writing abilities and determine whether they wish to collaborate with you.

Helpful hint: Respond to these inquiries as though you're directly addressing the client. We anticipate building long-term relationships with our Angel Writers.

Best of luck!

title: AI Appointment Setting Model - Upwork
content:

title: Fractional CTO for fintech - Upwork
content:
We seek a highly skilled and experienced Fractional Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to provide strategic guidance and technical leadership to our organization. As a Fractional CTO, you will work closely with our executive team to develop and implement technology strategies that align with our business objectives and drive innovation.

Responsibilities:

1. Technology Strategy and Roadmap: Develop and execute a comprehensive technology strategy that supports the organization's goals and objectives. Identify emerging technologies, trends, and best practices to drive innovation and maintain a competitive edge.

2. Technical Leadership: Provide expert guidance and leadership in technology decision-making. Evaluate and recommend technology solutions, platforms, and architectures to meet business needs and optimize efficiency.

3. Team Management and Development: Oversee and mentor the technology team, including developers, engineers, and other technical professionals. Set clear expectations, provide guidance, and foster a culture of continuous learning and development.

4. IT Infrastructure and Operations: Assess and optimize the organization's IT infrastructure, including networks, systems, security, and cloud infrastructure. Implement best practices for efficient and secure operations.

5. Technology Risk Management: Identify and mitigate technology risks, including cybersecurity threats, data breaches, and compliance issues. Establish robust security protocols and ensure adherence to industry standards and regulations.

6. Innovation and Research: Stay abreast of emerging technologies, industry trends, and market disruptions—lead research and development efforts to explore new opportunities for technology-driven growth.

7. Project Management and Delivery: Oversee technology projects and initiatives from inception to completion. Define project scope, timelines, and deliverables. Monitor progress, identify and address obstacles, and ensure successful project delivery.

8. Collaboration and Stakeholder Management: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, executives, and external partners to align technology initiatives with overall business objectives. Communicate technology strategies, progress, and results to key stakeholders.

title: Experienced Non-Fiction Editor Required for ChatGPT Business Book Outline - Upwork
content:
We are currently seeking a seasoned editor with a strong background in non-fiction, particularly in the fields of technology, AI, and business. The project involves crafting a detailed outline for a book titled "The Complete ChatGPT Handbook For Business & Money: From Novice to Expert".

The final book is anticipated to be between 50,000 and 70,000 words. As such, the outline should be comprehensive, covering all major topics to be addressed in the book, and must include suggested word count lengths for each section.

Our vision for the book is a high-value, practical guide that effectively takes a reader from being a novice to an expert in using ChatGPT in a business and financial context. It's crucial that the outline, and eventually the book, avoid the pitfalls identified in reviews of similar books, including lack of original content, insufficient practical guidance, and failing to live up to reader expectations.

Please see a compilation of the critical reviews of the top 3 books here - https://docs.google.com/document/d/13inVINZwQjWJ-6EdZF9Z507182w4Qttpp0sxMnx91P0/edit

Responsibilities:

- Understand the core concepts of ChatGPT and its applications in business and finance.
- Develop a detailed and structured book outline, ensuring each section contributes to the overarching theme and purpose of the book.
- Assign estimated word counts to each section in alignment with the overall book length.
- Provide guidance on the flow and organization of content to ensure a logical progression from novice to expert.
- Ensure the outline is devoid of fluff and each section is focused on delivering clear, concise, and valuable information to the reader.
- Develop an outline that leads to a book which is useful, practical, and meets readers' high expectations.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as an editor in the non-fiction genre, preferably in the technology and business domain.
- Excellent understanding of book structure and organization.
- Strong research skills to understand the subject matter.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Familiarity with the field of Artificial Intelligence, especially ChatGPT, is a plus.

In your proposal, please include your previous relevant work experience, any familiarity you have with the subject matter, and why you believe you would be a good fit for this project.

We also ask you to provide an initial assessment of how you would address the common criticisms of similar books (e.g., lack of original content, lack of practical guidance, unmet reader expectations, etc.), based on the brief provided above.

We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Data Scientist for Recommendation System - Upwork
content:
Hello,
We're currently in search of a skilled Data Scientist to join our team at an innovative startup in the leisure and hospitality sector. We are developing a unique platform with the mission to transform the way users discover dining and nightlife experiences.

We have a clear roadmap for our recommendation system: we have developed already a content-based filtering system to overcome the cold-start problem. Following this, we aim to develop a machine-learning architecture that will continuously refine our recommendations with a collaborative filtering model and matrix factorization models.

As our user base grows, we intend to use the data collected to improve and refine our recommendation model.

**The Role:**
As a Data Scientist in our team, your responsibilities will include:
-Building a robust collaborative-based recommendation system using metadata and tags to address the cold-start problem.
-Matrix factorization models include Singular Value Decomposition (SVD), Alternating Least Squares (ALS).
-Developing a machine learning architecture capable of learning from user interactions within our application.
-Iteratively improving the recommendation model as we gather more user data.
-Collaborating with our team of dedicated developers to implement and continually refine the recommendation system.

**Final Deliverables:**
-A functioning collaborative-based recommendation system to handle initial user recommendations.
-A machine learning model, designed and trained to refine recommendations based on user interaction data.
-Regular reports and updates on system performance, efficiency, and areas of improvement.
-Documentation detailing the architecture, training, and performance of the machine learning model.

**Qualifications:**
-Deep understanding of various recommendation systems and their implementation.
-Expertise in Machine Learning and its applications in recommender systems.
-DeepLearning
-Familiarity with Natural Language Processing techniques.
-Experience working with early-stage projects and sparse data sets.
-Proficiency in Python and familiarity with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
-Ability to work independently, solve complex problems, and learn swiftly.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Details:
-At least 10 hours per week  

If you are interested in this position and meet the qualifications, please respond to this job post with your resume, portfolio of past projects, and a brief summary of why you'd be the best fit for this role.

title: Open AI for Matching Data - Upwork
content:
We have a database of records. Each record is an item of equipment, with fields such as name, up to 3 categories of equipment types by which to identify an item, and a description of the equipment.
Each record is uniquely identified by a "categoryId".

Our application receives as input a list of equipment items. We want to match each input item to an appropriate categoryId.
In a straightforward case, the input name matches exactly the name field in one of the records.
However, if it fails this check and fails subsequent string-matching techniques, we want to use AI to solve the issue.

We want to pass the unidentified item name and our list of records to an AI process which will match the item to an appropriate categoryId using the categories and description of each record as a guide to justify the selected categoryId.

Current approach:
A python script.
Using openai library.
The openai engine uses the text-davinci-003 model.
For testing we use a hard-coded list of item names.
A POST request to the backend retrieves a list of records.
Due to token restrictions with openai, the record list is transformed into sublists which are small enough to satisfy the token size limits.
For each unidentified equipment item, we pass the item name and each sublist to openai asking it to select an appropriate categoryId and to return the answer in a specified format.
We use the following text prompt:
"""Select a category id from this list of categories,(categories), where this equipment name, (this_input),
                        is best described by the values in each category. Include in your answer the confidence score and reasoning for your choice.
                        In the reasoning part, only use single quotes around the equipment name.
                        None can be a valid answer.
                        Present the answer in json format as follows:
                        (this_output_format)""".format(this_input=input, categories=list, this_output_format=output_format)

specified format:
output_format = (
        "equipment": "",
        "categoryId": "",
        "confidenceScore": "",
        "reasoning": ""
    )

Each call to openai, for each sublist, can produce a result. We store these results in a list.
We split this list into sublists of a token limit acceptable size and recursively call openai with these sublists until we get one result.

This should yield a valid match between the unidentified equipment item and an appropriate categoryId.

The results so far are mixed. See the attached files.
Should we expect openai to be 100% accurate?
Is there a better approach to this problem?

title: Webapp for Object Detection and Tracking, Posture Detection with associated analysis - Upwork
content:
The goal is to develop a standalone application webapp to perform ML inference and analytics on variety of objects behaviours in ideally real-time. The interface should enable uploading of images/videos/webcam/stream and perform inference using pretrained weight linked to aforementioned algorithms. The interface should allow simple interaction by the user including drawing a line and/or rectangle on the processed data to collect further analytics such as counting different objects (classes) passing through the defined line/region in different directions (restricted to 4 directions). Realtime (or near realtime) inference and analytics are important for enhanced user experience. Some applications in mind for this tool are traffic monitoring and driver/pedestrian analysis, Sports for players behaviour analysis using detection, tracking and posture analysis, Ergonomics analysis of operators, animal behaviour analysis for scientific studies, etc.

Object Detection, Tracking, and Analytics using pretrained AI models such as Yolo v5-8, Yolo-NAS, Deepsort, Detectron 2, deeplabcut etc. All these models are available on Github with pretrained weights. Three key AI functionalities I'm after are
1. object detection, tracking and Analysis
2. Posture detection, tracking and Analytics
3. Animal behaviour monitoring and analysis.
The interface should be able to allow basic basic selection of region/area on the input data to collect relevant statistics. The selection could be a line or a rectangular region on the image/video to collect statistics such as number of objects (distinct classes) passed through in either direction, heatmap showing concentration of distinct (selected classes from a list of detected ones) over time, path trajectory of selected classes in different colours to understand the motion behaviour, etc.

There are enough examples of all the requirements above and associated codes on the Github. The interface should seamlessly use different ml models on the same input (image, video, webcam, stream) and produce desired statistics. REQUIREMENTS:

title: Sphinx Developer - Upwork
content:
Deepchecks is a VC-backed startup tackling the huge problem of controlling Machine Learning systems.

AI systems are being adopted by more and more organizations and are taking an increasingly important role in their business. Although many resources are allocated to creating and optimizing the machine learning models, they still lack “common sense” and make various mistakes that may go undetected for long periods of time. We focus on detecting, preventing, and fixing these “AI glitches”, using mathematical concepts and algorithmic research. Our product monitors these systems in production, identifies a wide range of potential problems, and offers different types of alerts and explanations (depending on the type and the severity of the issue).

The startup was founded by two Talpiot graduates / Data Scientists and a leading professor in this field. Following a few months of R&D and initial customer traction, the time has come to expand our extremely talented (and fun!) team. Our offices are in Tel-Aviv, although we’ve recently been working from home most of the time.

title: Data Scientist specialized in healthcare data analytics,. - Upwork
content:
Position Overview
As a  Data Scientist specializing in healthcare data analytics, you will play a crucial role in transforming vast amounts of healthcare data into actionable insights that drive strategic initiatives and improve patient care. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including the executive and software development teams to analyze complex healthcare datasets, develop predictive models, and derive valuable insights that shape our organization’s strategic direction.

Responsibilities
• Lead the design, development, and implementation of advanced statistical and machine learning models to analyze large-scale healthcare datasets.
• Collaborate with internal stakeholders to identify key business questions and formulate data-driven solutions that address critical health challenges.
• Apply expertise in data manipulation, data visualization, and statistical analysis to derive actionable insights from complex healthcare data sets including electronic health records (EHR), clinical trial data, claims data, and patient-generated data.
• Conduct exploratory data analysis and feature engineering to identify patterns, trends, and correlations in healthcare data, with a focus on leveraging time-series physiologic data to predict changes in health requiring clinical intervention.
• Develop and refine algorithms for predictive modeling, risk stratification, disease surveillance, and outcome prediction to support clinical decision-making and enhance patient care.
• Collaborate with data engineers and IT professionals to ensure data quality, integrity, and security throughout data lifecycle.
• Effectively communicate complex analytical concepts and findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders

Qualifications
• Master’s or Ph.D. degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related field with a focus on healthcare data analytics.
• Demonstrated experience working as a data scientist in the healthcare industry with a strong understanding of healthcare data sources, such as EHRs.
• Proficiency in statistical analysis, machine learning, and predictive modeling techniques, such as regression, decision trees, random forests, support vector machines, and neural networks.
• Proficient in programming languages commonly used in data science and experience with SQL for data manipulation and querying.
• Experience with data visualization tools
• Comprehensive understanding of healthcare regulations, privacy laws, and ethical considerations when handling sensitive patient data.
• Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex concepts to technical and non-technical audiences.
• Proven ability to work collaboratively in interdisciplinary teams and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

I will initially need 6 models, with potentially more in the future. Each model will be described and real-life photos provided, to include learning images.

Here is an example of intended usage. The model, named "Rosie", is a model of a 7-year-old girl, dark hair, glasses, etc. There is a second model, named "Michelle", that depicts her sister.

I'd like to prompt stable diffusion to generate a scene where "Rosie" is kneeling at the base of a large pine tree, digging in the dirt and collecting a cigar box from the hole.

Then, I'd like to prompt a scene where "Rosie" and "Michelle" are doing something, and then another scene where "Rosie" is trying a key in a padlock on an old barn door, etc.

Models will include "Mom", "Dad", 4 girls ranging in range of 7, 6, 5, and 2. If possible, education on how to train additional models, including animals (such as the girl's horse) would be appreciated. English is required.

title: Full Stack Developer at MAI Protocol ( decentralized compute of machine learning AI ) - Upwork
content:
**Job Description**:

We are looking for a professional team that can deliver fully functional products from scratch. If you have the skills and experience to meet our requirements, please get in touch with us.

MAI Protocol is a machine learning compute protocol that leverages a decentralized network of nodes that host and run generative models, and coordinates the communication and computation between the user and the network using a software layer called MAI Engine. MAI Protocol allows anyone to create and manage decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) that can request or provide machine learning computation using generative models.

As a full stack developer at MAI Protocol, you will be responsible for:

- Developing and maintaining the MAI web app, which allows users to request or provide machine learning computation using generative models
- Developing and maintaining the MAI Engine, which splits tasks into subtasks, broadcasts them to the MAI Network, aggregates results, and sends them to the user
- Developing and maintaining the MAI Network, which receives subtasks, bids for computation, performs computation, verifies results, and sends rewards
- Collaborating with other developers, researchers, and community members to improve the MAI Protocol and its ecosystem
- Participating in the governance and development of the MAI Protocol using the MAI token
- **Implementing new features and functionalities for the MAI web app, such as user authentication, dashboard, wallet integration, DAO creation and management, task creation and management, bidding and staking system, result verification and quality rating system, etc.**
- **Implementing new features and functionalities for the MAI Engine, such as task splitting and broadcasting algorithm, result aggregation and sending algorithm, task ID generation and verification algorithm, etc.**
- **Implementing new features and functionalities for the MAI Network, such as subtask receiving and bidding algorithm, computation performing and result sending algorithm, result verification and reward sending algorithm, cryptographic proof generation and verification algorithm, etc.**
- **Testing and debugging the MAI Protocol web app, Engine, and Network using various tools and methods**
- **Documenting the code and the architecture of the MAI Protocol web app, Engine, and Network using various tools and methods**
- **Following the best practices and standards of web development, machine learning development, and decentralized computing development**

**Job Requirements**:

- Bachelor's degree or higher in computer science, engineering, mathematics, or related field
- 3+ years of experience in full stack development, preferably in machine learning or blockchain domains
- Proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Web3.js, or other web development frameworks and tools
- Proficient in Python, C++, Rust, TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX, IPFS, libp2p, Ethereum, or other machine learning and decentralized computing frameworks and tools
- Familiar with generative models such as GANs, VAEs, Transformers, etc.
- Familiar with cryptographic proofs such as zk-SNARKs, zk-STARKs, Bulletproofs, etc.
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills
- Self-motivated and eager to learn new technologies and skills
- **Experience with agile development methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban**
- **Experience with version control systems such as Git or SVN**
- **Experience with cloud services such as AWS or Azure**
- **Experience with testing tools such as Jest or Mocha**
- **Experience with documentation tools such as Sphinx or Doxygen**

[Job Summary]

[Developers are required to make a software that allows people to supply compute power to process machine learning data on a marketplace, and earn MAI tokens as rewards. The software will use BSC smart chain and opBNB chain as the underlying blockchain platforms, and will be compatible with Windows, Linux, and macOS. The software will also have a dashboard for admin and users to track rewards and compute power, and will enforce a renting time mechanism to ensure fair payment and cancellation.]

Similar to : https://www.gensyn.ai/
https://www.golem.network/
UI, Marketplace: https://www.nicehash.com/

title: Marketing & Communication freelancer for pharma supplier - Upwork
content:
We are an European startup specialised in computer vision for the health industry. We deliver inspection and traceability solutions to ensure patient safety.

We have identified a critical gap in pharmaceutical production where the use of automated visual inspection solutions for quality control remains limited and outdated.

Our company has already established itself as a trusted partner to leading pharmaceutical companies, providing counting stations that enable precise reconciliation in their production lines.
Building upon this success, we are now focusing its research and development efforts on new product visual inspection stations designed to detect particles suspended in injectable medications and identify other production defects. We operate in the highly regulated market.

Although the pharmaceutical market is very globalised, we focus, for now, on European manufacturers, as we are based in the middle of Europe.


What we are looking for:
We are currently looking for a first customer for our cutting-edge technology in pharmaceutical manufacturing. We want to boost our visibility and professionalise our marketing in order to attract potential customers. We are looking to work on regular bases with some experienced Marketing & Communication freelancer that will help to build a marketing strategy for our new product and will execute it in the form of marketing materials, ads, social media posts, mailing campagnes itc. We are looking for someone who has experience in the pharmaceutical market and could support us on an hourly basis, 20-30% FTE per month, for a longer period of time.


Here are the main challenges that you will be facing :
- Understand the product that we sell and our customers and market point of view;
- Adjust your expertise to startup capabilities selling to big pharma;
- Think out of the box to find the best solution.

Your tasks will be the following:
- Research our competitors and potential clients to highlight properly the USP;
- Create marketing and communication strategy fitted for startup in big pharma environment;
- Contribute to the creation of content for social media, email campaigns, and other marketing initiatives;
- Create promotional materials like fliers, fact sheets and presentations;
- Help with the planning and coordination of events and promotions (external faires and local demonstrations).

Your qualities:
- You have experience in building a strategy in Marketing & Communications;
- Knowledge of the pharmaceutical market is a must. Knowledge of  pharmaceutical manufacturing and Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) is a preferred candidate;
- You want to know more about Machine Learning capabilities in pharmaceutical industry;
- You love to take initiatives and have some freedom;
- You speak English fluently.


Start and duration:
- ASAP
- 6 months with possibility for longer cooperation
- 20-30% FTE per month

title: Build RPA-service with ML & AI - Upwork
content:
Information  for the implementation of the project


Purpose: To reduce the time to set orders, minimize the human resource for the set of orders for customers, automate orders for customers.

Problem: A set of customer orders - up to now, 90% is carried out by the staff of the Service Department. The selection of goods, according to the specifics of working with a client, the definition of a pricing policy takes too much time. With an increase in the number of customers, it was impossible to optimize the process and this forces us to hire more and more employees to select goods for orders, spend time training the assortment, and select the most optimal assortment for each client.

Also, it is necessary to simplify the process of orders for the clients themselves as much as possible, starting with the ability to instantly receive a generated invoice for their order and ending with an automatic offer for the client to place an order for an already selected product by an algorithm.


The main mechanics of the RPA service:

At the input: to develop a universal mechanism for downloading information on the customer's order in any form and file format (.doc, .xls, .txt, .csv, .pdf, .jpg) with the ability to download using the API

In pre-processing: Be able to use additional filters to select “candidates” (products) such as “Do not replace the product”, “Offer a cheap alternative”, “Select based on the history of such customers as: ….”

In post-processing: Have a mechanism for setting up rules for customers, products

At the output: upload data via API in JSON or XML format with the ability to upload them to 1C as a buyer's order

title: Need some tuition on how to revive an old Django project and make improvements to it - Upwork
content:
My Django app has been live for the past 2 years. It uses real estate data and machine learning to produce instant property valuations. I want to make some changes to the site, including:

- setting up the development server properly
- cosmetic cleanup
- adding new features (charts, tables, etc.)
- adding an API
- changing how the site receives data (currently CSV files but should be via an API)

I could do this all myself but I haven't really been coding for a while and I'm very rusty. So I want to have some regular sessions to go through what I'm currently working on and how to overcome problems in a more efficient and effective manner.

Machine learning experience isn't necessary for this role but would be a bonus. The most important thing is that you have a solid understanding of Django, Python, Git, JS, HTML, and CSS.

title: AI GPT chatbot and Make (automation) expert needed for Labour Hire Company - Upwork
content:
We are a labour-hire company that specializes in serving workers in the blue-collar industry, including construction, warehousing, and transport.

We have many areas of our business that have laborious repetitive work that could be improved by an AI chatbot and other automation.

Bookkeeping: Automate the debt recovery, missing timesheets, feedback collecting, invoicing and remittances.

Recruiting: Taking worker leads through the signup process and onboarding process

Ads/Lead Generation: Interact with our leads and reach out to cold leads as well as answer FAQs

Overall Systems Optimization: We are eager to uncover new tools and techniques that can help us optimize our existing systems and processes, with a focus on efficiency, productivity, and scalability.

A significant portion of our operations currently relies on Google Sheets. We require AI solutions that can integrate with this platform for data analysis and reporting purposes. We are open to exploring advanced automation techniques.

Possible solutions (our guess)
- Bot flow for feedback collection for clients + referral requests.
- Bot flow for collecting qualitative feedback from workers + referral request.
- Bot flow to reach new workers (based on referrals)
- Bot flow for engaging with cold leads (LinkedIn)
- Bot flow for engaging with leads who asked for our rates on the website (Email + SMS automation).
- Bot flow for recovering missing timesheets.
- Bot flow for cold emailing leads + nurturing.
- Bot flow for FAQs (workers and clients)
- Bot flow for invoicing and debt collection.
- Bot flow for worker Signup (new workers).
- Bot flow for worker Onboarding (new workers who were selected).
- Bot flow for sending workers to jobs and getting confirmation.
*Bots should collect feedback about their own performance.
- Migrate bookkeeping tables to Airtable and link them to bubble in real-time.
- Improve auto emailing systems to clients
- Improve auto-generation of invoices/remittances to contractor workers.
- Integrate data from Xero and the Bookkeeping system for accurate reporting.

If you are a Chatbot AI specialist and familiar with Make.com, please share your experience, ideas, and the tools you recommend for optimizing our business processes now and in the near future.

We are looking for coaching or brainstorming calls to tackle this matter. Send us a quote.

Thank you.
John

title: ML expert to help design and train a model on ecommerce data - Upwork
content:
Looking for an ML expert with experience in predictive analysis and search algorithms.


Our goal is to reverse engineer an e-commerce search algorithm to identify features that matter for SEO, how much they matter and in what way (how to optimize them). We have already gathered a large dataset of search results and product pages, and designed hundreds of features. We are most of the way through the ETL process and still have some considerable feature engineering work before we can start testing ML models. Despite being in early stages, we hope to find an expert that can understand our strategy and plans and help us avoid any major pitfalls.


We are particularly interested in expert input on:
* Dimensionality reduction methods that will not lessen interpretability;
* The final data formats and schema that will allow us to easily test a variety of ML models;
* Methods to identify and ignore outliers or unrepresentative data; and
* Which ML models to try.


Please answer some of our interview questions to help us get a better understanding of your experience and expertise. Note that we have a detailed project overview that we are happy to send along once we determine you’re a good fit.

title: Chrome extension for dubbing youtube videos on demand - Upwork
content:
Project Description: Chrome Extension for AI-powered YouTube Video Dubbing

We are seeking a skilled and experienced freelancer to develop a powerful Chrome extension that utilizes advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology to automatically dub YouTube videos. The extension aims to provide users with the ability to enjoy videos in their preferred language without compromising on the quality of the dubbing.

Project Scope:
The freelancer will be responsible for developing a Chrome extension that seamlessly integrates into the YouTube interface, providing users with a user-friendly and intuitive experience. The extension should allow users to select their preferred language for dubbing and generate synchronized speech that matches the original video's content and timing.

Key Features:

Language Selection: The extension should enable users to choose their preferred language for dubbing from a wide range of options.
High-quality Dubbing: The AI algorithms integrated into the extension should generate natural and accurate speech, ensuring a seamless viewing experience.
Customization Options: Users should have control over the volume, tone, and pitch of the dubbing to suit their preferences.
Compatibility: The extension should support popular languages to cater to a diverse user base.
Integration: The extension should seamlessly integrate into the YouTube interface, providing a smooth and user-friendly experience.
Required Skills and Experience:

Proficiency in Chrome extension development, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS.
Strong experience in AI and Natural Language Processing (NLP) technologies.
Familiarity with YouTube's API and video streaming platforms.
Ability to develop intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
Timeline and Deliverables:
The project timeline and deliverables will be determined in consultation with the selected freelancer. We expect regular progress updates and adherence to mutually agreed-upon milestones.

Budget:
We have allocated a specific budget for this project, which will be discussed and agreed upon with the selected freelancer based on their expertise and the scope of work.

To Apply:
If you are a talented freelancer with the required skills and experience, please submit a proposal outlining your qualifications, relevant work samples, estimated timeline, and budget expectations. We will review all applications and select the most suitable candidate for this project.

We look forward to receiving your proposals and working together to create a powerful Chrome extension that revolutionizes the way users enjoy YouTube videos through AI-powered dubbing.

title: OpenAI API Expert to Assist in Copywriting Model Creation using "Fine Tuning" feature - Upwork
content:
Calling ML and AI Developers, GPT Experts, Software Engineers who want to Learn, Grow and Develop the next Cutting-Edge AI Tool for Marketing!

In this position you'll have the opportunity to experiment, learn, and see how far we can can really push the limits of AI with Fine Tuning + Auto-GPT... and get paid while doing it!


ABOUT THE JOB:
We operate an e-commerce business that specializes in advertising through 'editorial' style advertisements called "Advertorials" (These are essentially advertisements made written in the format of a news article).

What that means is that we are in a unique position to test and iterate upon an AI model until it drives real revenue and results.

We need the help of an OpenAI API EXPERT to build a small and simple application using the "Fine-tuning" feature on GPT-4 that will write advertorials and be "fine tuned" using a dataset of examples.

- YES! We do have access to the OpenAI GPT-4 API.

TASKS:
1. Quick Consultation: We'll hop on a quick video call where we can discuss the project, get your ideas for how to best implement this, and get clear on objectives.

2. Clearly outline the fastest and most effective way for our framework for advertorials to be implemented into the model.

3. Prepare and upload training data. We currently have 175 initial example articles ready to be complied into datasets for the model to train on and can provide more.

- The model should be built with Auto-GPT to create a self-correcting and improving "feedback loop".

4. Implement the model with a simple UI that can be hosted on our website / server.


REQUIREMENTS:
- MUST be FLUENT in English reading, writing, and speaking.

- MUST have examples of previous FINE-TUNING and AUTO-GPT work completions and results.

- MUST have a FAST turn around time to get the first version of the model completed.

- MUST be an active learner who is wants to be on the cutting-edge of AI.

- MUST include the phrase "Banana" in your application to confirm you read this entire post.

- MUST have a high attention to detail. Include the word "Banana" in your application to confirm you read this entire job post.

- Must be able to get started within 24 hours of being hired.

- MUST have completely RTFM "Read the Freaking Manual" on the GPT-3 / GPT-4 API documentation. We previously received a lot of applicants making claims that are clearly contradictory to the rules which are listed in the API documentation. Don't apply unless you're intimately familiar with the OpenAI API docs.

Ultimately we're looking for someone who wants to not just mark off tasks on a to-do list, but someone who wants to share their ideas, and collaborate with us to create the best model possible.

If that sounds like you, apply now. Looking forward to working with you!

title: Python Developer for Product Attribute Classification Extension - Upwork
content:
I am seeking an experienced Python developer to extend an existing model that recognizes and classifies product attributes based on a dictionary. The model is currently functioning but needs to be extended to accommodate new product attributes and to roll-out to new produt categories/languages.

Our system primarily focuses on parsing and analyzing product descriptions, extracting key information and translating them into classified attributes.

For example, given a description like:

"This hoop earring in gold with blue sapphire and diamonds from our Basics collection is a symbol of timelessness and good taste. Combine it with other earrings to create a super-trendy look!"TOUS Basics hoop earring in 18kt yellow gold with blue sapphires and 0.03 ct H/SI brilliant cut diamond. Thickness: 2 mm. Ø8 mm. Hoop clasp. "

Captured attributes:

'CATEGORY_1': 'Jewelry','CATEGORY_2': ['Earrings'],'CATEGORY_3': ['Hoop'], 'SKU_COLOR': ['Yellow'],'MAIN_MATERIAL': ['Gold'],RAW_METAL': ['Gold'], 'RAW_METAL_PURITY: ['18k'], 'IF_GOLD_VARIATION': ['Yellow'],  'CLASP_TYPE': ['Hoop'],'SIZE_SYSTEM': ['mm'],'PRODUCT_THICKNESS': ['2mm'],'PRODUCT_OUTTER_DIAMETER': ['8mm'],PRODUCT_HAS_GEMSTONES: ['Yes'], 'GEMSTONE_1_MAIN_CATEGORY ': ['Gemstones'], 'GEMSTONE_1_SUB_CATEGORY ': ['Semi-Precious'],  'GEMSTONE_1_CLASSIFICATION ': ['Sapphire'],  'GEMSTONE_1_NAME ': ['Diamonds'],'GEMSTONE_2_MAIN_CATEGORY ': ['Diamonds'], 'GEMSTONE_2_SUB_CATEGORY ': ['Diamonds'],  'GEMSTONE_2_CLASSIFICATION ': ['Diamonds'],  'GEMSTONE_2_NAME ': ['Diamond'],'GEMSTONE_2_CUT': ['Brilliant'],'GEMSTONE_2_WEIGHT ': ['0.03ct'],'GEMSTONE_2_IF_DIAMOND_COLOUR_CLASSIFICATION': ['H'],'GEMSTONE_2_CLARITY': [SI'],PRODUCT_OUTTER_DIAMETER: [8mm']PRODUCT_THICKNESS: ['2mm'], CLASP_TYPE: ['Hoop']


Responsibilities:

1.Understand the existing product attribute classification model.
2.Extend the current model to include new product categories and attributes.
3.Test the model to ensure it correctly classifies new product attributes and categories.
4.Document your changes and additions for future reference and potential further development.

(I am looking for a long term partnership, so we can align on the budget quotation)

title: AI Project Developer for Environmental Tracker - Upwork
content:
Job Description:

We are seeking an experienced AI Project Lead to spearhead the development of an AI application (mainly chatbot) that will serve as a legislation tracker for environmental and climate change. The successful candidate will have a strong AI and machine learning background, focusing on natural language processing and understanding.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Oversee the development of an AI legislation tracker that can accurately answer specific questions about new and old legislation regarding recycling and the Circular Economy from EU, US and UK laws principally, providing suggestions for businesses.
2. Ensure the AI is hosted on AWS infrastructure (used by our existing tech stack)
3. Develop a chat functionality for the AI, enabling it to give follow-up answers to questions.
4. Implement scrapping and summarizing functionality for the AI from government websites with open data + proprietary data provided by the client
5. Evaluate and choose between open source and closed source models, considering factors such as quality of responses, development ease, cost, and data sharing.
6. Work with text-embedding models
7. Use an Open Source model to get vector embeddings of paragraphs and questions and FAISS (or some other vector database) for storing and indexing them.
8. Use Chat Gpt 3.5/4 as a language model for creating chat responses and suggestions.
9. Ensure the AI can accurately quote sources and allow users to verify the validity of the information given.
10. Oversee the project's architecture, including main.py on EC2, openAI API calls and chat sockets, SageMaker Embeddings model, Amazon RDS Messages table postgresql database, and AWS Lambda for scheduled legislation download process.

Key Skills:

1. Strong experience in AI and machine learning, particularly in natural language processing and understanding.
2. Familiarity with open source and closed source models.
3. Experience with text-embedding models.
4. Strong project management skills.
5. Familiarity with AWS services such as EC2, SageMaker, RDS, and Lambda.
6. Experience with vector databases such as FAISS.
7. Knowledge of environmental and climate change legislation is a plus but not required

This is a full-time position (min 40 hours per week) for 8 weeks. You will work with our existing dev team and be expected to join daily stand-ups and weekly reviews, as well as our Slack channels, JIRA and other software used by our tech team. You will be managed by our Product Lead.

title: Writing Machine learning and Data preprocessing book chapters using proper figures  - Upwork
content:
We are seeking a highly skilled and knowledgeable writer to take on the responsibility of writing a book consisting of 10 chapters focused on data preprocessing and machine learning. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data science, with expertise in data preprocessing techniques and practical experience in implementing machine learning algorithms.

Responsibilities:

Research: Conduct thorough research on data preprocessing techniques and machine learning algorithms relevant to each chapter's topic.
Chapter Outlines: Develop detailed outlines for each chapter, ensuring a logical flow of concepts and a clear progression of ideas.
Content Creation: Write high-quality content for each chapter, providing in-depth explanations, practical examples, and relevant figures to aid comprehension.
Data Preprocessing: Demonstrate a comprehensive understanding of data preprocessing techniques, including data cleaning, feature selection, feature engineering, and handling missing data.
Machine Learning Algorithms: Explain various machine learning algorithms used for classification, regression, clustering, and recommendation systems, ensuring a balance between theoretical explanations and practical implementation.
Code Implementation: Provide code snippets or examples in relevant programming languages (e.g., Python, R) to support the implementation of data preprocessing techniques and machine learning algorithms.
Review and Edit: Proofread and edit chapters to ensure clarity, coherence, and consistency in writing style, grammar, and punctuation.
Timely Delivery: Adhere to strict deadlines for each chapter, with a delivery timeframe of 2 weeks per chapter.
Requirements:

Expertise in Data Preprocessing: Strong understanding of data cleaning, feature engineering, dimensionality reduction, and handling missing data.
Proficiency in Machine Learning: Extensive knowledge of various machine learning algorithms, including decision trees, random forests, support vector machines, neural networks, and ensemble methods.
Technical Writing Skills: Exceptional written communication skills with the ability to explain complex concepts in a clear and concise manner.
Research Abilities: Strong research skills to gather relevant information from credible sources and integrate it into the chapters effectively.
Programming Skills: Proficiency in programming languages commonly used in data science, such as Python or R, to provide code examples and implement algorithms.
Attention to Detail: Meticulous approach to ensure accuracy and quality in writing, adhering to formatting and citation guidelines.
Time Management: Ability to meet strict deadlines, deliver high-quality work within the given timeframe for each chapter.
Prior Experience: Previous experience in technical writing, especially in the field of data preprocessing and machine learning, is preferred.
Please note that this job is a remote position, allowing flexibility in working hours and location. However, adherence to deadlines is crucial. Compensation will be discussed individually based on experience and expertise.

If you believe you meet the requirements and possess the necessary skills to excel in this role, please submit your resume, writing samples, and a cover letter outlining your experience in data preprocessing and machine learning.

title: AI Client-Side Real-Time Video Analysis - Upwork
content:
We are looking for an expert in real-time AI video analysis on client devices (not using server-side / cloud services like Rekognition).  If you're a generalist who just added AI to your profile, this isn't for you - we are looking for a freelancer with deep experience in client-side AI video analysis.

We're a software company, working with a video analysis problem.  We are bringing four 1080 video streams from live events into our software as a single 4K 4 way signal.  It will be filming a person - like a Twitch creator or similar.

We want to use AI on the client device (laptop and maybe iPad Pro) to determine which camera the creator is looking at - automatically.  We will then select that video signal as the one to show in the stream.  This will change dynamically as the creator on camera looks at different cameras.

So the goal is to tell which camera the creator is looking at quickly, then use that as the video signal for the stream.  We've looked at this regarding Google Tensor Flow, and various academic papers on eye tracking in webcams.  In this case, our goal is not to track where the eyes are looking on a computer screen, out goal is to recognize which camera the creator is looking at (in real-time).

https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tensorflowjs-object-detection#0

title: Train Google Document AI model and connect to google spreadsheet and database - Upwork
content:
We are seeking an experienced Google Document AI developer to train a model for processing three types of documents: passports, graduation letters, and university certificates. The successful candidate will have a strong understanding of Google Document AI and its capabilities, as well as experience in database management and Google Apps Script.

Project Overview:

The project involves creating a system where:

1. Users can upload the three types of documents to a Google Form.

2. The uploaded documents are processed by Google Document AI.

3. A database is updated with the status of each document (received and approved or not approved), allowing us to request any missing documents from the user.

4. Key information extracted from the documents is stored in the database.

5. The stored information is extracted to a Google Spreadsheet using Google Apps Script.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and train a Google Document AI model to accurately process and extract information from passports, graduation letters, and university certificates.
- Implement a system for users to upload documents via a Google Form.
- Create a database to track the status of each document and store extracted information.
- Develop a Google Apps Script to extract stored information to a
- Google Spreadsheet.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in Google Document AI, including training models.
- Strong knowledge of database management.
- Experience with Google Apps Script.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and meet project deadlines.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates are invited to apply by submitting their resume, a brief cover letter detailing their experience with Google Document AI, and examples of relevant past projects.

We look forward to receiving your application!
please note your hourly rate and also a cost estimate for completing a project like this.

Ongoing project.

title: Hyperparameter Tuning and Performance Metrics for New Classifier/Regressor Suite - Upwork

Wanted: 7/6/2023

C++ quantitative developer, knowledgeable in modern ML/AI techniques, to benchmark new classifier/regressor algorithms for comparison against base case classifier/regressor:

XGBoost
CatBoost
LightGBM
Support Vector Machines
Random Forest
AdaBoost
etc.

    • AWS deployment experience

title: Virtual Assistant / Business Development Junior Associate  - Upwork
content:
Business Development Junior Associate for Lumiere Education

About Lumiere Education:
Lumiere Education is a rapidly growing edtech company focused on making research experiences possible for students around the world. The flagship Lumiere Research Scholar program has students work with a PhD researcher on the development of independent research. Since its founding in mid-2020, over two thousand students from more than 40 countries have applied to work with Lumiere on subjects ranging from machine learning in cancer detection to economic analysis of the Spanish football league, La Liga. Lumiere’s research mentors represent the very pinnacle of their field, including Rhodes Scholars, Stanford PhDs, and researchers whose work has been cited in publications like the Economist and BBC.


About the position:
As a Business Development Junior Associate, you’ll work closely with the business development team and the founders (ex-Harvard, ex-McKinsey) to scale Lumiere’s partnerships globally. Since its founding in mid-2020, the company has grown rapidly, working with hundreds of students. You’ll work with the team to grow Lumiere’s presence around the world, particularly with a focus on new markets.  

This position is best suited for people who are looking to work hard, and hustle to hit goals. The day-to-day work will not be glamorous. But we can promise you that you will learn more than you ever have before, and help us bring research opportunities to students from around the world.

The person leading this would need to have excellent English communication and organizational skills, as you would be expected to communicate with partners and independent educational consultants (IEC).

As a Business Development Junior Associate, you will work directly with Lumiere’s business development team and the directors to:
- Work with the business development team to develop and execute growth strategies for Lumiere and its sister programs
- Complete data entry, scraping, mining, lead generation, &  email gathering related tasks
- Design effective outreach and manage professional communication
When needed, manage a team of lead generation specialists

Qualities we are looking for
- Results orientation and a can do attitude
- Excellent spoken and written English
- Strong organizational skills
- Great attention to detail

Benefits
- Competitive salary
- Individualized mentorship & career coaching from the founders
- Growth opportunities in rapidly scaling start-up
- Network building opportunity with world-class academic and business leaders
- Flexible working hours and 100% remote work
- Unlimited paid time off
- Annual team retreat - this year we’re off the coast of Vietnam!

Location:
Lumiere is a virtual-first company and we are open to candidates being from anywhere., We prefer that team members are located between timezones GMT +2 to GMT +8, since most of our team is in Asia!

Lumiere’s Diversity and Inclusion Statement - Come As You Are
Learning begins with embracing diversity. Lumiere’s vision is to empower students to reach their full potential. We are committed to engaging with diverse disciplines, perspectives, and experiences. Our organisation values your unique voice and everything that it brings to the table. So, come as you are.

As a team of lifelong learners, inclusivity and equity are foundational to the way we educate, operate, and build partnerships with communities and institutions.

content:

title: Commercial Real Estate deal sourcing - Upwork
content:
I want to develop the first version of what I'm calling AAA (Autonomous Acquisitions Agent). AAA scrapes and extracts various commercial real estate listings (and various documents) from multiple brokerage websites. It involves steps like identifying target websites, implementing web scraping, handling authentication, utilizing data extraction tools, processing, and analyzing data, creating Excel spreadsheets with graphs and charts, incorporating additional factors, and enabling continuous monitoring and updates. AAA's goal is to provide a comprehensive solution for extracting, processing, and analyzing real estate data.

I plan to complete the project in two main phases. Phase 1 is focused on sourcing and extracting the data. Phase 2 will be focused on underwriting and using the data to create financial models and filtering tools.

For this first phase, II will provide a list of 10-15 different websites that contain various commercial real estate property listings. Some of these sites require a login to access. The property listing websites are in a variety of formats. Each listing is likely to contain several pdf documents that need to be downloaded. The tool should be built so we can add hundreds of different property listing websites in the future..

For web scraping, I’d prefer to customize some type of third party tool Scrapy, ParseHub, or BeautifulSoup. Pay attention to website-specific scraping rules and any anti-scraping measures, which might require the use of proxies or CAPTCHA solving services.

After we source the various property listings, the data needs to be saved and extracted. I will provide a list of all the different inputs that need to be stored in a database (i want your input on the database we should use). Ultimately this data will flow into some type of financial modeling software. We will be scraping data from different types of commercial real estate documents suh as rent rolls, financial statements, and other property information. I’d prefer we use a third party tool for this process, such as Google's Vision API, Amazon Textract, or Microsoft's Azure Computer Vision API.

We also want to utilize another third party data service, such as Reonomy, to source additional information on each property.

While I’m looking for a developer that can do this entire project, we will structure the project with milestone payments. The first milestone will be a detailed technical scope/ architecture. I’m open to how we structure remaining milestone payments.

After we complete phase 1, I’m interested in working on phase 2, which involves the analysis of these various properties that we’re sourcing.

title: Build AI to classify news entries - Upwork
content:
We have a system that collect news from the internet for a specific topic, these entries are currently processed with the "natural" JS library and are classified into "entries families" for the same "news", as many news outlets report the same news.

We also have some algorithms that tag the entries "Country/es" and "Topics" based on a series of triggers.

This dashboard is currently processed manually, correcting the "topics" and "tags" and "jursidictions" and also re-grouping "news families" in case the algorithm misses some or link unrelated news.

Some entries are "approved" after this process, and other are rejected, based on certain unwritten criteria (i.e. news about celebrities are usually discarded)

Our database currently have about 300,000 approved unique entries (i.e. a family is considered one entry), about 3,000,000 discarded entries.

We receive about 1,000 entries per day.


We would like to see what parts of these processes can be optimized/automated.

Lack of social mindfulness and mental health stigma are amongst major social development challenges of the 21st century. Current status quo:

Most people are scared to talk about or don't have access to mental health providers, and if they do it takes around a month to talk to a mental health specialist and it costs around $300 in the US including provider's consultation and medications.

Help us in our mission to build a mindful society and make mental health and wellness accessible and consistent to everyone. We provide daily tools so our members can thrive. Supporting Wellnite's software development scalability.

  Machine learning experience.

title: Stock Trading Software For Buy Notifications - Upwork
content:

title: Build an AI App to read and extract data from PDFs - Upwork
content:
We are a FinTech start up focused on the commercial real estate sector.  We have launched our first lending products into the market and now seek to expand our offerings.  Please review the outline of the project below and respond with your thoughts as to feasibility and execution.

Overview
The goal of this project is to create an AI-powered app that can extract financial and market data from large PDF documents containing images and unstructured data. The app should be able to read the PDF files and extract the necessary data to populate an Excel file, which will serve as a cash flow model for a commercial real estate property.  All of the extracted data along with supporting due diligence files such as rent rolls and various third party reports will form a database of information from which to train an AI Chat-Bot that will be an expert on the property being sold and the market where it is located.  The Chat Bot will answer prospective buyers' questions about the property and the due diligence materials.

Features
The app should have the following features:

PDF parsing: The app should be able to parse large PDF documents containing images and unstructured data, and extract the necessary text and images to be processed.

Image processing: The app should be able to process images embedded within the PDF documents to extract any relevant information.

Data extraction: The app should be able to extract financial and market data from the text and images within the PDF documents.

Excel integration: The app should be able to populate an Excel file with the extracted data, which will serve as a cash flow model for the property.

Batch processing: The app should support batch processing of multiple PDF documents at once.

Technologies
To build this app, the following technologies may be used but we are open to candidates suggestions:

Python: The app should be built using Python, as it has a large number of libraries for PDF parsing, image processing, and data extraction.

OCR: Optical character recognition (OCR) technology should be used to extract the text from the PDF documents.

PDF parsing libraries: There are several Python libraries available for parsing PDF documents, such as PyPDF2, PDFMiner, and pdfplumber.

Image processing libraries: Python has several libraries available for image processing, such as OpenCV and PIL.

Data extraction libraries: Python has several libraries available for data extraction, such as BeautifulSoup and PyQuery. These libraries can be used to extract financial and market data from the text and images within the PDF documents.

Excel integration libraries: Python has several libraries available for working with Excel files, such as openpyxl and xlrd. These libraries can be used to populate an Excel file with the extracted data.

AWS or GCP: To handle the batch processing of large PDF files, it is recommended to use cloud computing services such as AWS or GCP.

title: TensorFlow Expert - Object Identification on CCTV Live Footage - Upwork
content:
Project Description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced TensorFlow expert to train a model for identifying two specific objects on CCTV live footage: a uniform and a cap. The goal is to develop a robust model capable of accurately detecting these objects in real-time. Additionally, we require the integration of the trained model into the Unity game engine using the ONNX format.

Project Requirements:

Expertise in TensorFlow: The ideal candidate should have a strong background in TensorFlow and deep learning techniques, with hands-on experience in training models for object detection.

Object Identification: The model should be trained to identify and classify two specific objects: a uniform and a cap. It should be able to detect these objects even in challenging conditions, such as varying lighting, occlusions, and different angles.

Real-time Processing: The model should be optimized for real-time processing, as it will be used to analyze CCTV live footage. It should provide quick and accurate results within a reasonable time frame.

Data Format: The output data should be provided in ONNX format, which allows for easier integration with the Unity game engine. Familiarity with ONNX and the ability to generate data in this format is required.

Unity Integration: The freelancer should have experience with integrating machine learning models, specifically ONNX models, into the Unity game engine. The model should be seamlessly integrated into Unity to perform real-time object identification on CCTV live footage within a Unity environment.

Dataset Collection and Preparation: The freelancer will be responsible for collecting and preparing a comprehensive dataset for training the model. The dataset should include a wide variety of images and videos containing the target objects in different scenarios.

Model Training and Evaluation: The freelancer should perform the training and fine-tuning of the model using the collected dataset. It is essential to optimize the model's performance and achieve high accuracy in object identification. Evaluation metrics should be defined and reported.

Documentation and Code Submission: Clear documentation and well-structured code are required. The freelancer should provide detailed instructions on how to reproduce the training process, integrate the model with Unity, and deploy the system. Proper commenting and organization of the codebase are expected.

Collaboration and Communication: The freelancer should be available for regular communication to discuss project updates, clarify requirements, and address any questions or concerns.

Job Description: We are an innovative online multi-vendor retail platform seeking a highly skilled and experienced A.I and Algorithm Integration Specialist to join our team. title: OpenAI GPT API Expert for Building Custom Translation System in Python - Upwork
content:
We are seeking a Python developer to build a translation tool using OpenAI's GPT API. This tool is intended to automate the translation of English documents into Chinese, primarily for internal use within our organization. The main goal is to save time and labor costs associated with manual translation.

Our documents relate to the insurance, finance, and real estate sectors in Hong Kong, with 20-30 documents that range from a few hundred PowerPoint slides to 300-500 page PDFs. Currently, some materials are available only in Chinese, and we want to translate them into English effortlessly.

The Python script should be able to:

Read source documents in both English and Chinese.
Extract and build a glossary of around 500-600 industry-specific terms and their translations.
Translate new text/documents into Chinese using the GPT API, enhancing accuracy and speed.
Incorporate industry-specific terms from the glossary into translations.
Store and interact with the glossary in a database (the exact type of database can be discussed).
Ideally, the script should be user-friendly so that our staff can use it manually to translate terms or paragraphs effortlessly.
In the long run, we're interested in using this tool to automate translations of entire PowerPoint presentations and documents. The tool will be used predominantly for internal purposes and is expected to significantly increase our efficiency in generating bilingual materials.

The database containing the glossary could be either local or online, and we can discuss the most effective option.

We anticipate the project will be completed within one week, with a budget of under $500 USD. The main deliverable is the Python script, but we may require maintenance or updates after the project's completion. This can be discussed further once the project is underway.

This description should give potential freelancers a clear understanding of your project. Make sure to have open communication with your freelancer about your requirements and expectations throughout the project.

title: Advanced Model Optimization in Pytorch  - Upwork
content:
Hello,
I am working on a not for profit research project and the research is independent and thus the budget is low. Nevertheless, here’s my goal:

I am trying to train a 3D CNN with PyTorch on 3D medical imaging data. I have the code written to read the medical imaging file, process it, and convert into a multidimensional tensor to be fed into the model in a batch size of 1. The reason for the small batch size is essentially the model takes too much memory. And here is my main issue I am trying to solve: memory.

I try to run the model on my MacBook Pro M1 Max 64gb of ram and it is not enough ram. So I tried running it on an 80gb ram NVIDIA GPU. Not enough. I don’t exactly understand what is causing my model to use so much memory. I tried all kinds of techniques to reduce the memory and keep the model running on one processor - I changed the data type, I implemented compressed convolutional layers, tried storing my data in 6 bits per value, tried using Huffman coding, etc all these things to reduce memory usage at the cost of more computational time. None worked. I may just be missing something as I am not an expert in PyTorch.

So my latest approach is to run the model and explicitly spread each layer over different GPUs to reduce memory usage. I just want some help optimizing my model to implement memory reduction techniques, getting my model to run, and maybe some suggestions to what techniques are best for working with this type of medical data if you have any suggestions to test out. Credit can be given for contributions.
