title: Generative AI and ML consultant required for content/publishing business - Upwork
content:
We are a book summary company readingraphics.com.  In the last 2-3 years, we have been exploring the use of AI/ML for various parts of the business, with limited success. With the exponential growth in generative AI and other ML capabilities, we’d like to revisit those efforts.

BROAD OBJECTIVES
There are several areas we have been looking at, including:
1. Using AI/ML to replicate, simplify, or enhance our existing business processes or output quality. Examples include:
- Generating book summaries (text). We’ve already tested ChatGPT4, hugging face, etc. The quality if very far from the the details and accuracy we require, so we're only using for reference at this point to supplement human writing.
- Generating the first cut of our book summary infographics (again, our infographics are extremely detailed to capture an entire book and existing AI capabilities seem limited). Still infographics generators come close
- Generating blog, email, social media content etc. using a mix of our existing content + third party content (we’re already doing this but may not be fully leveraging the capabilities, especially the combination of text + graphics).
- Create "content nuggets" (text + graphics) using our own summaries and infographics–this is tied to (2) below

2. Leverage on our existing content (and potentially tap on external content) to create derivative products/services that can generate extra revenue streams and/or improve value to customers. Here are some examples of ideas (generated through chatgpt4) which we think are interesting. The question will be: which ones are the most viable and how can we prototype and test the concept quickly?
- Customized Learning Paths: Use ML to understand the learning needs and preferences of each user. Create a customized learning path that combines summaries from various books..
- Cross-Referenced Summaries: Create a system that can identify related concepts across different book summaries. This will allow users to see different perspectives and ideas about the same topic from various authors.
- Interactive Summaries: Develop an interactive AI tool where users can ask questions and the system would pull relevant information from different book summaries.
- Problem-Solving Guides: Compile a series of book summaries that are focused on solving specific problems or achieving specific goals, like "how to start a new business" or "how to learn faster".
- Personalized Recommendations: Use AI algorithms to understand users' reading habits and preferences, then recommend them relevant summaries. This could be based on their reading history, the ratings they've given to previously read summaries, or their interaction with the content.
- Trend Analysis and Predictive Summaries: Analyze reading trends among your users to anticipate what topics or books they might be interested in the future. Provide them with summaries of upcoming books or trending topics.
- AI-powered Flashcards: Create AI-generated flashcards for each summary to reinforce the key takeaways. These flashcards could adapt to each user's understanding and recall ability, focusing on concepts they struggle with and repeating them at optimal intervals for efficient learning.
- Deep-Dive Summaries: Use AI to create 'deep-dive' sections in your summaries, pulling in extra information on a topic from multiple books, and summarizing it further. This will provide users who want more in-depth knowledge with the extra detail they're looking for.

3. Other forms of web experience personalization and enhancement (ranging from gathering feedback to providing on-demand answers to product recommendations). We tried a few existing vendors (e.g. Pure Clarity and Personyze) a few years back but the solutions weren't that great. Not sure if there are better solutions out there for our business.

4. Identify book categories and keywords for each title to help us with tagging (UX + content management purposes) + SEO.  We started using ChatGPT 4 to develop a first cut, but not sure if there are much better ways to it (e.g. auto-tagging?)

PROJECT SCOPE
Suggest to move in 2 phases
1. Obviously we can’t go into everything above. So we will probably start with a consultancy to lay out the considerations, strategy and approach. Possibly identify a few low-lying fruits that can be achieved easily with our existing content and current AI/ML capabilities. Then map out a prioritized plan of sorts.  [Suggest a budget of $250-500? This is an arbitrary number as we have no idea what’s involved here. Please feel free to counter-propose (but kindly explain what’s included in the scope)]

2. Move into execution, including concept development, prototyping, user feedback etc. We have a really lean team, so ideally the bulk of the process can be handled by AI to keep things manageable. [The budget for this will depend a lot on what’s decided  in (1), we can confirm this later.

title: Advanced Trading Bot Developer - Order Execution, Trade Management, Chart Analysis, Webhooks - Upwork
content:
I am looking for a talented individual or team to bring my trading bot concept to life. The bot should have the ability to chart in TradingView autonomously, utilizing strategies and methods that I have developed. The strategies involve specific time-of-day patterns, formations, and entry criteria.

The bot will be divided into two groups of entries. Group one will follow a particular confirmation process, while group two will have a different approach for trade submissionGroup one and 2 have 3 sub groups. Once the bot identifies a suitable entry in the TradingView chart, it should rapidly submit the order to MetaTrader 4, including buy or sell, stop loss, and take profit levels. It should also be capable of closing trades if they are no longer favorable before entering them.

To facilitate communication, the bot needs to create web hooks, enabling it to send notifications to me via email, text, or an app. The notifications should include information such as the entry point, stop loss, take profit, and the specific method used to enter the trade

An important aspect is the selection criteria for trades, as I focus on specific market points that generate approximately 2 to 3 trades daily. The bot should be programmed to temporarily halt trading after a certain percentage of loss, such as one percent, until the market reopens at 6 PM.

During development, I would like to test each confirmation process every other day on the live market to ensure accurate signaling. Some of the confirmations include Fibonacci retracement tools, break of structures, order blocks, imbalances, and various time frames ranging from 1 second to 2 days.

The bot should be capable of learning and adapting to its existing knowledge, which would fall under the umbrella of reinforcement learning. Regular communication and progress updates are essential to ensure that each component of the bot works harmoniously. I have accompanying videos, a timesheet, and detailed descriptions to assist in the development process.

Furthermore, it is crucial for the bot to seamlessly transition from TradingView to the subsequent software for order submission within seconds or a few minutes before the trade occurs. It should also be able to identify and disregard invalid trades based on a specific criterion I have devised.

In summary, I am seeking an experienced professional or team who can effectively implement my trading bot concept. The ability to integrate TradingView and MetaTrader 4, adhere to strict timing requirements, adapt to reinforcement learning, and provide detailed progress updates are key aspects of this project. I have the necessary resources available to facilitate the development process and ensure the bot aligns with my proven trading methodologies.

title: Text Classification & Prioritization - Upwork
content:
Good day, we have a large set of "social media comments" data that we would like to (1) classify and then (2) prioritize using ML/AI.

The first part of the project would be to classify the comments into buckets.  Currently we want to look for comments that are "questions" and comments that have "purchase intent".  We would also want to find other classifications.

For example:
- Where can I buy your book (purchase intent)
- How do you know how much to take (high quality quesiton)

After the data is classified we would want to "prioritize" the data from "high priority to low priority".  

We're unsure what signals to look for here but we have a few ideas, which include:

- Purchase intent = highest priority
- High quality question = high priority
- Low quality question = medium priority
- Thank you comment = medium/low priority
- Compliment = medium/low priority
- Other = low priority

It's not as simple as looking for a "?" question mark for questions as many comments don't have this indicator so we need a well trained model that can "detect questions".  The same goes for "purchase intent". Then we need to layer in other matters to help tune the model like "length of comment" or "use of emojis" etc, etc.

If you have deep experience in "question detection" or building models that can help priortize content please reach out to us.  Thank you!

title: Develop an AI System for Avatar Animation - Upwork
content:
SEE ATTACHED VIDEO

The task involves developing an AI system capable of generating a video of an AI avatar synchronized with speech. The system should take as input a 20-minute real video with a green screen background, where an actor/actress speaks or performs various movements. The goal is to train the AI model to generate accurate mouth and body movements for the avatar based on the given speech input.

The development process includes several steps. Firstly, a diverse dataset of real videos with green screen backgrounds needs to be collected and preprocessed by removing the green screen and extracting the foreground subjects. The dataset is then annotated with mouth and body key-points, facial expressions, and speech transcripts.

Next, an appropriate AI model architecture, such as GANs or sequence-to-sequence models, is selected for training. The model is trained using the annotated dataset, optimizing for realistic avatar animation generation. A speech recognition system is implemented to convert spoken audio into text, which serves as input for the avatar animation.

The AI model is used to generate the avatar's mouth and body movements based on the given speech input. The generated animations are then rendered by compositing the avatar onto a virtual background or other visual elements. The resulting videos are refined based on user feedback, and the AI model may be iteratively improved through further training and adjustments.

The development plan includes defining the project's scope and requirements, collecting and preprocessing data, selecting the model architecture, training the model, implementing speech-to-text conversion, developing the avatar animation algorithm, rendering the videos, evaluating and refining the system, and finally deploying and maintaining it.

title: Analyzing sound file - Upwork
content:
We are using a Google Nest Video Doorbell to record activity at a door.

Once it triggers activity, it begins to record video and audio.

When we get the video, we separate a video and audio file that represents that situation.

We are trying to identify the sound levels in the audio file.

For example, let’s say that there is a big party at a home.  When the video doorbell sees the activity, it starts to record.  Once I receive the notification as a video file, I extract the audio.

I want to try to figure out a way where I can say that people are making loud sounds.  Yelling, screaming, very loud music.

The microphone on the nest doorbell is not very impressive.  I have attached a sample of an mp3 extracted from a test.  In this example, there is a scream.  I would ideally want to be able to see a range of the sound and create a baseline where we feel the sound is acceptable.  Then, if the file exceeds these limits, it would identify the file as being over the allowed noise levels.

If you look at the two images attached here, there is definitely a spike in the sound that is different than just the average talking part.  This is potentially a trigger and then measuring the length of time that the sound is at such a level would be the ultimate determining factor so that you are not just picking up one loud noise.  You are trying to identify a party of people yelling and screaming.  Or, people being very loud late at night.

2. Create Additional Workflows: Following the local storage resolution, create additional workflows leveraging data from existing ones.

3. Integration with Google Drive: Enable storage of all workflow outputs on Google Drive, promoting data readability, shareability, and team collaboration.

Scope:

4. Error Handling: Proper mechanisms for system recovery and logging of unexpected events, along with detailed logs for troubleshooting.

5. User Interface: An intuitive, user-friendly interface for easy navigation and workflow management.

6. Documentation and Support: Comprehensive documentation on system configuration, integration, and operation, with post-implementation support.

Vendor Qualifications and References:

1. LLM Experience: Vendors need proven experience with Large Language Models, preferably substantiated with case studies or project references.

2. Python Expertise: Intermediate to advanced Python skills, ability to write efficient, scalable, and well-documented code, and experience in Python-based projects.

3. LangChain Knowledge: Practical experience with LangChain services and API calls, ideally demonstrated through project examples.

4. Flowise AI Familiarity (Bonus): Experience with Flowise AI is a plus but not mandatory.

5. Communication & Management: Excellent communication, proven project management skills, ability to meet deadlines, and effectively communicate progress.

6. References: At least three relevant references from past clients or projects.

title: Deep Learning Researcher/Scientist - Alzheimer's Disease Classification - Upwork
content:
Hello,
We are seeking a talented and motivated Deep Learning Researcher/Scientist to join our team and contribute to the development of efficient techniques for Alzheimer's disease classification using clinical data. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge research projects that aim to improve the accuracy and efficiency of Alzheimer's disease diagnosis.

Responsibilities:

- Research, develop, and implement deep learning models and algorithms for Alzheimer's disease classification using clinical data.

- Preprocess and analyze large-scale clinical datasets to ensure data quality and suitability for deep learning analysis.

- Extract relevant features from clinical data using techniques such as PCA, ICA, and wavelet transforms.

- Explore and experiment with various deep learning architectures, including CNNs, RNNs, and their variants, to optimize classification performance.

- Investigate and apply transfer learning techniques to leverage pre-trained models and enhance classification accuracy.

- Implement regularization techniques to prevent overfitting and improve model generalization.

- Evaluate and compare the performance of deep learning models using appropriate evaluation metrics, including accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score, and AUC-ROC.

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, clinicians, and software engineers, to integrate developed algorithms into clinical workflows and applications.

- Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in deep learning and Alzheimer's disease research to identify new opportunities and techniques.

Requirements:

- Master's or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field with a focus on deep learning and machine learning.

- Strong background in deep learning algorithms, architectures, and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).

- Experience in working with clinical data, preferably in the context of Alzheimer's disease or neurodegenerative disorders.

- Proficient in programming languages such as Python and familiarity with data manipulation and analysis libraries (e.g., NumPy, Pandas, scikit-learn).

- Solid understanding of statistical analysis and evaluation techniques for machine learning models.

- Excellent problem-solving and critical-thinking skills, with the ability to think creatively and propose innovative solutions.

- Strong communication skills, with the ability to present complex ideas and findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

- Experience in publishing research papers in relevant conferences or journals is a plus.

Join our team and contribute to the advancement of Alzheimer's disease research by developing efficient deep learning techniques for disease classification. Help us make a difference in the lives of millions affected by Alzheimer's disease through accurate and timely diagnosis.
Regards,

title: iOS AI Health & Productivity App - Upwork
content:
General Requirements:

Platform Compatibility: The application should be developed exclusively for the iOS platform, aligning with Apple's design and usability guidelines to ensure optimal user experience.

User Interface Design: The application should possess a user-centric, intuitive interface that seamlessly facilitates navigation between distinct sections such as Productivity, Meditation, and Health.

Intelligent Personalization: The application should incorporate machine learning algorithms to analyze and adapt to user interactions, personalizing its advice and recommendations for a bespoke experience.

Productivity Coach Segment Requirements:

Dynamic Task Management: The application should include a feature allowing users to input tasks, set deadlines, and denote task completion. Moreover, it should house an intelligent bot capable of suggesting task priorities based on user input and past behavior.

Time Management Module: The application should integrate a time tracking mechanism enabling users to understand and optimize time expenditure. Additionally, the bot should propose viable time management strategies.

Customizable Motivational Prompts: The bot should be programmed to dispatch personalized motivational prompts and reminders according to intervals set by the user.

Meditation Coach Segment Requirements:

Guided Meditations Library: The application should provide an extensive library of guided meditations tailored to diverse situations, and allow users to rate and save their preferred meditations for easy access.

Automated Meditation Reminders: Users should have the capability to schedule regular meditation breaks, with the bot suggesting optimal times based on user patterns.

Daily Mindfulness Education: The bot should distribute daily mindfulness tips and advice, nurturing user knowledge and application of mindfulness practices.

Healthy Coach Segment Requirements:

Nutrition Guidance: The bot should be designed to offer personalized dietary advice, considering user's goals, preferences, and dietary restrictions. The application should integrate a food log feature for efficient diet tracking.

Personalized Exercise Recommendations: The bot should recommend suitable exercises taking into account user's fitness levels and objectives. The application should also incorporate an exercise tracking feature.

Sleep Analysis and Advice: The application should have a sleep tracking feature, coupled with the bot providing sleep advice based on analyzed data.

Hydration Alerts: The bot should send customized reminders for regular water intake, based on intervals determined by the user.

Additional Requirements:

User Accounts: The application should incorporate user accounts to save personal preferences, track progress, and maintain data consistency across multiple devices.

Privacy and Security Compliance: The application should adhere to pertinent privacy and data security regulations, ensuring user data integrity and confidentiality.

Quality Assurance and Testing: Rigorous testing should be conducted for usability issues, bugs, and performance anomalies before release, ensuring a seamless user experience.

Maintenance and Updates: Regular updates should be scheduled for the application, reflecting user feedback and keeping pace with iOS updates and enhancements.

Monetization Strategy: In the first MVP, monetization should be driven via Google AdSense, while ensuring minimal disruption of user experience.

title: Develop Geometry-Matching Algorithms (Need Senior Engineer: Mathematics, Python, ML/Computer Vision) - Upwork
content:
PROJECT SCOPE

Details:
- Create algorithms to automatically determine if 2 geometries share matching shapes. See attached image “Matching geometries example(1, 2).png” for an example of geometries that need to be matched.
- Geometry comes in .dxf CAD files (i.e. “pattern file”) with entities (lines) and vertices. These are actually cutting/sewing template for clothes manufacturing (e.g. jeans, shirts, t-shirts).

Deliverable Requirements:
1. Your algorithm must be able to handle a degree of shape variations. Not all pattern has the exact same geometries. Think of how clothing designs can vary (for example, shirt collars can be different sizes and shapes).

2. Your algorithm must scan through all geometries in a pattern file and determine a match. You cannot isolate only 2 or a few geometries to find a match.

See examples: attached image “Full pattern file example1 & 2.png”

3. Must include scale tolerance, distortion tolerance, rotation invariance, flip invariance, occlusion/(missing vertex/edges) tolerance

See examples:
- Rotation: See attached image “Matching geometry different rotation.png”
- Flipped: See attached image “Matching geometry flipped.png”
- Partial match: See attached image “Matching geometries example 3 4.png" (the right example)

Note:
- We already tried comparing geometries using only gradients (It did not work because they were too many gradient matches, leading to inaccurate results. However, you could try using gradients with other information.

----------------

QUALIFICATIONS

Required experiences:
- Computer vision: image classification, features detection/matching, digital image processing, etc.
- Machine learning: supervised and unsupervised
- Strong Python or NodeJs
- Strong mathematics skills in geometry and algebra.
- Familiar with data in JSON and Tabular format
- Gitlab or github
- Maintained package semver versioning and git repo

Bonus points if you also have these experiences:
- AWS Ops
- Typescript/nodeJS
- Developed utils for CAD/CAM
- Automated testing: functional test, regression test, smoke test, assertion test
- Web app dev (FE/BE), devops
- Other related tools: Docker, Gitlab CI, container/package registry

----------------

EXTRA NOTES

- You’ll be asked to sign an NDA and temporary employment contract. Our company (Six Atomic) was commission to build this algorithm for an enterprise client with strict legal requirements. Therefore, you, as our sub-contractor must first agree to the NDA and standard security legal requirements.
- Our company is looking to hire multiple algorithm engineers full-time, long-term. We can discuss it if you’re interested.

----------------

HOW WE’LL CHOOSE WHO TO WORK WITH

- We will have a technical interview with you to understand your technical skills and problem-solving capabilities. You can also ask any questions in that call.
- We may ask you to complete specific skill certification on HackerRank to prove your skill level (e.g. problem-solving, python)

title: Neural Radiance Field Project - Upwork
content:
A Neural Radiance Field Professional is an expert in the field of computer vision and 3D reconstruction, with a focus on neural radiance fields (NRFs). This role involves developing and implementing cutting-edge techniques to capture and model 3D scenes and objects using neural networks and volumetric representations. The professional collaborates with researchers, engineers, and other stakeholders to create realistic and interactive virtual environments for various applications, such as augmented reality (AR), virtual reality (VR), gaming, and visual effects.

Key Responsibilities:

Research and Development:

Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in neural radiance fields, computer vision, and related fields.
Conduct research to improve the quality and efficiency of NRF-based techniques.
Develop novel algorithms, models, and architectures for capturing, modeling, and rendering 3D scenes and objects using NRFs.
Model Training and Optimization:

Train and optimize neural networks for generating high-quality NRF representations.
Utilize large-scale datasets, such as 3D scans, to train and refine NRF models.
Explore techniques for improving model generalization and robustness.
3D Reconstruction and Scene Modeling:

title: Full stack Development for MVP of a Virtual fitting room - Upwork
content:
a Google Chrome extension designed to enhance the online shopping experience by leveraging machine learning algorithms to provide accurate size recommendations for clothing items. The extension aims to address the common challenge of inconsistent sizing across different brands and ensure customers make informed purchasing decisions. Size Recommendation: Utilize machine learning algorithms to analyze user-provided measurements (such as height, weight, bust, waist, hip) and historical purchasing data to generate personalized size recommendations for specific clothing items.

Integration with E-commerce Platforms: Integrate the extension seamlessly with popular e-commerce platforms, such as Amazon, eBay, and major fashion retailers, to provide size recommendations directly on product pages.

User Feedback System: Implement a user feedback system where users can provide feedback on the accuracy of the size recommendations. This data can be used to continuously improve the machine learning algorithms.

Saved Profiles: Allow users to save their measurements and preferences within the extension for a more personalized and streamlined shopping experience across different websites.

Machine Learning Model Training: Continuously train and update the machine learning models using a large dataset of anonymized user measurements and purchase history, as well as feedback from users.

Privacy and Data Security: Implement strict privacy measures to ensure the confidentiality and security of user data. Adhere to all applicable data protection regulations.

Employ web scraping techniques to gather data from e-commerce websites and build a comprehensive database of clothing sizes.
Implement a user-friendly UI using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the Chrome extension.
Utilize TensorFlow or other machine learning frameworks for training and deploying the size recommendation models.
Employ APIs provided by e-commerce platforms for seamless integration and retrieval of product information.

title: OpenCV Undistort IP Camera Image - Consultation - Upwork
content:
Here is a screen recording + audio explanation of the project.
https://www.loom.com/share/6aae2362df3747adb1c717c1b06204bf?sid=14d55719-1319-4705-8055-49f67dd53c02

==================================================

1. Task:
We need a WAY to find a set of Ks, Ps to undistort a barrel distorted image (attached) from a security ip-camera using OpenCV undistort().
https://docs.opencv.org/4.x/d9/d0c/group__calib3d.html#ga69f2545a8b62a6b0fc2ee060dc30559d

The undistorted image should be straight like in google street view, except vertical perspective.

*. Please pay attention in the attached image to the horizontal curved top row of cars - that we can't make straight (Cam-17.Med.Line.png).

==================================================
*. We use OpenCV undistort() manually because we can't calibrate the camera with a chessboard.

*. But you can suggest an alternative solution - how to convert a pixel from a OUR barrel distorted image to geo coordinate.
==================================================



2. Purpose:
We need to project a pixel (x,y) from a barrel distorted image from a security ip-camera into a geo coordinate (latitude, longitude).
-. Example: Pixel (200, 300) is projected into geo coordinate (36.14588812, -115.24322812) .

For this purpose we need to find the Ks, Ps which undistort the barrel distorted image into a straight image.

The part we don't know how to do is - how to find the set of Ks, Ps - which will make the image straight.

We have (attached) a demo app with C# and C++ source code, that loads our distorted image, and lets user play with the Ks, Ps to see how they affect the image.
You can try that app - to see if you can find the Ks, Ps to make the image straight.

==================================================
*. We use OpenCV undistort() manually because we can't calibrate the camera with a chessboard.

*. But you can suggest an alternative solution - how to convert a pixel from a OUR barrel distorted image to geo coordinate.
==================================================



3. Use-Case Story:
*. The security ip-camera resolution is D1 (720x480).
*. The camera view is perspective, looking at a flat parking lot.
*. The parking lot is usually a big square area of 200 meters by 200 meters.
*. We usually have about 30 cameras to cover the area.
*. The altitude of the coordinate of the detected object is not important and can be considered as zero.
*. The projection needs to take into consideration the barrel distortion of the camera.
*. The accuracy needed is flexible - about 1 square meter, but still - it needs to take into consideration the barrel distortion of the camera.
*. We don't need to provide geo coordinate for points that are too far away from the camera, because that area will be covered by a different camera closer to that area.



4. Additional Details:
*. How to Run the Demo App:
-. You can run the ./GeoCameraUI/bin/Debug/GeoCameraUI.exe on a Windows machine. Or you can open it in Visual Studio and run it from there.
-. If you change and recompile c++ - copy the c++ dll into c# output folder.

*. The environment is Windows 10 64 bit.

*. The camera of the attached image (Cam-17) is Dahua N43AB52.

*. Flexible hours (you can work whenever you want).
*. No rush or pressure.
*. Warm support throughout the project.



5. Attached:
*. GeoCamJ.7z - C# App with source code.
*. Barrel distorted images:
     Cam-17.Med.png
     Cam-17.Med.Line.png
     Cam-17.Large.png

title: Product Demo Video - Upwork

In this visually stunning and informative animation, we showcase the comprehensive features and functionalities of Lawgic, a groundbreaking software designed to revolutionize the legal industry.

The video begins with a sleek and modern introduction, incorporating Lawgic's logo and tagline, setting the tone for the innovative technology that lies ahead. The animation seamlessly transitions into a dynamic visualization of the Lawgic interface, where viewers are introduced to an intuitive and user-friendly platform that empowers legal professionals like never before.

Through vibrant visuals and concise explanations, the video highlights the key components of Lawgic, emphasizing its unique capabilities and benefits. It showcases the platform's advanced search functionality, allowing users to quickly and accurately find relevant legal documents and precedents from a vast database. The animation vividly demonstrates how Lawgic's cutting-edge machine learning algorithms can analyze and interpret complex legal texts, providing valuable insights and recommendations to legal practitioners.

To further engage the audience, the animation includes captivating scenarios that showcase real-world applications of Lawgic. It presents a corporate and in-house counsel facing a challenging case, where Lawgic's advanced analytics and predictive modeling capabilities prove instrumental in developing a winning strategy. Another scenario demonstrates how Lawgic simplifies contract review processes, saving time and reducing human error by automating the identification of potential risks and discrepancies.

Throughout the video, a professional voice-over provides clear and concise explanations, guiding the viewer through Lawgic's features and highlighting its transformative impact on the legal industry. The animation incorporates a lively and engaging background music track, enhancing the overall viewing experience and maintaining the audience's attention.

In the concluding segment, the video reinforces Lawgic's value proposition, summarizing the benefits it offers to corporates and inhouse counsels, including enhanced efficiency, improved accuracy, and the ability to make more informed decisions. It ends with a strong call-to-action, encouraging viewers to explore Lawgic further and take advantage of a new era in legal intelligence.

The Lawgic Product Demo is an animated masterpiece that effectively communicates the power and potential of the Lawgic platform, leaving viewers inspired and eager to harness its capabilities.

title: 30-second video generated with AI - Upwork
content:
Using Artificial intelligence, we are looking for a video producer that can launch several video options for a TV commercial in Spanish with some powerful reasons to stop exploding oil from Yasuni Park. There is a national poll to ask for an answer to this question. YES OR NO. The group that I represent is going for the YES! Let's stop the drilling and oil extraction from this national park.
I am looking for a nature lover, an ecological with a heart, to help stop this. I know it is not a big budget, but I am sure that with AI and the right prompts, you can generate a stunning commercial.
Here are the reasons not to continue extracting from the Yasuni
Es una reserva de biodiversidad y de culturas indígenas que se verían afectadas por la extracción petrolera. El Yasuní tiene una riqueza de animales y plantas que atrae a los turistas y que contribuye al equilibrio ecológico del Ecuador https://www.gsp.edu.ec/yasuni/yasuni.pdf.

•  La explotación petrolera no garantiza el desarrollo económico del país, sino que aumenta la dependencia del Estado de los ingresos petroleros y el gasto público https://www.gsp.edu.ec/yasuni/yasuni.pdf. Además, el proyecto Yasuní-ITT buscaba recibir una compensación económica de la comunidad internacional por mantener el petróleo bajo tierra y evitar la emisión de dióxido de carbono https://www.eldiario.ec/noticias-manabi-ecuador/142749-qu-es-el-proyecto-yasun-itt/.

•  La explotación petrolera en el Yasuní implicaría una violación de los derechos humanos de los pueblos indígenas en aislamiento voluntario, como los tagaeri y los taromenane, que podrían ser desplazados o exterminados por el avance de las actividades extractivas https://www.bbc.com/mundo/noticias/2013/08/130816_ecuador_yasuni_causas_fracaso_lps https://elpais.com/america-futura/2023-05-27/la-larga-lucha-por-salvar-al-yasuni-de-la-explotacion-petrolera.html.

•  La explotación petrolera en el Yasuní también supondría un riesgo ambiental por la posible contaminación del suelo, el agua y el aire por los desechos tóxicos generados por la perforación, el transporte y el refinamiento del crudo https://www.bbc.com/mundo/noticias/2013/08/130816_ecuador_yasuni_causas_fracaso_lps https://polificcion.wordpress.com/2013/08/16/motivos-para-no-explotar-el-itt/.

•  La explotación petrolera en el Yasuní sería una incoherencia política del gobierno ecuatoriano, que se ha proclamado defensor de los derechos de la naturaleza y del buen vivir, y que ha impulsado una Constitución que reconoce esos principios https://www.bbc.com/mundo/noticias/2013/08/130816_ecuador_yasuni_causas_fracaso_lps https://polificcion.wordpress.com/2013/08/16/motivos-para-no-explotar-el-itt/.

title: Pixel Art Character Designer - Upwork
content:
Hi!  I'm Chris and I'm building an online community (and Brand) for people obsessed with AI, which is also going to have it's own presence all over social media (Primarily YouTube & TikTok).   

We're going to start off covering 7 main AI categories.

AI News
AI Trends
AI Jobs
AI Tools
AI Prompts
AI Tutorials
AI Livestreams

For YouTube & TikTok, I'm looking for a talented Pixel Art Character Designer I can work with to design a clever and creative "Pixel Art Character" to be the animated talking spokesperson for each of the 7 categories above.

This Pixel Art Character needs to have a iconic and memorable "Signature Style" that represents Artificial Intelligence in some way that we can then build off of for hundreds of character roles.  

For example...

The AI News videos will have it's own unique character to always be the spokesperson in all the videos for all the topics we cover related to AI News.

When I say a "Signature Style", I'm referring to how:

Funko Pop has a "Signature Style"

CryptoPunks have a "Signature Style"

Pokemon has a "Signature Style"

Minecraft has a "Signature Style"

My favorite "Signature Style" to recommend you study for inspiration would be the CryptoPunks NFT project.  I love the simplicity and minimalism which make the characters  easily recognizable as a small profile avatar across social media.  

I also know for sure that I would like to go with "Half Body" characters, because they will be "Talking Heads" on all of our videos (mostly in vertical format, so half body is perfect and will look much better than a floating head)

Now, we can't have our "Signature Style" just be a robot.  Because I'm going to "eventually" need to have HUNDREDS of Pixel Art Characters for my brand (more on that later, if you're interested in this project).

Hint: We'll get character inspiration from "Funko Fandoms"

And these characters will be "Special Guests" that will appear on random videos along with having their own AI voiceovers to match up with who they are.   Examples of these "Special Guests" would be:

Steve Jobs
Mark Zuckerberg
Sailor Moon
Batman
Deadpool
Harry Potter
Albert Einstein
Taylor Swift
+100's more!

FOR THIS PROJECT:

I just need 7 "Signature Style" Pixel Character Packs for our first 7 categories (see above) that include emotions and poses I can give to an animator to use for animating these characters in the videos (because the videos will have a voiceover track to go with the character).

IF YOU ARE INTERESTED:

I need you to do just 3 things to be considered as a candidate.  If you do not do these 3 things, your proposal will be declined immediately.

Thing #1
Send me what your proposal would be to design the 7 "Signature Style" Pixel Character Packs for our first 7 categories (see above) that include emotions and poses I can give to an animator to use for animating these characters in the videos.

Thing #2
With your proposal, let me know why you are the perfect fit for this job.  Hint: Attaching closely related work you have done related to Pixel Art Character Design will be a big help in being considered!

Thing #3:
With your proposal, let me know if you understand the magnitude of this job for working with me long term to design 100s of Pixel Art Character packs like I mentioned above...  and let me know approximately how long each pack would take to design, and how much each pack would cost.

Thank you and good luck!

Chris

title: Software to Setup AI Stock Notification  - Upwork
content:
Hey guys, I'm looking to set up software that will initiate stock buy alerts via SMS.  Here are the rules. We will do this at an iterative approach, graduating to V2 after V1 is done and V3 after V2 is complete.

Here's a quick Loom with more detail:

https://www.loom.com/share/dfabe8644fba499583f5f430182f3c56?sid=30aa16c8-abea-4bfc-9204-e8e796ed9c56

Here's the raw wireframe link referenced in the Loom:

https://share.balsamiq.com/c/s872oKdCkQy2wmx2FFjjoV.png

V1 -

Implement a neural network and get it access to all of the historical stock market (US market) moves including charts and volume.

Set up a plethora of technical analysis rules & guidelines in order to teach the neural network how to predict future stock market pricing (especially major movements).

Send SMS notifications on buy signals over 3% (no sell signals for now).

Set up frequency cap rules and notification rules based on preferences.


V2 -

Implement the ability to get real time information from the companies financial reports & earnings calls in order to customize future stock analysis and predictions.

V3 -

Implement sentiment rules to take into account news and social media signals in order to customize future stock analysis and predictions.

I am ideally looking for someone who have knowledge and experience developing AI & neural networks. If you have experience with finance & AI you will without a doubt be ahead of other candidates.   

If you do not have experience in AI or finance you will not qualify.

title: Computer Vision Engineer - Upwork
content:
To create a 360 VR video using depth maps and 3D video, the following steps are typically involved:

1. Capture or Generate Depth Maps: Depth maps provide information about the distance of objects from the camera. They can be obtained using specialized depth-sensing cameras or generated through depth estimation algorithms applied to stereo images or other techniques. Each frame of the 3D video is associated with a corresponding depth map.

2. Convert 3D Video to Equirectangular Format: The 3D video is typically captured using a multi-camera setup or generated using computer graphics techniques. It consists of multiple perspectives of the scene. To create a 360 VR video, these perspectives need to be transformed into an equirectangular format, which is a 2D representation of the entire spherical view.

3. Depth Map Projection: The depth maps are projected onto the equirectangular image to provide depth information for each pixel. This can be achieved by warping the depth map to match the corresponding perspective in the equirectangular frame.

4. Depth-Based Rendering: With the depth maps projected onto the equirectangular image, a process called depth-based rendering is performed. This involves rendering the scene from different perspectives based on the depth information to create a coherent 3D representation. The depth information helps determine which objects should appear closer or farther away, providing depth perception to viewers.

5. Stitching and Blending: Once the depth-based rendering is performed, the individual frames of the equirectangular video need to be stitched together seamlessly to form a continuous 360 VR video. Additionally, blending techniques are applied to smooth out any visual artifacts or seams caused by the stitching process.

6. Encoding and Playback: The final 360 VR video is encoded using specific codecs and formats suitable for VR playback. Popular formats include equirectangular projection in MPEG-4 (e.g., .mp4) or VP9 (e.g., .webm) format. The encoded video can then be played back on VR devices or platforms that support 360-degree video playback.

It's important to note that creating a high-quality 360 VR video involves several technical challenges, including accurate depth map estimation, precise depth map projection, seamless stitching, and rendering artifacts minimization. Advanced computer vision and video processing techniques are often employed to achieve the desired results.

title: Data Scientist for Recommendation System - Upwork
content:
Hello,
We're currently in search of a skilled and motivated Data Scientist to join our team at an innovative startup in the leisure and hospitality sector. We are developing a unique platform with the mission to transform the way users discover dining and nightlife experiences.

We have a clear roadmap for our recommendation system: our first step is to design a content-based filtering system to overcome the cold-start problem. Following this, we aim to develop a machine learning architecture that will continuously refine our recommendations.

At the outset, we are focusing on developing a robust system based on metadata/tags and user interactions within our application, as we are at an early stage without an extensive set of user data. As our user base grows, we intend to use the data collected to improve and refine our recommendation model.

**The Role:**
As a Data Scientist in our team, your responsibilities will include:
-Building a robust content-based recommendation system using metadata and tags to address the cold-start problem.
-Developing a machine learning architecture capable of learning from user interactions within our application.
-Iteratively improving the recommendation model as we gather more user data.
-Collaborating with our team of dedicated developers to implement and continually refine the recommendation system.

**Final Deliverables:**
A functioning content-based recommendation system to handle initial user recommendations.
A machine learning model, designed and trained to refine recommendations based on user interaction data.
Regular reports and updates on system performance, efficiency, and areas of improvement.
Documentation detailing the architecture, training, and performance of the machine learning model.

**Qualifications:**
-Deep understanding of various recommendation systems and their implementation.
-Expertise in Machine Learning and its applications in recommender systems.
-Familiarity with Natural Language Processing techniques.
-Experience working with early-stage projects and sparse data sets.
-Proficiency in Python and familiarity with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
-Ability to work independently, solve complex problems, and learn swiftly.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Details:
-At least 10/15 hours per week  

If you are interested in this position and meet the qualifications, please respond to this job post with your resume, portfolio of past projects, and a brief summary of why you'd be the best fit for this role.

Please note that signing a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) will be required prior to the interview.

Job interviews will be conducted via Google Meet.

To show that you have carefully read the entire job posting and paid attention to detail, please include "!CH123" in the title of your application.

Thanks and we look forward to hearing from you!

title: Looking for an Intel OpenVINO Expert - Upwork
content:
Hello! I'm looking for an Intel OpenVINO expert. We have a specific OpenVINO model that needs to be trained. We already have labeled data ready to go for you.

There are two parts to this job:
1. Train the OpenVINO model with our existing labeled dataset.
2. Help us set up inference with the trained model.

For #2, our ideal scenario would be to run inference on a cloud GPU service somewhere. But because OpenVINO needs to be run on Intel hardware, we can't find any cloud GPU services where you can run OpenVINO inference. Running inference using Intel CPUs (for example, Xeon), isn't going to be fast enough to satisfy our needs.

If it's possible to convert the trained OpenVINO model to allow it to run on nVidia GPUs on a cloud service (AWS, Lambda, CoreWeave, etc), that would be the best case scenario.

If it's not possible to run inference on a cloud GPU service, the next best option would be to setup a Windows-based machine to run inference with an Intel Arc A770 GPU or multiple Intel Arc A770 GPUs. We already have a machine assembled for this purpose, so if this is the way we'd have to go, you'd just need to configure it to run OpenVINO inference on the model you trained using the Arc A770.

If all of this makes sense and you have the OpenVINO skills to be able to accomplish the two tasks above, please reply and include "I'm an OpenVINO expert" as the first line of your reply so I know that you've read the entire job description.

Thank you and looking forward to working with you,
-Joe G.

title: Ggplot2 temperature map - Upwork
content:
The idea is to make 3 maps in R with ggplot2.

The idea would be to use a geopkg file for a country (Belgium, for example) that you can find on GADM

Then with a dataframe containing various information like this
time_data [- data.frame(
city = c("Brussels", "Antwerp", "Ghent"),
lat = c(50.8503, 51.2194, 51.0543),
lon = c(4.3517, 4.4024, 3.7174),
temperature = c(15, 16, 17)
)

OR use the out1(1).csv attached file that contains many more data.

I'd like to do 3 maps. Among other things, to perform 3 spatial interpolations of the temperatures.
One by Voronoi, one by Inverse Distance Weighting and one by Kriging

Overall, the idea would be to do something similar to what can be found as in the image in the attached files

However, I would like it to be done using GGPLOT2 and not Tmap.
Ideally, I'd also like the country contours (e.g. Belgium) to be drawn in white with a predefined contour size.

If you believe you can 100% nearly mimic this map. i.e. avoid generating a grid (for IDW and Ordinary Kriging) that is almost visible to the naked eye.

The idea would be to do this for IDW and Ordinary Kriging as well as Voronoi.

Something very nice visually without that "grid" effect.

The temperature scale would have to be "categorised" by degree or half-degree, as they've done on this image.

I'd like to stress that the aim is to create a spatial interpolation that looks almost exactly like the image I sent (img.png) (obviously, the data isn't the same), but I want the same style.

If the presence of a grid effect (in the border of the country) (or between some different temperature thresold curve), i consider that this NOT what i want. So it's very important and mandatory.

Also the computation time need to be not that long (no more than many minutes for each map)  IMPORTANT

Being able to output map in a .svg ou .png. The size of each map file need to be light (no more than many MO per map).

title: Data scientist needed to improve ML predictive model performance for time series classifier  - Upwork
content:
Looking for a machine learning focused data scientist for a short project (2-3 weeks) with highly flexible hours, perfectly suited as a side job for a full-time employee or an experienced student.  

Deliverables:

- Working model or models (if ensembling)
- Well commented and formatted python code for generating models

Desired experience:

- Working with keras / tensorflow in a python (Jupyter/Colab) environment for model development and training
- Building and fine tuning classifier models
- Working with and architecting transformer and CNN models
- Working with times series data

Project details:

I am building a 3-way classifier for a fairly large set of labelled time series data (~1 million total samples).  The dataset is highly imbalanced, there is one strong majority class and two minority classes. Right now I am ensembling a very simple CNN and a transformer model to make predictions. Recall on the minority classes is quite high but precision is relatively low.  I would like to tune the model for optimal performance: much better precision, even if recall goes down, but despite tinkering with model architecture and hyperparameters I have been unable to do so.

I would like to work with someone with more experience in this specific domain who can either improve existing model architecture or suggest changes in the model architecture for significantly better performance.

The project would consist of a kick-off meeting where we can discuss the project details, one interim check-in to see how things are progressing, and then final delivery of the model and code. I am based in the US East (GMT-5) time zone but am open to people from any time zone as most of the work would be asynchronous.

Having access to your own GPU for model training is highly preferred.

title: Python Application Developer - Upwork

Job Description: Python Developer (Full Stack)

We are seeking a skilled Python Developer with experience in both front-end and back-end development, along with proficiency in working with various databases.
We are looking for a skilled Python Developer who not only possesses expertise in Python development but also has a keen interest in team management and training. As a Python Developer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing robust and scalable Python applications. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of developing high-quality Python applications and the ability to work across the full stack.

Responsibilities:

Full Stack Development: Design, develop, and maintain full-stack Python applications, including both front-end and back-end components. Collaborate with the design team to implement user-friendly and responsive interfaces.

Front-end Development: Develop interactive and engaging user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js. Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimize application performance.

Back-end Development: Build efficient and scalable server-side components using Python frameworks such as Django, Flask, or Pyramid. Implement RESTful APIs and integrate with various databases and third-party services.

Database Integration: Work with different databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or Redis to design schemas, write optimized queries, and handle data storage and retrieval efficiently.

Code Optimization and Quality Assurance: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code. Perform code reviews, conduct unit tests, and ensure application stability, security, and performance.

Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and other developers, to understand requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver high-quality solutions. Communicate project status, challenges, and recommendations effectively.

Troubleshooting and Debugging: Identify and resolve software defects and performance issues. Conduct thorough testing and debugging of applications to ensure a smooth user experience.

Continuous Learning: Stay updated with the latest industry trends, frameworks, and tools related to Python development. Proactively learn and apply new technologies to improve the development process and enhance the overall quality of the applications.

Requirements:

Proven experience in Python application development, including front-end and back-end development.
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks for front-end development (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
Proficiency in Python frameworks such as Django, Flask, or Pyramid for back-end development.
Experience working with databases, both relational (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB, Redis).
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
Solid understanding of software development principles, including object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug and troubleshoot complex issues.
Excellent collaboration and communication skills to work effectively in a team environment.
Ability to prioritize tasks and manage time efficiently in a dynamic work environment.
Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus.
A bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field is preferred.
If you are a motivated Python Developer with experience in both front-end and back-end development, along with proven proficiency in building Python applications, we encourage you to apply for this role.

title: AI Enginner / Solutions Architect - Upwork
content:
Seeking Assistance in Automating Radiology Reports and Enhancing Efficiency


We are reaching out to you with a request for your expertise in artificial intelligence and automation.  Skills needed  assist us in streamlining our radiology report generation process.
At radioloygcheck.com we have developed an innovative platform that connects patients, healthcare providers, and radiologists, aiming to provide efficient and accurate radiology services. Currently challenges in creating medical radiology reports, combining them with previously uploaded patient reports, and generating comprehensive summaries using relevant medical information from Uptodate.com.
Our goal is to automate the process of merging patient findings and radiology templates, allowing our radiologists to quickly access the necessary templates directly in their dashboard. Additionally, we would like to integrate ChatGPT to assist in summarizing relevant medical details from Uptodate.com, utilizing our subscription to enhance patient management.
Currently  medical images, such as MRI scans, dictated the findings using speech recognition software, Dragon Nuance Medical. Then manually copy and paste the dictation into a PDF file and search for relevant combined medical data from Uptodate.com. Finally,  use ChatGPT to create a summary report, which currently takes approximately 1-2 hours. Aim to expedite this process to 20-30 minutes or less.
The image/MRI analysis alone currently takes 10 minutes, and we do not require AI assistance in that aspect. Our primary objective is to accelerate the generation of second opinion reports.
We already have a database of 450 radiology templates, which could serve as a foundation for the automation process. With your expertise, we believe we can enhance the efficiency of our platform, significantly reduce report generation time, and improve the overall user experience for our radiologists and patients.
We would appreciate the opportunity to discuss this further and explore potential solutions together. If you are interested and available, we would be more than happy to schedule a call at your convenience.

And here you can find a recent piece of news coverage on it: https://news.sky.com/story/ai-helps-discover-three-drugs-which-could-fight-effects-of-ageing-12902182

title: Developing an AI system architecture for your legal AI system  - Upwork
content:
We are interested in developing a system architecture for a legal AI system that will include the following components:
Database: itilize Langchain's database system hosted on Azure for privacy and security. This database will house all the client's data.
Text Generation and Understanding: The Langchain framework will be utilized with GPT 3.5 turbo and other models, fine-tuned on bespoke datasets for specific tasks.
Application Server: This is where the core application logic will reside. It will interact with the Langchain database and NLP model to provide the necessary functionality. The server will manage the clients' tasks.
Front End: This will be the user interface that your staff interacts with. Langchain's user-friendly web-based interface will be used, enabling users to state their requirements, view the generated documents, and make modifications.

Use cases:
Use case 1: Check classification of a list of items on WIPO
Steps:
Use Langchain’s frontend to accept a search term as input and query the WIPO website.
Use Langchain's text understanding capabilities to analyze the returned data and generate an editable Word/Excel report.
Infrastructure: The Application Server will host the task and perform the search and report generation tasks.
Tools: Langchain's built-in functionalities for web scraping, data analysis, and report generation will be utilized.
Use case 2: Review search results and provide an initial analysis
Steps:
Accept a search term as input via Langchain's frontend and query the relevant databases.
Review the search results using Langchain's text understanding capabilities to perform an initial analysis.
Generate a Word report based on the analysis using Langchain's capabilities.
Infrastructure: The Application Server will run the search, analysis, and report generation tasks.
Tools: Langchain's built-in functionalities for data analysis and report generation will be utilized.
Provide examples for similar work you did in the past and give us a rough estimate for the hours needed to accomplish the architecture and each one of the use-cases

title: Ai Specialist - Upwork
content:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced AI Specialist to join our team and contribute to the development and implementation of artificial intelligence (AI) solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

Research and Development: Conduct extensive research on AI technologies, algorithms, and methodologies to identify potential applications and innovative solutions for the organization. Stay up to date with the latest advancements and trends in AI to ensure the organization remains at the forefront of AI development.

Solution Design: Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and design AI solutions that address specific needs. Develop and implement machine learning models, deep learning networks, and other AI algorithms to solve complex problems.

Data Analysis and Preprocessing: Analyze and preprocess large datasets to extract relevant features and create clean, high-quality data for AI model training. Implement data augmentation and cleansing techniques to improve model performance.

Model Development and Training: Design, develop, and train AI models using machine learning frameworks and tools. Apply various techniques such as supervised learning, unsupervised learning, reinforcement learning, and transfer learning to achieve optimal model performance and accuracy.

Model Evaluation and Optimization: Evaluate and validate AI models using appropriate metrics and statistical analysis. Optimize and fine-tune models to improve accuracy, speed, and efficiency. Implement techniques such as regularization, ensemble methods, and hyperparameter tuning.

Deployment and Integration: Collaborate with software engineers and IT teams to integrate AI models into existing systems or develop new applications. Ensure smooth deployment and efficient integration of AI solutions, while considering scalability, reliability, and security.

Documentation and Reporting: Document all stages of AI development, including data preprocessing, model architecture, training process, and evaluation results. Prepare comprehensive reports and presentations to communicate findings, insights, and recommendations to stakeholders.

Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and business stakeholders, to align AI initiatives with organizational goals. Share knowledge and best practices with team members, contribute to continuous learning, and foster a culture of innovation.




Qualifications and Skills:

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field. A Ph.D. in a relevant discipline is a plus.
Strong expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and statistical modeling techniques.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java, and experience with popular AI libraries and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
Solid understanding of data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data augmentation techniques.
Experience with big data technologies and distributed computing frameworks (e.g., Hadoop, Spark) is desirable.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and their AI services is a plus.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and creatively to tackle complex challenges.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality results.
Continuous learning mindset and a passion for staying up to date with the latest AI advancements and trends.

title: Expert Developer for Live Foot Measurement Tool using TensorFlow.js and Web AR - Upwork
content:
1. Overview: We're on the lookout for a top-notch developer who's a whiz with TensorFlow.js and Web AR.

2. Current System: Right now, we have a foot measuring system built with Python. It uses photos sent by users to figure out the size of their feet. Then, it sends back the picture with lines showing the length and width of their feet. But there's a catch - it's not as accurate as we want it to be.

3. Goal: We want to take our tool to the next level. You know those fancy apps that let you use your phone's camera to size up furniture live? We're aiming to make our foot measurement tool work like that using TensorFlow.js and Web AR. We're confident this live, real-time measurement will make our tool a lot more precise. It's especially important for getting the length from the toe to the heel and the width of the foot just right.

4. Task: Here's where you come in. We need a tech wizard who can fuse our Python-based model with TensorFlow.js and Web AR. The challenge? To create an online tool that measures foot sizes live with excellent accuracy and ease of use.

5. Experience: If you've done something similar before, we'd love to hear about it! But we only want to hear from you if you're up to the task. So, if you think you've got what it takes to pull this off, get in touch! Let's make foot measurement a breeze together.

title: AI-Powered Note Generation Platform for Medical Students - Upwork
content:
APPLY!!! ZOOM MEETING'S WILL BE HELD FOR AVAILABLE OPPORTUNITIES (potential full-time position depending on commitment)


We are seeking talented and experienced professionals to join our team and contribute to the development of Notely, an innovative AI-powered note generation platform tailored for medical students and later on for all tertiary education type of students. The goal of this project is to create a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) that delivers key features and functionalities to revolutionise the learning experience for medical students.

Notely "Unique Learning Model":
Notely employs a unique learning model that sets it apart from traditional note-taking platforms. Our platform combines artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms, personalized study techniques, and a comprehensive knowledge database to deliver a truly transformative learning experience for students.

[AI NOTE GENERATION]
Notely utilizes advanced AI algorithms to analyze lecture recordings, video content, and PDF materials uploaded by students. Through machine learning, the platform automatically transcribes and extracts key concepts, generating comprehensive and well-structured notes. This AI-powered note generation eliminates the need for manual transcription and streamlines the note-taking process. Additionally, Notely incorporates the use of renowned study techniques like the Feynman Technique and Leitner System to enhance the note generation process. These techniques help students simplify complex topics and reinforce their understanding through active recall and spaced repetition.

[Personalised Study Techniques]
We understand that medical students have different learning preferences and needs. Notely will offer personalised study techniques tailored to individual subjects and learning styles. By leveraging techniques like the Feynman Technique, students can break down complex medical concepts into simple explanations, promoting a deeper understanding. The Leitner System, on the other hand, facilitates spaced repetition, ensuring optimal knowledge retention over time. Notely adapts these techniques based on each student's preferences, enabling them to study in a way that suits their unique learning style.

[Integration with Comprehensive Knowledge Database]
Notely goes beyond note generation by integrating a comprehensive knowledge database that encompasses textbooks, research articles, diagrams, and relevant images specific to medical subjects. This integration allows Notely to expand on the personalized notes generated for each student. By linking the generated notes with additional information from the knowledge database, Notely provides students with a holistic understanding of the topics covered. This integration enhances comprehension, supports independent exploration, and encourages a deeper engagement with the subject matter.

[Personalised Notes]
Notely takes into account each student's individual work and progress to generate personalized notes. By analyzing the student's uploaded lecture recordings, video content, and other materials, Notely tailors the generated notes to match the student's specific learning needs. The integration with the general database further enriches the notes, providing additional insights and expanding on the topics covered. This personalized approach ensures that students receive notes that are highly relevant to their coursework and tailored to their individual learning journey.

MVP Team requirement (only for medical students):

AI Development:
We are looking for an AI developer with expertise in natural language processing and machine learning algorithms. The developer will be responsible for implementing the AI algorithms to transcribe lecture recordings, generate initial notes, and personalize study techniques based on medical subjects.

Full Stack Web Development (front-end):
We require a skilled full stack web developer to create the platform's user interface, registration/authentication system, and note management functionalities. Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and web development frameworks is essential.

UX/UI Design:
We need a talented UX/UI designer who can create a visually appealing and user-friendly interface for Notely. The designer should have experience in designing educational platforms and a keen eye for intuitive user experiences.

Backend Development (back-end development) :
An experienced backend developer is required to handle the server-side development, database integration, and API implementation. Proficiency in backend technologies such as Python, Django, and database management is crucial.

title: AI consultant - Upwork
content:
ABOUT JOOLCA
Joolca is a fast-growing e-commerce startup founded by engineering student Maciek Slodyczka. Our small Melbourne-based company centres on a single idea: what if people could enjoy indoor comforts outdoors – no matter where they are?

Our flagship product, the HOTTAP, is the world’s most compact, simple-to-use, portable water heater and has attracted tens of thousands of enthusiastic customers. In the past seven years, we have gone from concept to selling in Australia, New Zealand, USA, UK, and Canada.

To continue that growth, we recognise the incredible rate of impact that AI tools are having across the business landscape, thus we are now seeking a highly skilled and experienced AI consultant to work with our business and help drive its growth and efficiency. As our AI consultant, you will play a pivotal role in leveraging artificial intelligence to optimize our operations, marketing strategies, customer service, and overall business performance. This is an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact and shape the future success of Joolca!

Responsibilities:

- Conduct an analysis of our current operations, marketing efforts, and customer service processes to identify areas of improvement.
- Develop and implement tailored AI strategies and solutions to enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and drive business growth.
- Utilize AI tools to automate operational processes, such as inventory management, supply chain optimization, and logistics where possible.
Collaborate with our marketing team to leverage AI algorithms for data analysis, consumer behavior prediction, and targeted marketing campaigns.
Implement AI-powered customer service solutions such as sentiment analysis to improve the overall customer experience.
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and identify new opportunities for innovation within our business.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as an AI consultant or similar role, with a track record of successfully implementing AI solutions for ecommerce businesses.
- In-depth knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data analysis techniques.
- Strong understanding of ecommerce operations, marketing strategies, and customer service processes.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to translate business requirements into AI-driven solutions.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
- A portfolio or examples showcasing your previous AI consulting projects and their outcomes would be a plus.

Please send your expression of interest and if interested we will reach out to you.

Thanks and good luck!
Marc

We are seeking a skilled and experienced freelancer to develop an AI chatbot with avatar integration for our company. The objective of this project is to create an interactive and engaging chatbot that can intelligently communicate with users through a visually appealing avatar interface. The chatbot needs to be multi-purpose - we need to be able to use it over and over again for multiple different people/personalities.

Key Requirements:

AI Chatbot Functionality: The chatbot should be capable of understanding and responding to user queries, providing relevant information, and engaging in natural and meaningful conversations.

Avatar Integration: The chatbot should be designed with an appealing and customizable avatar that can visually represent the bot's responses and expressions. Furthermore, it must be able to clone to the voice of the person we are using the bot for.

Natural Language Processing (NLP): The chatbot should incorporate NLP techniques to understand user inputs, perform sentiment analysis, and generate contextually appropriate responses.

Integration Capabilities: The chatbot should be easily integrated into our existing platforms and systems, allowing seamless communication with users across multiple channels (e.g., website, messaging apps).

Admin Dashboard: A user-friendly admin dashboard should be developed to manage and monitor the chatbot's performance, review conversation logs, and make any necessary adjustments.


Preferred Qualifications:

- Proven experience in developing AI chatbots with avatar integration.
- Proficiency in programming languages and frameworks commonly used for chatbot development (e.g., Python, Node.js, Dialogflow, Microsoft Bot Framework).
- Familiarity with NLP techniques and tools, such as natural language understanding, sentiment analysis, and entity recognition.
- Strong knowledge of web development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) for creating visually appealing avatar interfaces.
- Experience with integrating chatbots into various platforms and messaging channels.


Timeline and Deliverables:

- The project is expected to be completed within 6 weeks from the start date.
- The deliverables will include a fully functional AI chatbot integrated with an avatar interface, along with the necessary documentation and instructions for future maintenance and updates. The chatbot will be such that we are able to multiply it ourselves for numerous people/personalities.


If you are interested in this project, please provide examples of relevant work and a detailed proposal outlining your approach, timeline, and cost estimate. Please write "chatbots!" in your response so we know you read this. We are looking for a freelancer who can demonstrate their expertise in AI chatbot development and create a high-quality solution that aligns with our requirements.

EXTREMELY IMPORTANT, SO PLEASE READ
-------------------------------------------------------
You must have formal / professional investment research, stock market experience, equity research and/or financial analysis and valuation experience.  Please do not respond to this job unless you have this prior experience as the articles are related to China A-Share stocks.

So, do not try to cut corners and use an ML approach.

title: Astrophysics Project - Upwork
content:
We are seeking a highly skilled freelancer to join our team for an exciting astrophysics project focused on analyzing data from the Apollo cluster using advanced Python techniques. This project offers a unique opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge research and gain valuable insights into the properties and behavior of astrophysical phenomena within the Apollo cluster.

Project Overview:
The project involves analyzing observational data obtained from the Apollo cluster, a region in space known for its rich collection of astronomical objects and phenomena. The freelancer will utilize Python programming skills and advanced astrophysical techniques to study the composition, dynamics, and interactions of celestial bodies within the cluster.

Requirements:

Expert-level proficiency in Python programming: The freelancer should possess advanced knowledge of Python, including experience with scientific computing libraries such as NumPy, SciPy, and Pandas. Strong programming skills are essential for data manipulation, statistical analysis, and visualization.
Astrophysical background: A solid understanding of astrophysics and familiarity with the properties and behavior of astronomical objects, such as galaxies, stars, and interstellar medium, is crucial. Experience with astrophysical data analysis techniques and familiarity with concepts such as redshift, stellar populations, and galaxy clustering will be highly advantageous.
Data analysis skills: The freelancer should be adept at working with large datasets and possess experience in data preprocessing, cleaning, and feature extraction. Proficiency in statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, and data visualization techniques is required.
Knowledge of Apollo cluster data: Familiarity with observational data from the Apollo cluster or similar astronomical datasets will be beneficial. The freelancer should be capable of working with diverse data types, including photometric, spectroscopic, and imaging data, to extract meaningful insights.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities: The freelancer should have a strong analytical mindset and the ability to derive scientific conclusions from complex datasets. Experience in applying machine learning algorithms or other advanced analytical techniques to astrophysical data will be a plus.
Effective communication and collaboration: The freelancer will collaborate with our team of astrophysicists and researchers. Strong communication skills, the ability to present findings clearly, and a collaborative approach to problem-solving are essential.
Project Deliverables:

Data preprocessing and cleaning of Apollo cluster dataset
Statistical analysis and visualization of cluster properties
Identification and characterization of astrophysical objects within the cluster
Insights and conclusions regarding the dynamics and interactions of celestial bodies in the Apollo cluster
If you are passionate about astrophysics, possess advanced Python skills, and have a keen interest in analyzing astronomical datasets, we invite you to join our team. Please provide a detailed proposal outlining your experience, relevant skills, and approach to tackling this project. Kindly include any relevant past work or publications in the field of astrophysics.

This project is open to freelancers worldwide, and remote work arrangements are acceptable. We look forward to collaborating with a talented freelancer who shares our enthusiasm for unraveling the mysteries of the Apollo cluster and advancing our understanding of astrophysical phenomena.
