title: AI-Driven React and NodeJS Developer Required for Innovative Legal Document Management Application - Upwork
content:
Hello, talented developers! We are a software development firm, we have many projects in the pipeline as our company has high interest from a fast-growing client base. As a member of our team, you'll have access to many exciting opportunities to expand your skills and make a real impact on the industry.

We are looking for a talented and proficient React and NodeJS developer with a strong background in AI technology to join our team. Our application aims to resemble Cligal, incorporating a range of essential features to streamline the document management process. Some of the key functionalities include PDF merge, PDF division, PDF lock signing, automatic form filling, sensitive information deletion, and chat capabilities. We also plan to incorporate an admin panel for basic configuration and user maintenance. Additionally, the application will support three languages: English, Hebrew, and Spanish.

Development Plan:

Here's a brief overview of the tasks involved:

1. AI-Powered Chatbot Development: You will be responsible for implementing the AI chatbot functionality, fine-tuning its design, and ensuring seamless interaction with documents.

2. Document Upload and Analysis: Develop the ability for users to upload legal documents in various formats (e.g., PDF, Word) and create algorithms to analyze, extract information, summarize, and identify potential legal concerns.

3. Document Generation and Customization: Enable users to upload agreements and automate the process of populating them. Create templates for common legal agreements that can be customized based on user input, and design workflows for generating custom agreements when templates are unavailable.

4. Confidentiality Measures: Integrate functionality to temporarily remove confidential information from documents before sharing them with external services, ensuring sensitive information remains secure.

5. Legal Communication and Document Review: Implement a system for users to engage in legal discussions with the chatbot, upload documents, and receive insights or recommendations.

6. Follow-Up Task Suggestions: Develop features that suggest relevant follow-up tasks to users, including summarizing agreements, drafting related emails, and providing pre-defined suggestions for next steps.

7. PDF Management Features: Implement essential PDF management features, such as merging, division, file locking, automatic form filling, and file size reduction. If feasible, incorporate the ability to remove sensitive information and obfuscate text in PDF documents.

8. Admin Panel: Create an intuitive admin panel that allows for easy configuration and user management.

9. Multi-Language Support: Incorporate multi-language support by utilizing Google Translate for seamless translation between English, Hebrew, and Spanish.

Deliverables:

We expect the following deliverables upon the completion of the project:

- Fully operational AI chatbot application, complete with front-end and back-end designs.
- Confidentiality features and document analysis functions.
- Document creation and customization capabilities.
- Legal communication and document review systems.
- Follow-up task suggestions.
- PDF management features and an admin panel.
- Multi-language support.

If you are an experienced developer with a passion for cutting-edge technology and an eagerness to be part of an exciting project, we would love to hear from you.

We look forward to reviewing your applications and working together to create a game-changing AI application for the legal industry.

- Design, develop, and implement automated solutions and workflows to streamline real estate acquisition processes and improve operational efficiency.

- Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to automation processes, ensuring minimal disruption to daily operations.
- Train and support end-users in understanding and effectively utilizing automated workflows.
- Continuously monitor and evaluate automated processes, identifying areas for improvement and optimization.

- Stay updated with emerging trends, best practices, and technologies in automation and workflow management within the real estate acquisition industry.

Example of Work to be Performed:
As a High-level Automation and Workflow Specialist, you may work on various projects, such as:
- Developing an automated lead generation and qualification process, leveraging data analytics and artificial intelligence to identify potential real estate acquisitions.
- Designing and implementing a streamlined due diligence workflow, integrating various data sources and automating the analysis and documentation processes.
- Creating an automated financial analysis system that accurately assesses the profitability of potential acquisitions based on predefined criteria and industry benchmarks.
- Establishing a centralized document management system that automates the organization, storage, and retrieval of legal contracts, property deeds, and other critical acquisition documents.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in computer science, engineering, business, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
- Proven experience in designing and implementing automation solutions and workflows within the real estate acquisition industry.
- Strong knowledge of workflow management systems, automation tools, and scripting languages relevant to real estate operations.
- Familiarity with real estate acquisition processes, including lead generation, due diligence, financial analysis, and legal documentation.
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail.
- Exceptional communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively convey complex concepts to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
- Strong project management and organizational skills, with the ability to handle multiple priorities and meet deadlines.

Join our team and contribute to the growth and success of our real estate acquisition company. Apply now to embark on an exciting journey as a High-level Real Estate Acquisition Company Automation and Workflow Specialist!

title: Data Scientist with Clustering Expertise Needed for MLB Player Classification - Upwork
content:
We are seeking a skilled Data Scientist with a strong understanding of machine learning techniques, particularly clustering analysis.  This project aims to apply clustering techniques to categorize MLB players into similar groups based on playing style and to develop an updatable model.

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

1. Data Selection: Selecting relevant MLB player performance data to utilize for this analysis from publicly available data. At project onset, a discussion will be had about what data we currently have available, and a determination will be made if additional data would benefit the model.

2. Feature Selection: Choosing features that will help categorize players, while explaining the rationale behind these choices

3. Clustering Analysis: Implementing an appropriate clustering technique to categorize players, explaining the choice of method, and establishing how the optimal number of clusters is determined.

4. Model Development: Developing the model so it can be easily updated as new data becomes available. The candidate should provide clear instructions for how to update the data and rerun the model for future use. Proficiency in R is a plus, but candidates proficient in other languages or tools, such as python will also be considered.

5. Sample Size: Develop an approach on how best to handle new players, or those with small sample sizes

6. Reporting and Communication: The candidate should have the ability to clearly communicate methods, results, and the reasoning behind decisions. Openness to feedback and willingness to iterate on models as the project evolves is crucial.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data science, including experience with machine learning, statistics, and clustering algorithms.  General knowledge or familiarity with the MLB is a plus but not necessary.

This project is not only about creating a model but also deriving actionable insights that can be used to improve prediction performance. Therefore, the ability to translate complex data into understandable and actionable insights is crucial.

Additional Opportunities:

This project is one of many similar projects in our pipeline. We are interested in finding a candidate with whom we can build a long-term working relationship. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Barbell movement classification using ML - Upwork
content:
Create an infrastructure to train models to detect different Crossfit movements as well as the ‘quality’ of the movement from different angles.
In order to validate the Proof of Concept, a model should be developed to classify between two movements “Barbell Snatch” and “Barbell clean and Jerk”.

Barbell Snatch:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9xQp2sldyts
- composed of 6 phases
1. The first pull (A)
2.  the transition (B)
3. the second pull (C)
4. the turnover under the barbell (D)
5. the catch phase (E),
6. and rising from the squat position (F).

barbell clean and jerk:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PjY1rH4_MOA (clean ad)
1. Set up in a hip-width stance with a hook grip
2. Hips and shoulder should rise at the same rate
3. Torso rotates to vertical and hips extends rapidly
4. Shoulders shrug followed by a pull under with the arms
5. Drive the elbows up and receive the bar at the bottom of a front squat, then stand
6. Torso dips straight down
7. Hips and legs extend rapidly then press under
8. Receive the bar in a split position
9. Bring the feet together, one foot at a time
10. Complete with full hip, knee, and arm extension

Quality of movement:
Did the person have a full extension of the arm and legs at the end of the movement?
Did the person receive the barbell in a squat position during the snatch (squat snatch vs power snatch)?

Lastly, there are a few metrics that we should extract from the clips:
- Barbell velocity during different stages of the movement
- Barbell distance from the body at different stages of the movement


- Data Gathering
=== Gather dataset of barbells
=== Gather dataset of video of barbell snatch
=== Gather dataset of video of clean and jerk
- Data Labeling on CVAT
- Train/Validate barbell landmark detection model (requires high accuracy)
- LSTM model to detect barbell snatch vs clean & jerk
- Specific Movement Model (Only minimal training data for technical proof without worrying of accuracy)
=== Train barbell snatch model (to classify each phase of the movement as well as movement quality)
=== Train barbell clean and jerk movement
=== Detect barbell velocity during each stage of the movement
- Client / Server Setup
Websocket or REST API to analyze video feed from a client (web or mobile).

title: Voice-to-Text Web Application Developer with Diarization and NLP Experience - Upwork
content:
Job Title: Voice-to-Text Web Application Developer with Diarization and NLP Experience

Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled developer to create a web application plugin for our client negotiation recording system. This application will need to have the capability to perform streaming voice-to-text conversion and speaker diarization (i.e., distinguishing between different speakers in the conversation), akin to systems like Google Dictate or Apple's Siri. This process should occur in real time as the conversation takes place.

The voice data subjected to Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) should then undergo contextual correction through Natural Language Understanding (NLU) processing. The system should consolidate the speech segments so that the full discourse of a recognized participant is displayed until the next speaker begins to talk. The recognized text should be dynamically displayed on the screen.

The system should also be equipped with the ability to add a custom dictionary and to tag recognized words or phrases. At the end of the conversation, the NLU/NLP corrected dialog should be sent to the main application in the form of a JSON file.

The application should work primarily in Polish, but functionality in other languages would be beneficial.

The ideal candidate should have proven experience in developing similar applications, particularly with a strong background in diarization and ASR correction through NLP. It is essential that the application can operate in a streaming mode. The maximum number of conversation participants should be three. It is crucial that basic device microphones (computer, phone, tablet) are sufficient for diarization and speech-to-text conversion.

We kindly ask that you only prepare and submit a proposal if you meet ALL the criteria outlined in this job description. Please provide proof of your experience and any relevant work samples when applying.

We look forward to receiving your proposals. Thank you for your interest.

3. Train the AI model: Implement state-of-the-art machine learning techniques and natural language processing algorithms to train the AI model using the collected client data. Continuously refine and improve the AI's ability to provide accurate and personalized responses.

4. Ensure data privacy and security: Prioritize client confidentiality and privacy by implementing robust security measures to protect sensitive client information stored within the AI system. Comply with all relevant data protection regulations and industry best practices.

5. Optimize user experience: Collaborate with UX/UI designers and developers to create a user-friendly interface that enables seamless interactions between clients and the AI. Strive for a user-centric design that enhances the overall coaching experience.

6. Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance: Rigorously test the AI system to identify and rectify any performance issues, bugs, or inaccuracies. Conduct regular audits and maintain a feedback loop with clients to continuously improve the AI's capabilities.

7. Collaborate with the coaching team: Work closely with fellow coaches to gain insights into their coaching methodologies, industry trends, and client requirements. Regularly seek feedback to enhance the AI's understanding and responsiveness.

Qualifications:

- Extensive experience as a business coach, possessing a comprehensive understanding of coaching principles, techniques, and client dynamics.
- Proficiency in machine learning, natural language processing, and AI development, with a track record of successful AI projects or similar ventures.
- Strong programming skills
- Solid understanding of data privacy and security principles, with experience implementing secure systems.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills, allowing you to effectively work with cross-functional teams, understand client requirements, and incorporate feedback into the AI development process.
- Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality, reliable solutions.
- Continuous learning mindset to stay updated with the latest advancements in AI and coaching techniques.

Join our team and contribute to the creation of a groundbreaking AI system that will enhance the coaching experience for our clients. Your expertise and creativity will empower individuals and businesses to achieve their goals through the power of AI-driven coaching support.

Note: While the Virtual Assistant AI Developer position focuses on creating an AI system to support coaching sessions, it's important to ensure that the human interaction and personalized touch remain integral to the coaching experience. The AI should be seen as a valuable tool to augment coaching sessions, rather than replacing the role of the coach entirely.

title: Stable Diffusion + Segment Anything Proof of Concept Python App - Upwork
content:
Principal developer for quick python proof of concept on top of existing Stable Diffusion GPU service.  We are running Stable Diffusion as a cloud service and want to confirm that the JSON APIs are viable for a product we plan to develop.  

To meet this goal we want to port an existing Hugging Face StableSAM demo to Google Compute servers:

https://huggingface.co/spaces/abhishek/StableSAM/tree/main
I have forked this at https://huggingface.co/spaces/coconnor999/StableSAM
(video example at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yIpM4TpAgL4)

And change the SD workflow to using APIs provided by our remote Stable Diffusion service.  See attached API Swagger doc.  This may require additional research to determine the best approach to call Segment Anything , also see https://github.com/continue-revolution/sd-webui-segment-anything/wiki/API .

Additionally we have four enhancement requests to the demo workflow:

1. Required - Source images should be uploadable to a file share that the demo pulls from when selecting a starting image.

2. Required - Output images should be saved to a separate file share that can easily be downloaded.

3. Required - UI or application code should be hosted on Google's Compute Engine or a similar Google service.  We have Google Compute credits and would like to utilize this for the project.  You will need to direct us on which services we should use and provide guidance on how you'd like them configured.

4. Optional - Re-skin and / or adjust the UI to be more compact and presentable, potentially using CSS for a more "carousel" style workflow.  
This is completely optional and only useful if you want to demonstrate any advanced UX skills as a candidate for future project work.
See https://codepen.io/chriscoyier/pen/XwbNwX for a carousel style example.

We prefer to run this as a fixed fee project with multiple interim milestones / checkpoints.  We're flexible on how we define the checkpoints, our initial suggestion is:

1. Set up Google environment, create very simple test code to ensure  SD APIs are working as expected.

2. Create image upload, processing queues and basic masking feature.

3. Build UX that supports user selecting parts of initial image as mask.

4. Create Segment Anything API calls and UX updates.

5. Enable selection inversion ("background" button in current huggingface demo) + prompts.

6. Output files to shared space accessible through app or manual download tool (sftp, scp, etc.).

title: Categorization of large scale qual data using ML - Upwork
content:
## About Voice of Customer

Voice of Customer, Inc. is a B2B SaaS to help product teams be more confident about their decisions. We make it easy for product managers, researchers, designers, and engineers to make sense of all the qual, quant, and visual user-session data to hone in on insights to tackle top problem areas.

Product teams mentioned above are getting data from many places - quant (i.e: Amplitude), qual (research repo), visual (FullStory) - and are looking at it in silo’d ways. Often, confidence in direction is often low-medium when setting strategy because product teams often focus on delivery than discovery. Checking quant analysis often gives you the *what,* but we want to easily combine it with the qual analysis to provide the *why* behind the *what*. Combined teams can see the larger picture on what problem areas to dive further in on.

Our goal is to help product teams do proper discovery to ensure they are making confident bets.

Here are prototypes of 2 problem areas we are exploring atm:

- Insights analytics: [5-min Loom](https://www.loom.com/share/41348bf6352a4993a10f3a9175990543)
- Text based SQL: [5-min Loom](https://www.loom.com/share/330532f952cb477eacea9a259a0161fa)

## Initial Project(s)…

(1) create a taxonomy model for each client based on their problem areas, jobs-to-be-done, product swimlanes, etc.
- intake multiple sources of qual data from Salesforce, Gong, Zendesk, Surveys, etc. Initially using CSVs
- categorize qual open-text feedback into semantic problem areas
- create hierarchy of themes and tags
- create segmentation filtering to slice-and-dice data into dashboards
(2) a AI model to create a conversational survey vs a traditonal if/this/then.that. Meaning, so when a user replies with generic data like "easy to use" we can ask follow ups for "what was it that is not easy to use". Doing so, we get quality data for product teams to action on
(3) text-based SQL analysis on Slack. See Loom above.

## We’re looking for someone with…

- Clear async/written and real-time communication
- Deep love of solving problems and building systems
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- A sense of humor and passion for enjoying the ride
- A proven history of building and scaling products in a team
- Advanced expertise with Python and SQL

## On an average day you will…

- Design, build, and optimize ML models in production
- Innovate on behalf of our customers using your intuition
- Collaborate with the team to identify and solve complex problems
- Talk to customers to understand their needs
- Roll up your sleeves and get shit done
- End of day be proud of what you’ve done

## We offer you…

- An amazing product and field to explore
- Competitive rate
- A sane work culture with no standing meetings
- An amazing, fully remote team who get shit done

Bonus points for: you’ve explored custom LLM models and have an experiments with users you can show us.

title: Build Website using Bubble.io with GPT4 Integration  - Upwork
content:
I am seeking a Bubble.io developer who can build and deploy a web-based AI software that uses GPT4 and Google's Speech-to-Text API. We already have the exact website UI designed in Figma and all feature requirements ready in a technical document. The goal of the product is to analyze the food recipe of students who are becoming chefs in culinary school.

We are expecting this project to be complete in 2-3 weeks max, but preferably shorter.

EXAMPLE USE CASE/FLOW:
Student(user) arrives to the website. The website prompts the following question: Tell me how you would make a delicious taco. The student records their response and clicks submit. Using Google Speech to Text plugin in bubble.io, the students response is transcribed. Then the software would use the GPT4 plugin in bubble.io to analyze the script based on the following rubric:

You are a master chef working with Gordan Ramsey as a judge on his show. A contestant is asked the question “Tell me how you would make the most delicious taco”. Analyze the contestant's response based on the following criteria:

Overall score of recipe:
Number of ingredients included:
Complexity of recipe:
Time it would take to create recipe:
Number of unique ingredients listed in recipe:
Did the response miss any essential ingredients?
Did the response list the correct steps on how to make the recipe?
Overall, what went well with the response? Include information from statistics above
Overall, what could be improved in the response?
What are some concrete examples of ways the recipe could have been better?


After the student (user) inputs their response, the software would respond with an analysis based on the rubric we provide to gpt4 and take some of the data outputted from gpt4 and convert it into visually appealing charts.

I have attached an example document below of the rubric.


GENERAL TASKS for WEBSITE:

1) User interface allowing navigation to the main application site.
2) Design parameters for a visually appealing, color-coordinated UI.
3) Two versions of a constant navigation bar, one for non-authenticated users and the other for authenticated ones.
4) Constant social and legal footing bar, including links to various social media platforms and other relevant pages.
5) Landing page with an interactive welcome message and a primary engagement button.
6) User-directed selection function leading to subsequent stages.
7) Two primary selections leading to different paths.
8) Random generation of interactive content, based on the user selection, from a cloud-based data source.
9) GPT4 API integration for response generation feature based on user input
10) User response recording functionality using available device peripherals.
11) Video-to-text transcription service for the user's recorded response, integrating Google Speech to Text API.
12) GPT4 integration to evaluate transcribed user response based on a custom rubric we've built out and need to give to OpenAI as parameters
13) Account creation or authentication requirement before accessing the result of AI analysis.
14) Required user information fields during account creation, including some data collection questions.
15) Detailed feedback display for the user, including comparison with AI-generated response, post-authentication. This feedback display will also include charts, tables, and graphs
16) User action buttons for repeating the same interactive content or proceeding to a new one.
17) Usage restriction after certain interactions, leading to token purchasing.
18) Multiple subscription options.
19) Saving and displaying the user's analytics in a dashboard
20) A user dashboard with various interactive elements, including data visualization.
21) User account management features including password modification and subscription management.

Daily check-ins will occur every Saturday at 9 pm PST (6 am CEST).

title: Dqn agent error to solve - Upwork
content:
Are you a freelancer looking for an exciting project? I have a small project that involves troubleshooting an error in a DQN agent designed to make trades based on a fixed set of candle data. The challenge lies in adapting the replay function to accommodate a dynamically changing action space.

Here are the details:

The project revolves around a DQN (Deep Q-Network) agent that utilizes reinforcement learning to make trading decisions.
The agent interacts with a fixed set of candle data, using actions to guide its trading strategy.
The complication arises from the fact that the action space changes dynamically based on the state parameter after each action.
The current issue lies within the replay function, which fails to handle the changing action space appropriately.
What you can expect:

I will provide all the relevant code, allowing you to delve into the project's specifics.
I am committed to offering comprehensive explanations for each component of the code, ensuring you have a clear understanding of the project's intricacies.
Your task:

Your primary objective is to modify the replay function to accommodate the dynamically changing action space.
By doing so, you will enable the agent to seamlessly handle the evolving nature of its actions.
If you're up for the challenge, I believe this project will provide an engaging opportunity to showcase your skills in reinforcement learning and troubleshooting.

title: ML Neuroevolution - Upwork
content:
The goal of this project is to develop a model aimed at solving optimization/benchmark problems, such as the fsephere, by employing neuroevolution techniques. The initial step involves creating a population of models with a predefined network structure and assigning random weights to them. In each generation, it is necessary to randomly alter these weights and assess the performance of each network to assign a fitness value. Subsequently, a pooling algorithm should be utilized to select models for the next generation, and this iterative process needs to be repeated. Models with higher fitness values should have a greater chance of advancing to the next generation, where their weights will be mutated with the expectation of producing a generation with improved performance.

Neuroevolution, also known as neuro-evolution, is an approach in artificial intelligence that utilizes evolutionary algorithms to generate artificial neural networks (ANNs) for solving specific problems. I aim to employ Neuroevolution to address the optimization challenges mentioned below. Instead of beginning from scratch, I am willing to utilize pre-existing implementations from GitHub and modify them according to the requirements of optimizing the following problems. Moreover, I intend to leverage ChatGPT to accelerate the process and quickly obtain an initial version.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neuroevolution
https://github.com/search?q=Neuroevolution&type=repositories

fsphere
fcigar
fDiscus
fRHE
Group 2:

title: Seeking coder to create trading Bot - Upwork
content:
Trading bot must be able to communicate in Python, Java script, Backtrader and or VectorBT.

1) Gather market data swiftly: Access real time or historical market data relevant to the trading strategy.

2) Implement trading logic: Code must be able to incorporate a trading strategy, using the market data to make decisions on when to enter or exit trades. Implement risk management techniques, such as stop loss and take profit orders to manage potential losses and secure profits.

4) Connect to an exchange: Establish a connection to a cryptocurrency or stock exchange through their API.
This will allow the Bot to access market data and execute trades automatically.

5) Implement trade execution: Use the exchanges API to send buy or sell orders based on trading logic.

6) Backtesting and optimization: Must be able to test Bots performance using historical data to evaluate its effectiveness and profitability in simulations, frameworks and in real world applications. Must be able to do backtesting, simulations and frameworks minimum 2yrs using historical data and forward testing simulation

7) Deploy and Monitor: Must be able to deploy Bot onto a server or cloud platform that can run it continuously. Must be able to monitor its operations closely, including its trades, performance metrics, and any errors or anomalies.

8) Risk management and safeguards: Able to implement risk management measures to protect the trading capital. Set predefined limits for risk exposure, position size, and maximum loss.

9) Continual improvement: Must be able to easily monitor the performance of the Bot and make ongoing adjustments as necessary to reflect changing market conditions.

title: Power BI Implementation for Data Visualization and Reporting - Upwork
content:
Project Description:
We require a comprehensive Power BI solution that connects to various databases and data storage files within our organization. The solution should facilitate data extraction via Power Query, include the creation of 20-30 key measures using DAX with clean formatting standards, and establish dashboard canvases along with a balanced scorecard format to be replicated at corporate, business, and departmental levels. Knowledge and experience with Row-Level Security (RLS) are essential. Familiarity with machine learning through Azure, as well as Python/R for data analytics, will be considered a significant plus.

Deliverables:
A fully functional Power BI solution that connects to our databases and data storage files.

Complete data extraction setup through Power Query.

Creation of 20-30 key measures using DAX, adhering to clear formatting standards.

Design and development of intuitive dashboard canvases and a balanced scorecard format, capable of replication at different organizational levels.

Implementation of RLS to ensure the secure viewing of data.

Comprehensive documentation detailing the functionality, design, and maintenance of the Power BI system.

Training sessions for key users to effectively manage and use the system.

Skills Required:
Extensive experience with Power BI, including data extraction, dashboard creation, and report generation.

Proficiency in using Power Query for data extraction from various sources.

Expertise in DAX for creating measures.

Knowledge of visualization best practices for creating intuitive and user-friendly dashboards.

Experience in implementing and managing Row-Level Security (RLS) in Power BI.

Knowledge of machine learning through Azure and Python/R for data analytics.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Proficiency in training and user documentation.

Communication:
Clear, concise, and frequent communication is highly valued. Weekly progress updates are expected. Candidates must be available for scheduled and impromptu meetings via Skype or Zoom. Fluency in English is mandatory.

Working Style:
We operate in an agile manner, so we anticipate regular updates and iterations of your work. Please share progress frequently to allow prompt adjustments. We encourage collaborative discussions, and we welcome your insights and suggestions.

Your ability to respond swiftly and adhere to timelines is highly valued. We look for a vendor who will not only act as a service provider but also as a partner in this project.

Strict confidentiality is expected regarding our systems and processes. As part of this project, you'll be required to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA).

Application Process:
Interested parties should submit their proposals, which must include:

A detailed plan of action, including a timeline.

Evidence of previous experience with similar projects (please include references).

Availability and expected project duration.

An estimated cost for the project.

We eagerly anticipate your proposals and look forward to collaborating on this project.

title: Pitch Presentation - Upwork
content:
We require a compelling pitch presentation aimed at attracting potential investors and securing funds for our groundbreaking start-up venture. Our project revolves around the development of an innovative Emotional Chatbot that harnesses the power of advanced technologies such as Chat GBT, artificial intelligence (AI), and human expertise. This unique Chatbot integrates user profiling capabilities and communicates through various social networks, revolutionizing the way individuals interact with technology and enhancing their emotional well-being.

To elaborate further, our start-up is dedicated to bridging the gap between technology and human emotions. We recognize the growing need for meaningful and empathetic interactions in today's digital age, where individuals often seek companionship and support through virtual platforms. Our Emotional Chatbot serves as a virtual companion, offering users a safe space to express their thoughts, emotions, and concerns.

At the core of our project lies the Chat GBT technology, a cutting-edge advancement in the field of natural language processing. This technology enables our Chatbot to engage in human-like conversations, understanding context, emotions, and subtle nuances. By combining the power of AI algorithms with human expertise, we have created a Chatbot that not only comprehends user messages but also responds in a compassionate and emotionally intelligent manner.

User profiling is another key component of our Chatbot's functionality. Through advanced profiling techniques, we analyze user data, including preferences, interests, and communication patterns, to tailor personalized experiences. This enables our Chatbot to adapt its responses and suggestions, fostering a deeper connection with users and enhancing the overall user experience.

In addition, our Chatbot operates seamlessly across various social networks, allowing users to communicate with it through their preferred platforms. Whether it's Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, or Twitter, our Chatbot is readily accessible, ensuring convenience and familiarity for users.

Through our pitch presentation, we aim to showcase the immense potential of our Emotional Chatbot and highlight its numerous benefits. We will emphasize how our technology addresses the growing demand for emotional support and companionship in the digital era. Furthermore, we will outline our comprehensive market research, including competitor analysis and target audience demographics, to demonstrate the viability and scalability of our venture.

Ultimately, our goal is to secure the necessary funding to bring our Emotional Chatbot to life and make a significant impact on the lives of individuals worldwide. By offering a unique and personalized virtual companion, we envision a future where technology truly understands and supports human emotions, leading to enhanced well-being and happiness.

title: Subject Matter Expert (SME) - AI Content Review - Upwork
content:
Overview

We are currently seeking a highly knowledgeable and experienced Subject Matter Expert (SME) specializing in Artificial Intelligence (AI) to join our team as a consultant. As an SME, you will be responsible for reviewing and providing expert feedback on the course structure, outline, and content of our AI training program. Your expertise will play a vital role in ensuring the accuracy, comprehensiveness, and relevance of our course materials.

We are developing a learning program (comprises of 5 courses) for educators and trainers on the topic of Artificial Intelligence (AI), more specifically educators who are novice in the topic of AI yet expected to understand the ground frameworks of AI and its use in the education field to then share the knowledge to their students.

Expected Deliverable

Review Course Structure: Analyze the overall organization and flow of the proposed courses. Evaluate the appropriateness of the modules and lessons in relation to the target audience and learning objectives.

Assess Course Outline: Examine the outline of each module and lesson, verifying that it covers relevant AI concepts, methodologies, and applications. Make recommendations for lesson topics (up to 3 for each lesson).

Ensure Relevance and Currency: Keep up to date with the latest advancements and trends in AI. Evaluate the course content for relevance and currency, making recommendations for updates to reflect emerging technologies, research breakthroughs, or industry standards.

Conduct Research to Support Content Development: Provide concrete research materials (articles, videos etc.), examples and case studies which can help to make abstract concepts more tangible and relatable to the audience. This can also help to demonstrate the real-world impact of the topic being discussed.

Provide Expert Feedback: Using the template provided, provide inputs detailing your evaluations, recommendations, and suggested improvements for the course structure, outline, and content.

Collaborate with our Instructional Design Team: Provide an hour of availability to meet with our team to ensure your feedback is implemented effectively.

You may refer to the document attached for a high level overview of the course structure.

Once you have been shortlisted, you will be provided a separate sheet where you will be able to provide the appropriate inputs (for reference, parts you will need to do is in the designated yellow columns within this document) adhering to the guidelines outlined below.

Guidelines

1. With regards to the selection of tools, it is recommended to prioritize the utilization of Bing Chat to a significant extent.
2. It is advisable to contemplate generating content that revolves around the creation of easily accessible learning materials catering to diverse target audiences such as individuals with special needs, varying age groups and genders.
3. It is highly recommended to refrain from producing content that is based on personal opinions, particularly in relation to the subject matter of AI responsibilities.

Requirements

1. Subject Matter Expertise: Extensive knowledge and expertise in Artificial Intelligence, including a deep understanding of AI concepts, algorithms, machine learning, neural networks, natural language processing, computer vision, and related areas.
2. Experience in AI Content Review: Proven experience in reviewing and evaluating AI course materials, curriculum, or training programs. Previous work as an AI instructor, curriculum developer, or AI researcher would be highly advantageous.
3. Education: A degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field is strongly preferred. Advanced degrees or certifications in AI-related disciplines will be highly regarded.
4. Industry Experience: Substantial practical experience working with AI technologies, either in academia or industry. Familiarity with real-world AI applications, challenges, and best practices is essential.
5. Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail with the ability to spot and correct errors, inaccuracies, or inconsistencies in course content.
6. Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to provide clear, constructive, and actionable feedback to improve the course materials.
7. Time Management: Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks effectively within tight deadlines.

If you are a subject matter expert with a passion for AI and possess the necessary qualifications and experience outlined above, please submit your proposal. Additionally, please include any previous AI course reviews or related work samples.

We look forward to collaborating with you to enhance our AI training program.

title: Frontend Engineer (React) - Upwork
content:
We're a Berlin-based medtech startup dedicated to building AI-powered software that supports radiologists with their daily work: Analyzing medical images. Our first apps for identifying diseases like Alzheimer's and multiple sclerosis from brain MRI scans are already in use by radiologists across Europe. Crucial for our success is the seamless integration of our software into the radiologist's workflow: This is not only one main driver for customer satisfaction, but also helps us to collect annotated data, which is the basis of our machine learning models. We're therefore looking for a front-end developer to support us in creating efficient and user-centric UIs for our apps.

Tasks
-------

Your main tasks will include the development and maintenance of our web interface where users can select, view and edit the results of our AI software (for example creating structured reports of biomarkers, displaying diagnostic proposals, and rendering medical images with segmentation overlays).

Our front-end is created with React (JavaScript and TypeScript), bundled with Webpack, and styled with Sass and (s)css modules. We use ESlint and Prettier to lint and format our code, and Jest with React Testing Library to test our code. Moreover, we use various additional libraries such as Redux and React Router.

Bonus:

Optionally, you can work on our Medical Image Viewer, allowing users to view and edit 3D segmentations (for example drawing lesion onto 3D MRI images). It's also built with React and additionally relies heavily on vtk.js utilizing the browser's WebGL API.

Requirements
-----------------

Our ideal candidate will have a good sense for frontend architecture and state management, understands the importance of readable code, and is comfortable with the modern React ecosystem (functional components, hooks, etc.).

- You have 3+ years experience with fast and beautiful front-end applications built with React and ideally several of the aforementioned technologies
- You are familiar with good web practices (for example use semantic html, consider accessibility and use common UI-patterns).
- You value user experience as well as developer experience
- You have experience with backend development (REST APIs) and can read Python code, or are willing to learn it.
- You value clean code and testing, and you know best practices and established UI patterns
- You enjoy working autonomously

Bonus:

- Experience with UX-design
- Experience with (medical) image processing, ideally in the browser  using e.g. WebGL, vtk.js or itk.js
- Experience with backend development, ideally in Python
- Experience with DICOM/nifti viewers such as MITK

Technologies
----------------

FE:

React
React Router
Redux
Webpack
Sass/Scss-modules
ESLint
Prettier
Jest and React Testing Library
Modern JavaScript/Typescript
VtkJs

BE:

Python
Flask
SqlAlchemy
Sqlite
MongoDb
Nginx
Gunicorn

Ops:

Docker
Bash
Gitlab CI/CD
Selenium + Playwright

title: AI Software Developer for Trainerize.com Integration - Upwork
content:
Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced AI Software Developer to join our team and develop a cutting-edge software solution that integrates with Trainerize.com, a leading fitness management platform. As an AI Software Developer, you will play a pivotal role in enhancing our client engagement by leveraging artificial intelligence to send personalized messages to clients who have not met their nutrition goals or training sessions.

Responsibilities:

- Develop a software solution using AI technologies to integrate seamlessly with Trainerize.com.
- Design and implement algorithms to analyze client data, including nutrition and training session records.
- Create a notification system that identifies clients who haven't met their nutrition goals or training sessions.
- Develop personalized messaging capabilities to send customized messages to clients based on their specific goals and progress.
- Collaborate with the design and development team to ensure a user-friendly and intuitive interface.
- Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure the software's accuracy and reliability.
- Stay updated with the latest AI and machine learning advancements to continually improve the software's capabilities.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a software developer, preferably with expertise in AI and machine learning.
- Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, Java, or C++.
- Familiarity with AI frameworks and libraries, such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.
- Solid understanding of data analysis, algorithms, and statistical modeling.
- Experience with web services integration and API development.
- Knowledge of fitness management platforms, particularly Trainerize.com, is a plus.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Strong communication and collaboration abilities.

How to Apply:
If you are passionate about AI and fitness, and believe you have the skills and expertise to develop an intelligent software solution that integrates with Trainerize.com, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, portfolio (if applicable), and a brief description of your relevant experience and start the description of yourself with the word "Kangaroo". Additionally, please include any examples of AI projects you have worked on in the past.

Note: This is a remote position, and applicants from all locations are welcome to apply.

We appreciate all applications, but only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further steps in the selection process.

title: Train an audio-based vowel classifier - Upwork
content:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced machine learning engineer to help us train an audio-based vowel classifier. The project length is less than a month, and the ideal candidate will have expertise in deep learning, model optimization, and neural networks. Proficiency in Python, PyTorch, and/or TensorFlow is also required. Data will be provided in the form of audio files, separated into directories corresponding to each of the 5 core vowels ('a', 'e', 'i', 'o', and 'u'). The goal is to be able to use this model to detect vowels in realtime using the microphone in browser with minimal latency. The deliverables should include the source code for training this model along with the model itself using the ONNX format.

As the selected candidate, you will be responsible for developing and training the model, optimizing it for accuracy, and tuning it to ensure that it can recognize vowels accurately. You should have experience in audio processing and be familiar with audio classification techniques.

To apply, please submit a proposal that includes a detailed explanation of your approach to the project, your relevant experience, and links to past projects that demonstrate your expertise in machine learning and audio processing. We look forward to working with you.

title: ML/AI Engineer - Natural Language to SQL Conversion for Analytics Product - Upwork

We are seeking a talented ML/AI Engineer to join our team and work on our cutting-edge analytics product. As an ML/AI Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining a model that converts natural language prompts into accurate SQL queries for our clients. This role requires expertise in machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), and database technologies.

Responsibilities:

Implement and fine-tune machine learning algorithms and models for NLP tasks.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product managers, software engineers, and data scientists to integrate the natural language to SQL conversion capability into our product.
- Design, build, and maintain scalable and efficient systems to handle large volumes of natural language queries and generate accurate SQL queries.
- Conduct thorough testing and validation to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the model's outputs.
- Continuously monitor and improve the performance of the model by analyzing user feedback and incorporating new training data.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in ML/AI, NLP, and database technologies to contribute innovative ideas for improving the analytics product.

Requirements:

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field.
- Strong background in machine learning and deep learning techniques, with practical experience in developing ML/AI models.
- Proficiency in natural language processing (NLP) techniques and libraries such as NLTK, spaCy, or Transformers.
- Hands-on experience with SQL and database technologies, with a solid understanding of relational databases.
- Experience with building and deploying ML models in production environments.
- Proficient in programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++.
- Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively to overcome challenges in NLP and SQL conversion tasks.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks and priorities efficiently.
- Familiarity with analytics platforms, data visualization tools, and dashboarding frameworks is a plus.

If you are passionate about leveraging the power of ML/AI and NLP to transform data analytics and create exceptional user experiences, we would love to hear from you. Join our dynamic team and play a pivotal role in developing and maintaining our natural language to SQL conversion model, as well as contributing to future ML/AI projects.

To apply, please submit your resume, portfolio (if applicable), and a brief description of relevant ML/AI projects you have worked on.

title: AI Sport Scheduler - Upwork
content:
We have an online scheduling system for sports that can be done manually or with an auto scheduler that is sequential in nature on how it places games into time slots on days.

We are looking into create a machine learning system based on a set of rules we already offer. We would start out with simple rules to make sure it works.

The idea would be that the AI would schedule games in each divisions. If a scheduled game needs to be removed because another game would work better there it could and the AI would remember what it did and decide where to reschedule the game.

Other rules would be things like max per date, minimum time between games, max games per week, don’t double book games, or have teams not play at the same time, along with certain date and time restrictions.

We don’t expect the AI Scheduler to be done in seconds but within a hour depending how large the event is.

Our site is ASP.NET MVC with C# but this can be a service or console application. If this has to be done in another language we are open to it.

title: Solution architecture for new App/web - Arabic Speaker  - Upwork
content:
A solution architect (Arabic speaker) is needed to provide a solution architecture for a new app that connects service providers with clients looking for home services such as home cleaning, home repairs, and home renovations.




Project Overview:

Provide a comprehensive solution architecture for the app, considering the specific requirements and functionalities of connecting clients with service providers for home services.

Ensure scalability, performance, security, and usability aspects are addressed in the solution architecture.


Requirements Gathering:

Collaborate with the client to understand their business objectives, target audience, and desired features of the app.
Conduct thorough requirements gathering to identify all functional and non-functional requirements for the solution.


Solution Design:

Define the data models, APIs, and integration points required for the app to function seamlessly.
Consider scalability, reliability, and extensibility while designing the solution architecture.
Technology Recommendations:

Assess the client's technology stack preferences, budget, and scalability requirements to recommend suitable app development technologies.

Guide on selecting the right frameworks, libraries, databases, and hosting options for the app.


System Integration:

Identify and recommend appropriate third-party services or APIs for integrating functionalities such as payment gateways, geolocation, notification systems, and authentication/authorization mechanisms.
Define the integration points and data flow between the app and external services.


Performance and Security:

Define strategies for optimizing app performance, including data caching, request/response optimization, and load balancing techniques.
Ensure the solution architecture incorporates robust security measures like data encryption, secure communication channels, and user authentication/authorization.


Documentation:

Prepare detailed solution architecture documentation, including system diagrams, data flow diagrams, API specifications, and any other relevant technical documentation.

-----------------------------

Timing: we need to finalize the solution within two weeks

Requirements Gathering: (10% of the Total hrs)

The solution architect must understand the client's requirements, goals, and constraints. This phase involves discussions, meetings, and documentation review.


Analysis and Research: (30% of the Total hrs)

The solution architect will analyze the requirements, research technology options, explore existing solutions, and identify potential challenges and risks.

Solution Design: (60% of the Total hrs)

The architect will define the overall architecture, including the high-level components, modules, and system interactions. They will also determine technology stacks, integration points, scalability considerations, and security requirements.



Collaboration and Iteration: (Will be discussed later on)

The solution architect will collaborate with stakeholders, developers, and other team members to gather feedback, refine the design, and ensure alignment with project goals.

Person will present hand and the system will grant access online and the hand in back camera and face of front camera will be compared and liveliness of the hand will be applied using the led of the back camera.

title: NLP ML phrase matching module - Upwork
content:
We need a fairly small and simple NLP ML module that selects which text, if any, of several given options, best matches some arbitrary input text. This may utilize phrase/sentence embedding techniques or any other technique that we agree on.

Examples:
1.
choices: “yes" ; “no”
input: “affirmative”, output: “yes” (or a high score for “yes” and a lower score for “no”)
Input: “maybe”, output: null (or very low scores for both options)

2.
choices: “In the  morning" ; “In the evening”
input: “Not in the morning”, output: “In the evening” (or some non-tiny score for “In the evening” and a lower score for “In the morning”)
Input: “at noon”, output: null (or very low scores for both options)

3.
choices: “I want to have lunch”, “I want to go sightseeing”
input: “I’m hungry”, output: “I want to have lunch”
Input: “I want to play”, output: null (or very low scores for both options)

4.
choices: “Let’s go home”, “Let’s go to the square”
input: “Go to my house”, output: “Let’s go home”
Input: “gibberish”, output: null (or very low scores for both options)

Note, “very low score” can be anything that we set / hardcode, which can be tweaked with some manual experimentation. E.g. if using scores of 0-1.0, it could be that we use a threshold of 0.06 and if all options are below this threshold then it is considered a non-match with any of them, regardless of which of them has a higher score.

**Deliverable:**
1. It should be possible to use the module as:
1.1. A statically linked library in a Unity project running on iOS, Android, Windows devices with bindings for C# programming language. (if the model is small enough to run on a mobile device and doesn’t require GPU)
2.1. A standalone tool for batch testing of the inputs and outputs with CSV or JSON input/output format on Ubuntu 22.04 and MacOS
3.1. A static or dynamic library with bindings in python (3.8) language for using in server-side environment on Ubuntu 22.04 OS

2. The code should be high quality, well commented, and with detailed step-by-step instructions for building and training, as applicable.

3. Preferably (but not mandatory), your solution should allow re-training so that human corrections to incorrect outputs can gradually increase the accuracy of the module.

Thank you!

title: Machine Learning Expert / Consultant - Upwork
content:
Greetings!

We’re looking for an ML expert to work on a learning adaptivity module for one of our new e-learning products in the language learning space.

The product has a wide range of content types across modalities (listening/reading/writing/speaking/understanding), difficulty levels, and other dimensions. The content is presented to users in the form of clusters of small tasks.

Your task would be to develop a module that recommends the optimal next task (or cluster of tasks) to present to a user, in order to maximize their learning progress. For example, giving an overly easy task, where the user would have nearly 100% chance of getting it right, isn’t expected to advance the user’s knowledge level and may be boring and a waste of time for them. Conversely, a task with around 0% chance of success is likely way too difficult and may be demotivating/frustrating for the user and also a waste of time.

The model should self-evolve as more data of real users is accumulated. The model might initially make aggressive changes to difficulty levels, perhaps over-reacting to user actions, until we get enough data for the user (e.g. after a correct answer, instantly move to much higher difficulty).

The model needs to be compiled and integrated into a Unity project.

Once we confirm with you a good mutual fit, we will sign an NDA and provide you with a more detailed project description and content + user data samples.

Thank you for your interest in this project.

- low latency asynchronous processor of CPU-heavy requests running on a custom autoscaler
- sdk for accessing a cloud storage leveraging an API versioning convention that allows for introducing new features and fixes without breaking backward compatibility (client projects using a version as old as 6 years still work with new releases while the code has been almost fully refactored twice in that time)
- cost modelling and optimization system in telco domain
- fraud detection tool for risk analysis consultants and economic police in Europe
- troubleshooting of a complex failure in an ASGI application (sort of like highly specialized twitter)
- a large scale scrape/search system tracking over 100 million objects with 200+ fields each

If you want to read a bit more about our company, you can check it out here: https://careers-up.reef.pl/. I recommend reading `/home/user/positions/senior-python-backend.md` first and just exploring the system if you want to know more.


No need to see your CV or a lengthy cover letter. Instead, it’s better to give a coding test that will clearly show whether you have capabilities of a senior python backend developer or not. That test takes less time than writing a cover letter and it matches people to this position much better (we analyze the data from our recruitment campaigns to maximize true negative ratio while keeping false negative at zero and test duration as short as we can make it). If you are good at our kind of backend work, you’ll fly through it and even have some fun in the process :)

Not considering hiring through an agency at this time.
